محمد كاظم انبارلويي
1- ناظران جهاني رويدادهاي امروز ايران را بويژه در خصوص اجراي قانون هدفمند كردن يارانه‌ها رصد مي‌كنند. قيمت ده‌ها كالا اصلاح شده و قيمت برخي حامل‌هاي انرژي به چند برابر رسيده است. اما بازار ايران آرام، مردم آرام‌تر و مسئولان با تدبير كل تحولات را بي‌دغدغه مديريت مي‌كنند. سئوال مهم ناظران جهان اين است كه چگونه است ايران در شرايط تحريم و فشار مضاعف قدرت‌هاي جهاني در شرايطي كه تروريسم كور در گونه‌هاي متفاوت از يك سو دانشمندان ايران و از سوي ديگر عزاداران حسيني را نشانه گرفته، همچنين در شرايطي كه سران فتنه به عنوان دنباله آمريكا و رژيم صهيونيستي در داخل عمل مي‌كنند، دولت و مسئولان توانسته‌اند از بزرگترين پيچ و گردنه تاريخ اقتصادي كشور به سلامت عبور كنند.

description.hltext_display: Coach Margenthaler Happy About Break On His Team
description.content: ...The MSU Mens basketball team moved up in the divison two rankings this week from 22 to 16 after beating 7th ranked Winona state 80-74 over the weekend. Coach Margenthaler knew going into the matchup Christmas break would be next and for his guys it comes at just the right time.

description.hltext_display: 基礎年金 剰余金など財源で合意
スマートフォン 新対策を検討
Some Bank of Ireland customers face new fees
description.content:
Bank of Ireland has confirmed that some of its customers will face fees and charges for the first time.
1 of 1
BoI - New fees from February
Bank of Ireland has confirmed that some of its customers will face fees and charges for the first time.
Current account holders who do not make at least nine payments every three months will have fees imposed on them.
From 21 February, Bank of Ireland customers will also have to have at least €1,000 a month going into their account and make nine payments or more every three months using Banking 365 phone or online banking.
Alternatively, they should maintain a minimum credit balance of €3,000 during the fee quarter.
Customers who do not meet the new criteria will be charged 28c for each transaction.
The majority of the bank's 1.2m current account holders will be subject to the new fees.
26% of customers will not be affected as they hold 'Golden Years' or student accounts.
The bank says providing customers with current account facilities costs it money.
The changes have been criticised by the Consumers' Association.

description.hltext_display: Schalke dan Hoffenheim ke Perempat Final
description.content:
Liputan6.com, Augsburg: Dua klub anggota Bundesliga melaju ke babak perempat final Piala Jerman atau DFB Pokal, Selasa (21/12) malam waktu setempat atau Rabu dini hari WIB. Schalke 04 melaju berkat gol semata wayang Jefferson Farfan saat menghapus mimpi klub divisi dua Augsburg.
Schalke yang tersendat di Bundesliga musim ini membutuhkan 84 menit untuk bisa memastikan kemenangan 1-0. Ini hasil yang cukup menggembirakan sebelum menutup kalender tahun ini sebagai rehat musim dingin.
Sementara itu TSG Hoffenheim juga menjejakkan kaki di babak 8 besar usai menghantam Borussia Monchengladbach 2-0. Gol pembuka Hoffenheim dihasilkan Gylfi Sigurdsson melalui tendangan bebas pada menit ke-35. Striker Demba Ba memastikan kemenangan di menit ke-63 sekaligus semakin menghancurkan Monchengladbach yang sedang terpuruk di dasar klasemen Bundesliga.(DIM)

description.hltext_display: Certain Brandy Beans liqueur chocolate recalled over undeclared milk
description.author: The Canadian Press
description.content:
OTTAWA - People with milk allergies are being warned to avoid certain VSC Chocolats Brandy Bean Liqueur Chocolates because they may contain milk not declared on the label.
The German-made chocolates were sold in 200 gram packs with lot codes L7058 J8 and L5177 J8.
They were distributed nationally.
There have been no reported illnesses so far, but eating the chocolates could cause a serious or life-threatening reaction in those with allergies to milk proteins.
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is working with the importer to have the chocolates pulled from store shelves.

description.hltext_display: Lawmakers divided on criminalizing drunk driving
description.content:
BEIJING - Chinese lawmakers on Tuesday continued discussing a draft amendment to the country's Criminal Law which, if passed, could criminalize the act of "drunk driving".
The draft amendment, which was tabled during a bimonthly session of China's top legislature on Monday for the second reading, stipulates that the act of car racing, which has caused "serious consequences", or drunk driving, are violations of the Criminal Law and convicted car racers or drunk drivers would be detained and fined.
Currently, those suspected of drunk driving or street racing, if no serious consequences such as road accidents are caused, are not charged with criminal offences and are only subject to administrative or civil penalties.
According to the road traffic safety law, drunk drivers will face up to 15 days in detention and their driving licenses will be suspended from one to six months. Meanwhile, drivers will have to pay a fine ranging from 200 yuan ($30) to 2,000 yuan.
On the other hand, when drunk driving has become vital or has caused "serious consequences", drivers are ruled to be committing traffic crimes or crimes against public security and receive jail terms ranging from no more than three years detention or more than seven years imprisonment.
The latest amendment stipulates that drunk driving, even if it has caused no road accidents or other serious consequences, would constitute a criminal offence.
According to China's current standard, drunk drivers refer to those having 80 milligrams of alcohol in 100 milliliters of blood.
Xia Ji'en, a member of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (NPC), China's top legislature, hails the proposal to criminalize the act of drunk driving as "progress" that would better protect people's safety and reduce the frequency of drunk driving.
Xia proposed imposing harsher penalties for drunk drivers who caused road accidents.
Member Lang Sheng said administrative detention for drunk drivers is having little effect on quelling the practice of drunk driving, and criminalizing the act of drunk driving would work more effectively.
However, NPC Standing Committee member Fang Xin proposed to fully consider the consequences of criminalizing drunk driving.
A civil servant could no longer keep his post if he commits a crime, even if its drunk driving and no one was hurt, according to Fang.
Member Li Lianning suggested authorities mete out punishment for drunk drivers based upon the severity of their cases and take a cautious approach in legislation.
In most cases, a draft law will be read two or three times before being passed.
China's fast economic development has enabled a growing number of Chinese to realize their middle class dream of owning a car.
China's auto sales jumped past the United States to reach record levels in 2009. China had 199 million motor vehicles on its roads as of September, including 85 million cars, according to the Ministry of Public Security.
However, in a country where drinking liquor is an important part of the dining ritual, the pleasures of drinking alcohol have made drunk driving sometimes an unavoidable practice.
In 2009, Chinese police apprehended 313,000 drunk drivers.
Earlier this month, Gu Qingyang, a post office official in Luoning county of Central China's Henan province, was arrested after he, under the influence of alcohol, drove his car into five teenagers before trying to escape.
More fatal car accidents in big cities such as Chengdu, Nanjing and Hangzhou have triggered heated public complaints and calls for stricter penalties for drunk driving.

description.hltext_display: نيروگاه بوشهر فاقد آلودگي‌است
description.content:
معاون کاربردهاي فناوريهاي نوين سازمان انرژي اتمي کشور گفت: نيروگاه بوشهر هيچ آلودگي محيطي براي کشور و کشورهاي ديگر ايجاد نمي کند.به گزارش خبرنگار مهر در گرگان، عبدالله صولت ثنا شامگاه شنبه در جمع خبرنگاران در گرگان افزود: نيروگاه بوشهر براي کشور بسيار تاثيرگدار است و با ضريب ايمني بالا احداث شده است و ازميزان اطمينان بالايي برخوردار است.وي اظهار داشت: برق نيروگاه هسته اي بوشهر تا يک‌ماه ديگر وارد مدار مي شود.

지난해 우리나라 결혼이민자는 13만1703명.
이 가운데 8202명이 인천시에 살고 있다. 여성 결혼이민자가 7399명으로 대부분(90.2%)을 차지한다. 남성 결혼이민자는 802명에 불과하다.
이를 전국적으로 살펴보면 다문화가족의 6.2%가 인천시에 거주하는 셈인데, 특히 부평구에 가장 많은 결혼이민자(19.1%)가 둥지를 틀었다.
인천발전연구원이 22일 밝힌 `2009년 인천시 다문화가족 실태조사 보고서`에 따르면 34.4%의 다문화가족이 빈곤을 경험하는 등 경제?언어 문제 해결이 가장 시급한 것으로 드러났다.
◆다문화가족 56%. 월평균 가구소득 `200만원 미만`
= 인천시 다문화가족의 월평균 가구소득은 `100만~200만원 미만`이 41.2%로 가장 많았다. `100만원 미만` 가구도 15.1%에 달해 절반 이상이 빈곤에 시달리는 것으로 조사됐다. 실제 다문화 가족의 34.4%는 지난 1년간 사회보험료 미납, 전기수도세 체납, 생활비 마련을 위한 금전 차용, 병원치료 중단?포기 가운데 한 가지 이상을 겪었다.
이는 30.0%인 전국 평균보다 높은 것이다.
결혼이민 만족도는 여성이 남성보다 높았다.
삶의 질 만족도 조사에서 인천시 다문화 가족의 54.9%는 `현재 삶에 만족한다`고 응답했다. 전국 평균인 56.8%에 비해서는 낮은 수치다.
이를 성별로 나눠 보면 여성 결혼이민자의 56.1%가 `현재 삶에 만족한다`고 응답해 남성보다 높은 것으로 집계됐다.
남성 결혼이민자는 45.3%만이 `현재 삶에 만족한다`고 응답했다.
◆다문화가족 아동 보육시설 이용률 52% 불과
= 다문화가족 아동의 보육시설 이용률은 52.0%로 전국 평균 57.0%에 못 미쳤다.
보육시설을 이용하는 다문화가족 가운데 59.1%는 어린이집을 가장 많이 이용하고, 자녀가 초등학생인 경우엔 `학원비 마련`이 가장 큰 어려움(33.0%)으로 나타났다.
초등학생 자녀에게 가장 필요한 지원으로는 `학교교육비, 급식비 지원`(28.6%)이 꼽혔다.
결혼이민자 본인의 취업률은 한국인 배우자 취업률의 절반 수준으로 나타났다. 인천시 결혼이민자 본인 취업률은 45.7%로 한국인 배우자 취업률 80.8%보다 크게 낮았다.
그러나 전국 결혼이민자 본인 취업률(40.2%) 보다는 약간 상회한 것으로 조사됐다.
업종별로 살펴보면 서비스업(27.6%) 종사자가 가장 많았고, 39.7%는 임시직이었다.
한국생활에서 가장 힘든 점으로는 `경제문제`가 25.2%로 가장 많았고, 언어문제(18.7%)가 그 다음을 차지했다.
홍미희 인천여성정책센터장은 "전수조사를 통해 얻어진 이번 연구결과는 광역시 차원 뿐만 아니라 군?구 차에서도 지역 특성을 반영한 다문화가족 지원책 마련에 중요한 기초자료로 활용할 수 있다"고 말했다.
[지홍구 기자]

description.hltext_display: Cougars Beat Falcons On The Court
Police release more information on Billings parking lot shooting that left woman in hospital
description.content:
BILLINGS — Billings police say Lindsey Marie Schmaing, 25, of Billings is hospitalized in critical condition after being shot in the head during a shootout in Billings on Monday.
Chief Rich St. John released details of the shooting that took place in a parking lot on the 4700 block of Underpass Avenue at 1:45 p.m. Monday.
St. John said Schmaing, her husband, Steven Jay Schmaing, 27, and two young children were either picking up or dropping off storage items in a passenger car when a pickup truck pulled up next to them.
Four people were inside the truck at the time of the shooting, Deputy Chief Tim O’Connell said.
At first, police said three adults were in each vehicle at the time of the shooting, with one passenger from the car getting into the truck after the shooting took place. O’Connell said Tuesday that there were four adults in the truck.
It is unclear what happened immediately after the truck pulled up. St. John said both Steven Schmaing, who was in the driver’s seat of the car, and Crystal Lee Lundberg, a passenger in the pickup, exchanged gunfire.
One shot hit Lindsey Schmaing in the head. She was taken by ambulance to a Billings hospital. Both hospitals on Tuesday denied having Lindsey Schmaing on their census.
Julie Burton with Billings Clinic said that could mean the patient is still in the emergency room, was never admitted to the hospital or has chosen to keep information confidential.
Soon after the shooting, police found the pickup truck abandoned at NAPA auto parts store, 5320 Southgate Drive. The older-model truck, with a Musselshell County front license plate, had large bullet holes in the front and rear windows. Bullets also appeared to have struck the roof of the truck.
A man and woman were apprehended nearby. They were found walking on Southgate Drive in front of the Best Western and Kelly Inn Suites. Officers, with guns drawn, arrested the pair on the sidewalk.
A semi-automatic pistol apparently used in the gunfight was found in snow across the street from where the pair was arrested. A second pistol was also recovered, but O’Connell did not know where it was found.
About 10 minutes later officers surrounded the Hampton Inn, 5110 Southgate Drive, located between where the two suspects were arrested and the bullet-riddled truck.
Several officers went inside the building and within minutes led a male suspect out in handcuffs. Lundberg, also in handcuffs, was led out of the hotel 10 minutes later.
All four of the truck’s occupants were arrested without incident. Steven Schmaing was arrested at the scene of the shooting.
Lundberg and Steven Schmaing were booked in Yellowstone County jail on suspicion of assault with a weapon. Both are being held without bail. They have yet to make their initial appearance in court.
The other three people arrested were released after they were questioned by officers, O’Connell said.
Police are continuing to investigate a motive for the shooting. O’Connell would not say whether the shooting was gang or drug related.
St. John said the shooting was not random, and the occupants of both vehicles knew one another.
“I don’t know what is going on or between these people, but what I can tell you is it is definitely not random,” St. John said.
Monday’s shooting is one of a string of shootings that has hit the Billings area.
On Dec. 13, a man was shot near a parking lot on the city’s North Side.
Later that week on Wednesday, a man shot himself in the buttocks after confronting his girlfriend with a handgun.
Early Thursday morning, a homeowner exchanged gunfire with the driver of a pickup truck outside a home in Lockwood.
In the Heights, someone shot up a house in the Lake Elmo Drive area early Nov. 30. Before that, a man was killed and a boy was injured in a shooting on the city’s South Side on Nov. 13.
St. John said detectives are not sure whether any of the recent shootings are connected. He did say the sheer volume of calls and shooting-related cases is not typical for this time of year.
“It’s more like summer for us right now,” St. John said.
The rash of shooting incidents is not new for the department, St. John said. He noted a string of shootings in the late ‘80s in which one person was killed.
“We have seen this before,” St. John said.

description.hltext_display: TAG HEUER - The Winners of “Art of Watchmaking"
description.content:
TAG Heuer and Parsons, The New School for Design, reveal the winners of the “Art of Watchmaking,”.
Press release
TAG Heuer, the leading Swiss luxury watch company, and Parsons The New School for Design today revealed the winners of the “Art of Watchmaking,” a 10-week competition that charged eight teams of Parsons product design students with reinterpreting TAG Heuer’s classic Monaco chronograph. Each member of the three teams will receive a monetary prize and a TAG Heuer timepiece. Additionally, TAG Heuer has the potential to produce one of the first-place designs as a limited-edition piece.
The winners were selected by an illustrious panel of judges that included: Narciso Rodriguez, CFDA award-winning womenswear designer and Parsons alumnus; Renaud Dutreil, Chairman of LVMH North America and New School trustee; Ulrich Wohn, president & CEO of LVMH Watch & Jewelry North America; Marion Fasel, contributing jewelry editor, InStyle magazine; Michael Thompson, editor, International Watch magazine; Rama Chorpash, director of product design, Parsons; and Andre Fortier, vice president of after-sales service, TAG Heuer.
Sera. © TAG Heuer
During the review, each of the student teams showcased three concepts, and discussed their inspiration, target consumer and design philosophy. Ideas ranged from a Monaco with a rotating case to designs inspired by the New York City transportation system. “The students’ enthusiasm for this program was clearly evident in the quality of their designs,” said Wohn. “They truly immersed themselves in the brand and presented ideas that embraced the avant-garde, daring spirit of TAG Heuer. We are inspired by the students’ perspective on luxury timepieces and their unfettered creativity. It’s nice to look at your brand through new eyes.”
First-place honors went to the team of Yong Yi Lee, Yoav Menachem and Amit Ran, whose designs included a sleek, black model with a shield over the watch face and edition numbers to appeal to collectors; second-place honors went to the team of Enrique Diaz Rato de Zabala, Michelle Organ and You Jin Sung, whose designs included a black ceramic timepiece with neon accents; and third-place honors went to the team of Yusuke Sekiguchi, Christopher Beatty and Helen Kim, whose designs included a piece with naturally grown crystals in its dial.
Black Shield. © TAG Heuer
"We partner with industry leaders like TAG Heuer because they provide our students the kind of professional challenges they'll face when they graduate," said Joel Towers, executive dean of Parsons. "These types of projects are integral to design education."
Added Chorpash, "This is a project that is ultimately about constraint. Our students were pushed to think innovatively about the design, while keeping in mind the parameters of the client's design brief and the technical requirements of the manufacturing process."
The partnership and competition—a first for TAG Heuer—began in early September, when TAG Heuer presented the 24 students with a comprehensive overview of the Monaco, which was first introduced in 1969 and shattered the conventional codes of watch design and engineering with the world’s first self-winding automatic chronograph movement and waterproof square case.
Conquest. © TAG Heuer
Under the guidance of faculty members Anna Rabinowicz and Peter Allen, students were charged with creating their own iteration of the Monaco. Many aspects of the timepiece were open to interpretation, including the material choice, color and design of the dial, subdials, hands, indexes and folding buckle. However, students could not alter the distinctive shape of the Monaco’s case, whose clean, geometric lines marked a radical departure from the rounded watch dials of the ’60s and ’70s.
The teams each rendered 100 original concepts, and throughout October and November, narrowed down these initial ideas into three final designs. During this time, students received constructive feedback from TAG Heuer executives during milestone visits, as well as toured the brand’s New Jersey-based facility to experience firsthand the precision and craftsmanship that assembling a luxury watch demands.
TAG Heuer Celebrates 150 Years of Watchmaking Innovation
The year 2010 marks TAG Heuer’s 150th anniversary – a milestone that celebrates the brand’s evolution from a small workshop in the Swiss Jura Mountains to its status today as a leader in the luxury watch market. Since its inception, TAG Heuer has demonstrated a passion for accurately measuring even the smallest increment of time. It is the only watchmaker to develop a mechanical automatic chronograph movement that displays 1/10th, 1/100th and 1/1000th of a second, as well as the only brand to capture 1/10,000th of a second. The brand’s 150-year legacy is peppered with displays of engineering prowess, including the world’s first oscillating pinion, patented in 1887, and the recently launched Monaco V4, which features a double-patented belt-driven movement that shatters the basic tenets of how a watch keeps time. Through a constant pursuit of excellence and innovation, TAG Heuer creates timepieces that are a defining symbol of state-of-the-art originality.
About Parsons The New School for Design
Parsons The New School for Design is one of the most prestigious institutions for art and design education in the world. Based in New York but active around the world, the school offers undergraduate and graduate programs in the full spectrum of design disciplines. Critical thinking and collaboration are at the heart of a Parsons education. A student-centered curriculum allows for both focused and interdisciplinary learning, with unparalleled internship opportunities and industry partnerships laying the groundwork for entrepreneurship and professional success. An integral part of The New School, Parsons builds on the university’s legacy of progressive ideals, scholarship, and pedagogy. Parsons graduates are leaders in their respective fields, with a shared commitment to creatively and critically addressing the complexities of life in the 21st century. For more information, please visit www.newschool.edu/parsons.

description.hltext_display: Wedding: Nicole Erdman and Paul Zerilli
description.content: Edgar Erdman Jr., of Bowleys Quarters; and Lorrie Erdman, of Perry Hall, announce the marriage of their daughter, Nicole Diane Erdman, to Paul Richard Zerilli, son of Mr. and Mrs. Atillio Zerilli, of Hunt Valley, on Nov. 6, 2010, at Corpus Christi Roman Catholic Church, in Baltimore.A reception followed at the Engineers Club of Baltimore.The bride is the granddaughter of the late Mr. and Mrs. Edgar Erdman Sr., of Rosedale, and Mr. and Mrs. Charles Rutkowski, of Perry Hall, who celebrated their 55th wedding anniversary on the same day.The groom is the grandson of Mr. and Mrs. Richard Flynn Sr., of Perry Hall; and Mr. and Mrs. Paolo Zerilli, of Abingdon.The bride is a 2007 graduate of Villa Julie College (now Stevenson University) and is a registered nurse in the pediatric unit at Johns Hopkins Hospital.The groom is a 2001 graduate of Archbishop Curley High School and is the sales/finance manager at Thompson Kia, Fallston.The couple honeymooned in Hawaii and now lives in White Marsh. Follow explorebaltimorecounty.com on TwitterText BALTCO to 70701 to sign up for explorebaltimorecounty.com news alerts

description.hltext_display: رويترز: مردم ايران قانون هدفمندي يارانه‌ها را پذيرفته اند
description.content:
رويترز طي گزارشي از اجراي قانون هدفمندكردن يارانه‌ها در ايران اين قانون را يك جراحي بزرگ اقتصادي دانست و نوشت: مردم ايران اين قانون را پذيرفته اند.به گزارش فارس، رويترز طي گزارشي در مورد اجراي قانون هدفمند كردن يارانه ها در ايران نوشت مردم ايران سه ماه است كه منتظر اعلام برنامه دولت براي قطع تدريجي يارانه انرژي، مواد غذايي، آب، برق و گاز بوده اند و اكنون با بي ميلي اين قانون را پذيرفته اند.اين گزارش افزوده است: بر خلاف سال 2007 كه سهميه بندي بنزين با تنشها و مشكلاتي همراه بود اين بار مشكل خاصي گزارش نشده است و به نظر مي رسد ايراني ها قانون هدفمند كردن يارانه ها را پذيرفته اند.احمدي نژاد در مورد مزاياي اجراي اين قانون گفته است حذف يارانه ها موجب كاهش اتلاف انرژي خواهد شد و اجراي اين قانون سطح عدالت اجتماعي و اقتصادي را ارتقا خواهد داد . دولت مي تواند منابع مالي حاصل از حذف يارانه ها را براي توسعه زير ساختهاي عمراني كشور هزينه كند .بر اساس اين گزارش در عين حال مهمترين نگراني كارشناسان اقتصادي از اجراي اين طرح افزايش نرخ تورم است . يك مرد 56 ساله در اين باره گفت تا زماني كه سيستم حمل و نقل عمومي بهبود پيدا نكند براي اكثر مردم سخت خواهد بود كه از خودروهاي شخصي استفاده نكنند . ولي با قيمتهاي كنوني استفاده از خودروهاي شخصي نيز بسيار سخت خواهد شد .
پيش از اجراي اين قانون قيمت 60 ليتر بنزين سهميه اي 1000 ريال معادل 10 سنت بود و مازاد بر آن ليتري 4000 ريال محاسبه مي شد . اين قيمت با اجراي قانون هدفمندي يارانه ها به 4000 ريال براي بنزين سهميه اي و 7000 ريال براي بنزين آزاد در نظر گرفته شده است .يك مرد 48 ساله نيز گفت كساني كه خودروهاي لوكس وارداتي را سوار مي شوند با اجراي اين قانون هيچ خللي در برنامه هاي آنها وارد نخواهد شد ولي من كه يك كارمند ساده هستم چه كار مي توانم انجام دهم ؟مقامات اقتصادي ايران بارها تاكيد كرده اند در صورتي كه الگوي مصرف را رعايت كنند هزينه هاي آنها در اثر افزايش قيمت ها افزايش چنداني نخواهد داشت و حتي مبالغي از
يارانه هاي نقدي پرداخت شده براي آنها باقي مي ماند.طرح هدفمند كردن يارانه ها سالها است كه در محافل اقتصادي و سياسي ايران مطرح بوده است.رويترز در ادامه گزارش خود نوشته است به نظر مي رسد اعمال تحريم ها عزم دولت ايران را براي اجراي اين قانون بيشتر كرده است اما بي شك اجراي اين قانون جراحي بزرگي در اقتصاد ايران است.

description.hltext_display: 秦晖：经济学的逻辑“预设”
description.content:
一个成功的社会，一个成功的制度，你是慈善家最好，但是，如果你不是慈善家，那么至少我要管住你，不能允许你成为一个强盗
——《经济学与伦理原则分析》系列文章之一
经济思想在西方有一个非常深厚的传统，但是，对于非经济学专业人士来说，要理解西方经济学的基本理念、基本概念是比较不容易的，而且这些概念往往会引起很多误解。
实际上，西方经济学的最根本的一个概念是这种经济学的“预设”。什么是经济学“预设”？就是在经济学的阐述中，一般都会预先假定人是争取最大化的自利的，也就是说，参与经济的人是要谋取自己利益最大化的。这就是“经济人（economic man）”或曰“理性经济人（rational economic man）”预设。
对这个预设，人们就有各种各样的评论。
比如，有些人就说，这个概念说明西方人是主张自私自利的，就是说，西方人是主张性恶论的。有时还进一步说，这是东西方之别：西方讲性恶论，我们中国文化，比如儒家文化，是讲性善论。
有时候又把它说成是主义之别。比如，说资本主义是讲性恶论的，而社会主义是讲性善论的。资本主义是讲利己的，而社会主义是讲利他的。这里头就有交叉了。因为我们知道，所谓社会主义也是从西方传来的一种思想，所以我们不好说社会主义就是东方的，是吧？
但是，不管这些说法是在中西文化之别的意义上，还是在左右之别，也就是社会主义和资本主义两个主义之别的意义上，所谓的性恶论，所谓的自私自利，其实我们基本上讲的是两个意思：一个是事实判断；一个是价值判断。事实判断就是“是怎么样”。价值判断就是“应当怎样”。其实，我们讨论的很多概念都涉及这两个意思。
有些人把“经济人预设”说成是事实判断，就是说人性皆恶，人都是自私自利的。于是他们就批判说，这个说法不对嘛，比如说有雷锋同志嘛，比如说还有很多很多的好人，是吧？他们都不是自私自利的嘛。
的确，如果把这个“预设”当作一种事实判断，那么现实中有很多高尚的人和高尚的行为就可以成为反驳的论据，因为相反的事实明明是存在的嘛。很多人都这样讲，说西方经济学把所有的人都设想为自私的，这是错的。甚至不光是在经济学领域，前几年有一位朋友，是一个所谓的“新左派”。他编了一部很有名很火爆的剧本，叫做《格瓦拉》。这部火爆的剧中有一个镜头，就是几个像女妖精一样的“美帝国主义者”，穿着奇形怪状的衣服，一出来嘴里就大喊大叫说：“人不为己，天诛地灭！”“人不为己，天诛地灭！”
据说美帝国主义就是这样的。可是老实说，我还真不知道西方哪个思想家或者是什么人曾经讲过这句话。我们都知道“人不为己，天诛地灭”，恰恰是中国传统时代的一句谚语。而在西方文献中，至少就我知道的范围内，还没有听说哪个有名的思想家或者哪个人说过，人不为己会遭到，或者应该遭到“天诛地灭”。但是，这些人就说，西方人就是主张“人不为己天诛地灭”，那么这是事实判断。
再说价值判断。价值判断就是说应该如何。事实判断是说，他们认为西方人说人都是自私的，这是个事实。而价值判断就是说，人应该是自私的。似乎如果你不自私，你就会被西方人认为是大傻帽，或者是受到贬斥。
也就是说，第一，人都是自私的，这是个事实判断；第二，人也应该是自私的，这是个价值判断。这些人说，“西方经济学”所谓的经济人预设就是这么回事。
因此他们就做了两种批判。第一是事实批判，人不都是自私的，比如说有雷锋等等；第二是价值批判，人也不应该是自私的。比如他们就说，大公无私如何高尚，如何值得提倡，为他人着想，为集体献身是多么的伟大，宣扬自私自利是多么的不好等等。这些年来经常有人宣称，“西方经济学”解释不了南街村、华西村这类“奇迹”，理由也是那里的人据说不自私，并且提倡利他为公。我们还经常听到有人说，他创建了什么什么理论或体系，“从根本上推翻了”西方经济学的那一套。你去一看，其实还是说他从事实和价值这两个方面推翻了这个“预设”。
经济人预设并非事实判断 更非价值判断
但是，我觉得像这样的两种批评，是不是有点找错了目标呢？所谓的经济人预设真的是这样一种事实判断或者是价值判断吗？其实，这个预设它不过是一个逻辑，提问的逻辑前提。它既不是一种对事实的描述，更不是一种提倡，对价值的提倡。
这个经济人预设是什么意思呢？其实在西方的经济学中，所谓经济人预设就是，一个能够正常运行的或者说合理运行的制度，必须假设人是会自私的。我要从这个假设出发，就是说把它作为基本的约束条件，来设计我的一系列制度安排和游戏规则。
为什么要这样设定呢？其实这个道理，我们中国人和其他民族一样，都非常理解。用我们中国的一句俗话叫做，“先小人后君子”，或“亲兄弟明算账”。在制度设计上，你一定要从人有可能做小人出发。这样设计出来的制度，如果你事实上是君子，那当然更好。但绝不是说，如果你不是君子那就乱套了。如果你事实上是君子，整天想着为别人为大家做好事，那咱们求之不得。但假如你做不到，那么，这种制度也可以使你的利己行为不至于损害别人，使你的利己行为在整体上有助于提高社会的总福利。
所谓“亲兄弟明算账”也是这么回事。“亲兄弟明算账”的意思大家都知道，不是要鼓励大家六亲不认，而是说，要把账算在明处，就不至于发生不愉快的事。互相帮忙，亲兄弟的感情，完全可以存在，而且再好不过，但是，假如亲兄弟们的感情出了问题，那么，明算账也可以做到使他们不至于反目成仇。
明算账就做不成亲兄弟了么？或者说就不提倡做亲兄弟吗？当然不是这样。可是，我们进行制度设计，不能预先假定你是圣人，把所有的宝都押在你的身上，把所有的资源都交给你，相信你大公无私，会分配的很好。我们不能这样做的。我们不能押这种宝，因为事实证明，这样押宝往往是有问题的。
大概不会有人说，毛泽东是一个西方文明的代表。而且，据说毛泽东是个理想主义者。但是，就是毛泽东自己曾经讲过一句很有名的话：“一个人做点好事并不难，难的是一辈子做好事，不做坏事，这才是最难最难的啊。”毛泽东都这样讲，那么，我们设计一种制度时，能不考虑这一点吗？我们能够假设，所有的人都是做好事的，而且一个人在他一辈子中都是做好事的吗？毛泽东自己都讲，这是最难最难的。所谓最难最难的，不是说没有人做到，也不是说不该做到，而是说，我们不能把宝押在这上面。
讲的简单一点就是，一个成功的社会，一个成功的制度，你是慈善家最好，但是，如果你不是慈善家，那么至少我要管住你，不能允许你成为一个强盗。那么，我不能允许你成为强盗，但是，我又不能假设你肯定就是一个慈善家，那么这个制度安排应该以什么为基准呢？
大家可以想象，那就是交换。比如说，我想从你那里得到好处，我不能假定你是一个慈善家，会无偿的给我提供好处，但是，我也不能做强盗来抢你，那怎么办呢？很简单嘛，你给我好处，我也给你好处，这就是所谓的交换。交换不是说，你就不能当慈善家了，而是说，即使你不当慈善家，我们这个社会也能运作。
亚当•斯密和密尔所讲的“经济人”
关于这一点，西方经济学在一提出“经济人”这个概念的时候就已经很明确。大家知道，所谓“经济人”这个概念，有人说是起源于亚当•斯密，因为亚当•斯密在《国富论》中曾经提到，我们现在可以享受到饮食，可以穿到衣服，但是，这并不是因为那些厨师或者那些裁缝们大公无私，诚心的要给我们做什么奉献，其实这些厨师、裁缝，他们想的也不过就是自己赚钱。但是，由于有了市场交易，厨师和裁缝，他们即使本意只是为了自己，但是我们也通过这些行为获得了好处。比如说，穿衣吃饭的便利，这就是所谓的经济人预设。
但是，亚当•斯密并没有讲，这些厨师、裁缝，就不可能有为他人着想的可能。他更没有说，如果他们这样想了，我们反而会吃不上饭，没有衣服穿了。他并没有这样讲。他只是说，由于有了这样的交换，即使他为自己考虑，我们也可以得到服务。这就是非常典型的“先小人后君子”。
但是，亚当•斯密这样讲的时候并没有用 economic man这个词，就是“经济人”这个词。经济人这个词最早使用的是约翰•密尔，严复把他译成穆勒，约翰•密尔在1836年的《政治经济学定义及研究这门学问的哲学方法》这篇文章中，第一次提出“经济人”这个术语。
密尔就明确地说，经济学以人会利己作为预设，但这仅仅是一种假设、一种抽象，而不是对人事实上是什么所做的论断，更不是对人应当做什么的一种回答。他说：“没有一个政治经济学家如此荒谬地认为人事实上就是如此（自私）的”。也就是说，经济学家不会荒谬到认为所有的人都不会利他，都不会利公，都是自私自利的。但是，他说，假设是这门科学研究的必要方法。而我们只能做这样的假设，相反的假设是行不通的。
这里我要讲，的确是这样，西方经济学中的确没有一种事实判断，说所有的人都是性恶的。所谓的性恶论，的确在西方文明中有一些说法，但和经济学无关。比如说基督教义中的“原罪”说就被一些人说成是性恶论，因为人类祖先亚当和夏娃偷吃禁果，所以在上帝面前人们都有原罪。无论你是否相信这种说法，但这说的是神人关系，和人际关系中的自私自利并不是一回事，更与“人不为己天诛地灭”毫不沾边，亚当夏娃恰恰是因为偷吃禁果（可以近似地说是自私吧）被上帝赶出伊甸园的，如果不这样，他们还在那乐园里享受上帝的恩宠呢。怎么说不偷吃禁果，上帝就会诛灭他们？这不是胡扯吗？恰恰相反，基督教的一个特征就是教人整天为自己的“原罪”而忏悔，这明明是一种反省的说法，它倡导的不是纵欲，而是自律、克制乃至禁欲。与宋儒说的“存天理、灭人欲”差不多。你不信教，不忏悔也罢，总不能反过来说人家提倡自私自利吧？
还有我们经常提到的霍布斯，如果讲西方的性恶论，霍布斯是被提到的最多的、最典型的代表。霍布斯有一句话叫做，“人对于人是狼”。意思就是，人与人之间都是竞争的关系。但是，我们说的经济人预设和人对于人是狼的这种说法是一样的吗？当然不一样了。道理很简单，人们从来没有见过狼群中有什么市场的，人们更不能指望狼和羊去进行交易。
恰恰相反，从这个狼群中的规则中倒是可以推出“计划经济”的。大家知道，现实中的狼群经常是有一个头狼的。很多动物都是这样。这个头狼可以分配一切，包括配偶。你不能跟他讨价还价。往往这个头狼可以垄断交配权，别的公狼除非寻机向它挑战，取而代之，就都只能“打光棍”。但是，从经济人预设推出来的是这样一种东西吗？
秦晖为清华大学人文社会科学学院教授
上一篇: 秦晖：中国要崛起 中国模式不应崛起
下一篇: 秦晖：学习西方的“社会主义”

가족을 상대로한 강력 범죄가 끊이지 않고 있다.
지난 21일에는 경기도 광주에서 아버지가 간질을 앓고 있던 아들을 둔기로 때려 숨기게 하는 사건이 일어났다. 경찰 조사 결과 최모(67)씨는 "부모에게 난동을 부리는 아들이 없어져야 집안이 편하겠다는 생각이 들어 1개월 전부터 범행을 생각해 왔다"고 밝혔다. 최씨는 아들을 살해한 후 자신도 목숨을 끊으려 했지만 미수에 그쳤으며, 외출하고 돌아온 아내의 신고에 의해 경찰에 붙잡혔다.
18일에는 천안에 사는 김모(27)씨가 컴퓨터 게임에 빠져 자신의 2살난 아들을 살해하는 사건이 일어났다.김모(27)씨는 평소에도 컴퓨터 게임에 빠져 자신의 아이를 제대로 돌보지 않은 것으로 드러났다. 이날도 게임을 하던 중 "어린 아들이 대소변을 가리지 못한다"며 폭행한뒤 목졸라 살해했다.
지난 12일에는 서울 석관동에 사는 김모(37)씨가 자신에게 잔소리하는 아버지를 망치로 때리는 범죄를 저질렀다.경찰 조사결과 김씨는 6년전 일자리를 잃고 대부분의 시간을 집에서 보내면서 아버지와 사소한 일로 자주 다툼을 벌인 것으로 드러났다.
[뉴스속보부]

description.hltext_display: Thanks for all your assistance on ice rink
description.content:
The Kingfield Recreation Department would like to thank Dwayne Luce, Bill Swain, Rob Woodhouse and Dave Hart who spent a whole day setting up the ice rink last week. And thanks also to all the volunteers who helped the fire department and Alan Stewart fill it with water. We would also like to thank Doug Marble who helped pull this project together in its final stages.

description.hltext_display: ULYSSE NARDIN - First US Boutique Opens with Fanfare
description.content:
Ulysse Nardin opened its first USA Boutique amongst huge fanfare with more than 400 guests in attendance, including local politicians, entrepreneurs, watch collectors and baseball legend, Randy Johnson.
Roberta Naas
Rolf Schnyder, founder and owner of Ulysse Nardin, flew in from Switzerland to Boca Raton, Florida, for the opening of the United States’s first Ulysse Nardin Boutique at the very upscale Town Center Mall. Both the boutique and the opening are representative of the Ulysse Nardin style: the festivities surrounding the event ran the gamut from a champagne reception, to mimes, top-shelf vodka and caviar, a charity auction, a celebrity presence, and a display of some of the brand’s best watches.
The boutique was opened during a ribbon-cutting ceremony by: (l ot r) Patrik Hoffmann (UN), Bobby Yampolsky (East Coast Jewelry), Susan Whelchel (mayor of Boca Raton), baseball player Randy Johnson, and Rolf Schnyder (UN) © Worldtempus / Roberta Naas
The boutique – operated by retailer Bobby Yampolsky of East Coast Jewelry – is a stunning example of the brand’s flagship colors (dark burl wood, gold, rich nautical blue), porthole nautical look, and upscale appeal. The ceiling even boasts a stunning blue crystal compass-inspired light.
“The idea is about brand identity and giving customers a good selection to really see the Ulysse Nardin breadth,” says Schnyder. “We are partners with our retailers and are not operating separately from them.”
The store offers a complete selection of more than 80 of the brand’s best timepieces, and on display at the opening were some of the most iconic Ulysse Nardin watches, including the Jaquemarts, the Moonstruck astronomical watch, and a grand selection of various Freaks – including the Diavolo – which celebrates its tenth anniversary in 2011. A gold Freak Anniversary watch ($140,000) was on hand, as were three models from the Limited Edition Boutique line and a host of the newest Ladies’ Caprice models.
More than 80 of Ulysse Nardin’s timepieces can be seen and felt in the new boutique © Worldtempus / Roberta Naas
A highlight of the store is a corner watchmaking and servicing center, visible though a glass window.
“One of the reasons we selected Boca Raton for our first Boutique opening is the proximity to our headquarters here in Florida, and to reintroduce the watchmaking craft to South Florida,” says Patrik Hoffmann, vice president of sales and marketing worldwide for Ulysse Nardin and head of Ulysse Nardin North America.
The opening of the boutique was a grand occasion, with the ribbon-cutting ceremony attended not only by Schnyder and Hoffman, but also by baseball legend Randy Johnson, a “friend” of the Ulysse Nardin brand. Johnson mingled throughout the crowd for the entire evening, discussing his watch collection and extolling the virtues of Ulysse Nardin. The brand also auctioned off a special timepiece made for the occasion that night, with all proceeds going locally to the Boca Raton Regional Hospital Foundation.
A well-lit watchmaker’s bench in the new boutique in Boca Raton © Worldtempus / Roberta Naas
The opening of the US boutique marks the fourteenth Ulysse Nardin monobrand store worldwide. The most recent opening prior to this took place a few weeks ago in Russia, where Ulysse Nardin made a grand splash with its choice of celebrity appearances: the notorious Anna Chapman. In a fairly tale-like setting, with white horses and a carriage, Chapman arrived at the Nikolskaya Street boutique in front of international press. The charity focus for that event was “children in need in Russia.”
“It was a great moment for me to have her there, get international attention, and serve a great cause,” says Schnyder.
Plans are underway for more boutiques next year, but first, the brand has announced its intentions of soon opening a new US office in Boca Raton with 7,000 square feet and ten in-house watchmakers.

구제역이 전국으로 확산되자 정부가 예방백신 접종이라는 비상 대책을 내놓았다.
정부는 경북 안동에서 시작된 구제역이 경기에 이어 강원 지역으로까지 확대됨에 따라 구제역 대책의 `마지막 수단`인 예방백신을 접종키로 내부 방침을 정한 것으로 22일 알려졌다.
정부의 고위관계자는 이날 "구제역 사태가 심각한 상황으로 치닫고 있어 정부 내부에서는 구제역 예방백신을 접종하기로 내부 결론이 났다"고 밝혔다.
이 관계자는 그러나 "예방백신의 접종 범위 등에 대해선 아직 확정되지 않았다"면서 "오늘 오후 4시 농림수산식품부가 주관하는 긴급 가축방역협의회에서 구체적인범위가 정해질 것으로 안다"고 덧붙였다.

description.hltext_display: Analyst Interviews: Semiconductor Industry Outlook
Nyílt forrású videócsatornát indított a Google a YouTube-on
description.author: Sting
description.content:
A Google hétfőn jelentette be, hogy hivatalos csatornát hozott létre videómegosztó oldalán, a YouTube-on Open Source Programs Office (OSPO) irodája számára. Az új csatorna célja a Google a nyílt forrással kapcsolatos törekvéseivel kapcsolatos videók összefogása és egy helyen kínálása a téma iránt érdeklődő webezők számára.
A csatorna nem csak a jövőben megjelenő videóanyagoknak ad otthont, de a Google folyamatosan viszi fel bele a már múltban publikált, de a témába vágó videókat is bele. Így például már külön lejátszási listában tekinthetők meg a Google Tech Talks a nyílt forrással kapcsolatos epizódjai, de a Geek Time sorozat a szabadszoftverekkel kapcsolatos felvételei is listába rendszerezve várják már az érdeklődőket.
A Google saját projektei közül a Chrome böngészővel, a Chromium OS operációs rendszerrel, valamint az Androiddal kapcsolatos videók találhatnak majd otthonra az új csatornán, lévén ezek képezik a keresőóriás nyílt forrású zászlóshajóit.

description.hltext_display: Az Internet Explorert fogja másolni a következő Firefox
description.author: Sting
description.content:
Alig két héttel azt követően, hogy a Microsoft nyilvánosságra hozta: Track Protection néven egy a felhasználók webes követésének megakadályozását lehetővé tevő technológiát fog böngészője következő kiadásába építeni, a Mozilla is bejelentette, hogy egy ugyanilyen fícsört fog a Firefox következő verziójába integrálni. Az angolul "do not track" (azaz a követést megtiltó) névvel illetett funkció terén így a Firefox 4 gyakorlatilag az Internet Explorert fogja másolni.
Az gyakorlatilag biztosra vehető, hogy az új funkció a Firefox 4 első kiadásába még nem fog bekerülni, de Gary Kovács, a Mozilla új elnöke azt ígérte, hogy még a jövő év első felében megjelenik az új böngésző egy olyan frissítése, amely már ezt a fejlesztést is tartalmazni fogja.
Az Internet Explorer előzetese ugyan a Microsoft demonstrációja alapján mást most tartalmazza ezt a funkciót, mivel azonban az új böngésző kiadásra jelölt változatának megjelenése szintén csak a jövő év első felében lesz várható, ezért érdekes lesz látni, hogy végül is a két rivális közül melyiknek sikerül majd az új technológiát elsőként a felhasználók kezébe adnia.
A kérdés ezek után már csak az, hogy a Google és az Apple vajon mikor csatlakozik a két nagyhoz és jelentik be ők is, hogy böngészőik valamely elkövetkező kiadásába egy forradalmi újdonságot terveznek bevezetni, amely lehetővé teszi majd a felhasználók számára a webes nyomkövetés kivédését.

description.hltext_display: Interest in genealogy led to Catonsville cemetery
description.content:
Michele Miller's interest in genealogies began when she had to create her family tree as part of a middle school project.
Talking to her grandfather about her family's history sparked a lifelong interest in the topic, said Miller, 46, who lived in Catonsville until 1984.
She said she remembers participating in the 1976 renovation of Salem Evangelical Lutheran Church on 905 Frederick Road and doing tombstone rubbings in the church cemetery.
Now a Towson resident, Miller never acted on her interest of genealogy for years, she said.
In 1997, her husband, James, gave her a computer program that allowed her to more easily keep her family tree on her computer, she said.
Her hobby has led to "Salem Evangelical Lutheran Church Cemetery," a record book printed in September designed to facilitate genealogical research.
Below, Miller talks about her love of genealogy, the writing process and the book's appeal:
Why did you pick this topic?
"I spend a lot of my free time trying to research my lines and research my ancestors, none of whom are at Salem Evangelical Lutheran Church cemetery.
"The cemetery has been there since 1849 and records have been more or less kept, but there is no single source of information for all the burials. I thought it would be interesting to have a complete listing of all the burials as far as we can tell.
"There is all this history and all this information, and no one was documenting anything."
How long did this project take?
"In 1998, I took pictures of all the tombstones in the cemetery before it got all eroded and faded away.
"Part of that was documenting what was on the stones, and a lot of it was in German.
"It started from there. I thought, 'We should really have a cemetery book and raise money for the church.'
"I would say the majority of the work, typing and all the things that went into putting the book together, I did this past summer, the summer before that and the year in between.
"A lot of it was done in those two summers because I have them off because I'm a (preschool teacher at Ascension Lutheran Nursery School and Kindergarten, in Towson).
"The number of hours varied widely. I actually took the computer to work and did work while on breaks and things.
"It took a lot of research."
What is the target audience of this book?
"I think it will appeal to people who are interested in the history of Salem Evangelical Lutheran Church.
"More so, it will appeal to the people who have relatives buried there or who know people who are buried there.
"Hopefully, people will find it useful and use it to research their family tree."
By Brian Conlinbconlin@patuxent.com

description.hltext_display: Afghan official calls on NATO restraint following 5 civilian deaths in southern battle
description.author: Tarek El-Tablawy
description.content:
KABUL - A provincial governor in Afghanistan said Wednesday that a battle between NATO and the Taliban the previous day had killed three women and two children, and called on the coalition to "pay attention" to civilian casualties.
Afghan officials have often spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.
Also Wednesday, NATO said that a leader of the Haqqani network ? militants who operate out of western Pakistan and eastern Afghanistan ? was killed in a Dec. 18 operation grouping international forces and their Afghan counterparts in the eastern Khost province.
In Helmand, a Taliban stronghold and scene of some of the heaviest fighting in the nearly ten-year-old war, the provincial governor's office said that the five civilians died Tuesday as militants attacked coalition forces in the Sangin district. Seven insurgents were killed in the battle, according to the statement from the governor's office.
NATO has said it was investigating the civilian fatalities and that it exercises the utmost caution during operations to minimize such occurrences. The coalition said Tuesday that insurgents were using a civilian home to attack its forces and that the insurgents launched their attack with assault rifles and a machine-gun. NATO troops returned fire and used mortars.
A U.N. report this month said that Afghan civilian casualties increased by 20 per cent in the first 10 months of 2010, compared with the same period a year earlier. It said there were at least 6,215 conflict-related civilian casualties ? 2,412 deaths and 3,803 injuries.
But the U.N. report also found that civilian casualties attributed to NATO and pro-government forces dropped by 18 per cent compared to the first 10 months of 2009.
The governor's office said it wants NATO "to pay attention to civilian causalities during operations and prevent civilian causalities."
In the operation in Khost province, NATO said intelligence reports led international and Afghan troops to a compound in the Terezai district where an ensuing gun battle killed the Haqqani network leader, identified as Usman, along with an unspecified number of insurgents. NATO said Usman had co-ordinated and conducted attacks on its forces in Khost.
The Haqqani network is among militant groups that have hideouts in neighbouring Pakistan from where they attack targets inside Afghanistan. U.S. officials have urged Pakistan to launch an offensive on the North Waziristan area where these groups are based, but Islamabad has rebuffed such requests, saying its forces are stretched too thin for such an operation without drawing down troops facing its archrival, India.

전북 전주시에 사는 80대 할머니가 2년간 자녀가 준 용돈 100만원을 한 노인요양시설에 기부해 화제다.
경남 산청군 산청읍에 있는 한센노인요양시설인 성심원(원장 이건주 수사)은 21일 오후 도착한 등기우편 속에 100만원짜리 수표 한장과 함께 편지를 받았다고 22일 밝혔다.
편지에는 `2011년 새해는 봉사하시는 수사, 수녀님들과 형제 자매님들의 영육(영혼과 육체) 건강을 바란다`는 내용이 적혀 있었다.
성심원 측은 고마운 마음을 전하려 우편물에 적힌 주소를 수소문해 겨우 연락이 닿았으나 끝내 할머니는 이름을 밝히지 않았다고 전했다.
할머니는 "1960년대 성당에서 우연히 한센인들의 어려운 처지를 듣고 그때부터 성심원과 인연을 맺으며 주위 이웃들과 함께 후원금품을 전달하며 인연을 이어왔다"는 말을 덧붙였다.
할머니는 "남편을 사별하고 나이가 들면서 자신도 의탁하는 처지가 돼 후원하지 못했다. 약소해 미안하다"란 말도 했다고 한다.
이건주(레미지오) 수사는 "이름을 알리지 않은 채 사회에서 소외받은 한센 병력 어르신들이 자신의 용돈은 아껴 모은 돈을 기부받은 것은 이번이 처음"이라며 "세상의 어둠을 밝히는 양초같은 소중한 성금을 한센인들을 위해 유익하게 사용하겠다"고 말했다.
[뉴스속보부]

description.hltext_display: بستني ايراني آمريکا را به چالش کشيد!
description.content: يک روزنامه غربي در گزارشي با اشاره به کاهش نفوذ آمريکا در عراق و تاسيس يک بستني فروشي ايراني در قلب منطقه سبز بغداد نوشت که اين مسئله چالشي کوچک اما نمادين براي آمريکا است.به گزارش خبرگزاري مهر به نقل از واشنگتن پست، يک بستني فروشي ايراني در قلب منطقه سبز بغداد در نزديکي بزرگترين سفارت آمريکا در جهان بزودي تاسيس مي شود که چالشي کوچک اما نمادين براي نفوذ رو به کاهش آمريکا در عراق است.در همين حال "علي حازم حيدري" يک مغازه دار عراقي گفت که شعبه جديدي از "آيس پک" ايراني که با "فست فود" هاي آمريکا در جهان رقابت مي کند، در ماه ژانويه در بغداد تاسيس مي شود. ساختمانهاي اين فروشگاه ايراني در حال ساخت است اما هنگام تاسيس آن به مشتريان امکان انتخاب 34 طعم بستني را مي دهد.اين روزنامه آمريکايي در ادامه اين گزارش به کاهش نفوذ ايالات متحده در عراق همزمان با آمادگي نيروهاي اين کشور براي خروج از عراق اذعان مي کند. واشنگتن پست مدعي مي شود که در فرايند طولاني مدت تشکيل دولت عراق اين ايران نه آمريکا بود که با حل و فصل در جريان مذاکرات و با اعمال فشار عليه "مقتدي صدر" براي پذيرش دور دوم دوران نخست وزيري "نوري المالکي" باعث شد تا وي به عنوان نخست وزير عراق انتخاب شود.واشنگتن پست در اين گزارش مي نويسد: ايران در عراق از اهرم خود استفاده مي کند و آمريکا از اين موضوع خرسند نيست زيرا از نفوذ ايالات متحده در اين کشور کاسته شده است. اين روزنامه آمريکايي در ادامه به سفرهاي زيارتي همه ساله صدها هزار ايراني از مکان هاي مقدس عراق اشاره مي کند.به نوشته اين روزنامه آمريکايي، درحالي‌که بزودي يک مجموعه زنجيره اي ايراني در سراسر عراق تاسيس مي شود، هيچ برنامه اي براي تاسيس شعبه هاي "مک دونالد"، "استارباکس"، "برگر کينگ" يا هر فست فود فروشي شعبه آمريکا در بغداد وجود ندارد، اين درحالي‌است که شعبات زيادي از اين رستوران هاي زنجيره اي در بيشتر کشورهاي منطقه موجود است.واشنگتن پست در حالي به کاهش نفوذ آمريکا اذعان مي کند که پس از عقب نشيني نيروهاي جنگي اين کشور از عراق در 30 آگوست شمار نظاميان آمريکايي در حال حاضر به 50 هزار نفر کاهش يافته است. طبق توافقنامه امنيتي بغداد و واشنگتن تمامي نظاميان آمريکايي حاضر در عراق بايد تا آخر سال 2011 از عراق خارج شوند.

description.hltext_display: Plan to move waste rock for its gold now scrapped
description.content:
BILLINGS — Transportation officials have pulled the plug on a controversial proposal to haul gold-laden mine waste from a reclamation project near Yellowstone National Park over Wyoming’s Chief Joseph Scenic Highway and on to the Golden Sunlight Mine in Whitehall for processing.
The Montana Department of Environmental Quality announced the decision Tuesday, saying new requirements by the Wyoming Department of Transportation that would have required loads smaller than what they initially planned made the cost of the hauling prohibitive. The Shoshone National Forest also suggested that environmental reviews may be required, which could have delayed this summer’s hauling, said Richard Opper, DEQ director.
Instead, the DEQ will expand an existing dump site near Cooke City, even though the agency previously said the site couldn’t safely accommodate the additional material.
“We had our engineers take another look at the existing depository and other areas near the site,” Opper said. “We can excavate the existing depository site deeper. What you sacrifice is some of the separation of the waste from the ground water.
“So we’re sacrificing a little of the safety factor, but we’re still within our comfort level of being safe,” he added.
The project had proposed moving 69,000 tons of mine waste to Whitehall using tractor-trailer rigs over the next three summers. The rigs would have hauled 38 to 42 tons per trip. The other 500,000 tons of tailings, about 237,000 cubic yards, would be stored at the depository near Cooke City.
Wyoming officials were worried about the trucks’ route up and over the steep and winding Dead Indian Pass, which climbs to 8,400 feet. Although going through Yellowstone National Park would be a shorter route, commercial haul vehicles aren’t allowed in the park.
“Really, the primary change that made us reconsider this project is when the Wyoming Department of Transportation said it would revise the gross vehicle weight allowed,” Opper said. “That made the project uneconomical.”
Cody Beers, of the Wyoming Department of Transportation’s District 5, said halting the project was probably a good idea. He noted that after the project was announced, a DEQ meeting held in November in Cody, Wyo., drew public criticism of the proposal.
“It’s good they listened because the public spoke out that night,” Beers said.
He added that WYDOT couldn’t keep the DEQ trucks from hauling, but they could require them to haul the legal limit — 117,000 pounds, which includes the weight of the truck and trailer.
The $24 million McLaren tailings reclamation project began in June and will remove a source of heavy metals contamination leaching into Soda Butte Creek. The creek flows into Yellowstone National Park’s Lamar River. It is the largest abandoned mine project to date in Montana. Funding is from a grant from the Federal Office of Surface Mining Control, Reclamation and Enforcement.
The hauling project would have created an estimated 50 jobs, many of them for Montana and Wyoming truck drivers. Gold that was recovered from the mine tailings would have been used to pay for the hauling. DEQ estimated it was a break-even job.
“This was a pretty innovative idea,” Opper said. “It would have recycled the gold, but it also would have taken more driving and more diesel fuel.
“The important thing, as far as we’re concerned, is we need to clean up the site.”

director, Montana Department of Environmental Quality

description.hltext_display: Afghan official calls on NATO to exert caution after death of 5 civilians in fighting in south
description.content:
KABUL - An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: สุดติ่ง! 'เมสซี' ปะทะแข้ง 'โรนัลโด' อุ่นเครื่องทีมชาติ
description.content: "ลีโอเนล เมสซี" จะได้ดวลแข้งกับ "คริสเตียโน โรนัลโด" ในเกมกระชับมิตร ระหว่าง "อาร์เจนตินา" กับ "โปรตุเกส" ที่สนามเอมิเรตส์ สเตเดียม เดือนก.พ.ปีหน้า...� สำนักข่าวต่างประเทศ รายงานวันที่ 22 ธ.ค.ว่า "ฟ้าขาว" อาร์เจนตินา และ� "ฝอยทอง" โปรตุเกส จะลงเตะอุ่นเครื่องทีมชาติกันที่สนามเอมิเรตส์ สเตเดียม ของอาร์เซนอล ในวันที่ 9 ก.พ.ปีหน้าเกมนี้แฟนบอลจะได้เห็นการปะทะแข้งกันของสองสตาร์ดังของโลก อย่าง ลีโอเนล เมสซี ของอาร์เจนตินา และ คริสเตียโน โรนัลโด ของโปรตุเกส ถือเป็นการมาเยือนกรุงลอนดอนเหนือเร็วกว่ากำหนดของเมสซี ในฐานะที่บาร์เซโลนา ต้นสังกัดของนักเตะ จะบุกมาเยือนอาร์เซนอล ในศึกแชมเปียนส์ ลีก วันที่ 19 ก.พ.ปีหน้า อย่างไรก็ตาม ทั้งสองชาติเคยลงเตะที่สนามดังกล่าวเพียงครั้งเดียวก่อนหน้านี้ โดยอาร์เจนตินาแพ้บราซิล 0-3 ในปี 2006 ขณะที่โปรตุเกสชนะบราซิล 2-0 เมื่อเดือนก.พ. 2007นอกจากนั้น เกมนี้ยังคงมีสตาร์ดังร่วมทัพคับคั่ง โดย คาร์ลอส เตเบซ ของแมนฯซิตี้ และฮาเวียร์ มาสเคราโน ของบาร์ซา อาจมีชื่อเล่นให้กับทีมฟ้าขาว ส่วน โชเซ โบซิงวา, นานี, ริคาร์โด คาร์วัลโญ และราอูล เมเรเลส อาจลงเล่นให้ โปรตุเกส

description.hltext_display: PerÃº: GarcÃ­a promulga ley de libertad religiosa
description.content:
LIMA - El presidente Alan García promulgó el lunes la Ley de Libertad Religiosa por la que el Estado reconoce los mismos derechos, obligaciones y beneficios a todas las confesiones.
Según el mandatario, la ley es transcendental y necesaria para la democracia.
La norma establece que las entidades religiosas gocen de las donaciones y los beneficios tributarios existentes en la actualidad, siempre que cumplan con el ordenamiento jurídico nacional. Hasta ahora ese privilegio había sido exclusivo de la Iglesia Católica.
"Quería dar una trascendencia especial a la promulgación de esta ley por la importancia que tiene para la democracia y para la libertad y porque significa que cualquier residuo de intolerancia que subsistiera dentro de nuestro país pase a ser ilegal. El Estado trata con igualdad a todas las confesiones y credos", sostuvo García en un acto público en Palacio de Gobierno.
El jefe de Estado expresó además su agradecimiento a la Conferencia Episcopal Peruana, que reúne a todos los obispos católicos del país, por no haber manifestado objeciones a la nueva norma.
La ley también establece que el curso de religión en los colegios públicos no es obligatorio sino opcional, pudiendo un alumno exonerarse de tomarlo en razón de sus convicciones religiosas sin que se vea afectada su calificación académica.
En los colegios estatales se imparte el curso de religión católica.

description.hltext_display: Fed up with apathetic service? Robot waiters are the answer for disgruntled diners in China
description.content: FILE - In this Dec. 14, 2010 file photo, employees refill a robot waiter serving portions of snacks and sauces at a restaurant in Jinan, in eastern China's Shandong province. The restaurant, which opened earlier this month, is touted as China's first robot hotpot eatery. Service with a smile also comes with an electronic voice at the Dalu Robot restaurant, where the hotpot meals are not as famous yet as the staff who never lose their patience and never take tips. (AP Photo, File) CHINA OUT

지난해 우리나라 국민은 국내 소설보다 외국 소설을 더 많이 읽은 것으로 나타났다.
22일 한국문화예술위원회가 펴낸 `2010 문예연감`에 따르면 2009년 국립중앙도서관에 납본된 1812종의 외국문학 번역물 가운데 소설이 1254종으로 가장 많았고, 그다음이 산문 414종, 희곡 75종, 시 35종 순으로 집계됐다.
지난해 국내에서 새로 나온 소설 단행본이 모두 2231종임을 감안하면 외국 소설이 전체의 56.2%를 차지해 우리 국민이 국내 소설보다 외국 소설을 더 많이 읽는 것으로 분석됐다.
나라별 출판 현황은 일본 서적이 4403종으로 가장 많이 번역됐고, 미국(3746종), 영국(969종), 프랑스(542종), 독일(500종), 중국(376종), 이탈리아(155종), 동유럽(133종), 오세아니아(100종) 등이 그 뒤를 이었다.

description.hltext_display: Netizens asked to vote yes or forget it
description.content:
XIAMEN, Fujian - Netizens have been forced to say they were satisfied with at least half of the government departments in Putian city, in East China's Fujian province, or have their voting rights canceled.
The government of Putian launched an online poll which ran from Dec 1 to Monday to find out whether the public was satisfied with its 79 departments.
But netizens soon found they had to select "satisfied" or "agreeable" for at least half of the departments, because if they voted "dissatisfied" for a majority of the departments, a window would pop up on the official website, saying "Your voting does not meet the requirement".
A micro-blogger wrote about the pop-up window on Monday and the news quickly spread over the Internet. More than 140 news outlets then published the story.
A local official admitted to China Daily that the poll "does have some problems and we are trying to improve it".
The official explained that the "50 percent requirement" is to protect the poll from being abused due to intense competition between departments. In earlier polls, some departments had organized staff members to vote "dissatisfied" about all the other departments.
"But our original intention of canvassing public opinion was good. We just need to find a better way to do it and we are exploring that," the official said, adding that the poll result had not come out.
This is not the first case of governments launching questionable online polls.
In November 2010, the government of Yongji county in Northeast China's Jilin province only provided two options "satisfied" and "very satisfied" in an online poll.
Although a local official later explained that the options had been a practical joke perpetrated by hackers, the poll still upset thousands of netizens who dubbed it the "poll of absolutely satisfied".
According to a report released by the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences (CASS) in 2009, nearly half of all governmental websites in 43 major cities in China were functioning poorly.
The report found some websites do not update information, or only provide information if people register personal details and explain why they want the information and what they intend to do with it.
"Some government online satisfaction polls lack integrity. They are supposed to be used to collect diverse public opinions and improve the standard of government work instead of gaining praise by rigging the process," said Lu Yanbin, a researcher for CASS's Institute of Law and the lead writer of the 2009 report.
"Actually the riggers do nothing but disappoint the public."
He said governments should allow people to choose what information they want and should provide enough details, including work plans and reports, which the public can refer to.
"The point is the government should accept criticism with an open mind," said Lu.

description.hltext_display: سلام فياض: تولد كشور مستقل فلسطين نزديك است ‌
description.content:
سلام فياض نخست وزير فلسطين با اشاره به آگاهي روزافزون جامعه
بين الملل نسبت به حقوق فلسطينيان بشارت داد كه تولد دولت مستقل فلسطين نزديك است.به گزارش باشگاه خبرنگاران به نقل از خبرگزاري كويت، در حالي‌كه مقامات رژيم صهيونيستي تلاش مي كنند با اعمال فشارهاي بيشتر و بهره گيري از حمايت هاي غرب، سرزمين هاي اشغالي را تحت كنترل خود درآورده و بي پروا دست به يهودي سازي قدس شرقي زده اند، اما آگاهي جامعه
بين الملل از جنايات اين رژيم و افزايش شمار حاميان فلسطين مانع از تحقق نيت شوم تل آويو مي شود.براساس اين گزارش، سلام فياض نخست وزير فلسطين طي مراسمي در بيت جلا و به مناسبت نزديك شدن به ميلاد مسيح گفت: آگاهي جامعه جهاني از چگونگي زير پا گذاشته شدن حقوق طبيعي فلسطينيان توسط رژيم صهيونيستي بزودي موجب شكست اين رژيم شده و سپيده دم آزادي در تمامي شهرهاي فلسطين اشغالي دميده مي شود.اين گزارش حاكي‌است، تاكنون بسياري از كشورهاي جهان از جمله برزيل، آرژانتين، اروگوئه و بوليوي مرزبندي‌هاي سال 1967 فلسطين اشغالي را به رسميت شناخته و از حقوق فلسطينيان حمايت كرده اند.

description.hltext_display: Governor: Megaloads have their place in state
description.content:
Gov. Brian Schweitzer said Tuesday that banning the contested oil company megaload shipments from state highways could hurt efforts to attract businesses to the state.
Schweitzer made the comments in a meeting Tuesday with the head of the state trucking association.
Exxon Mobil is seeking permits to haul more than 200 loads of equipment from Lewiston, Idaho, through northwestern Montana to an oil-sands project in Alberta, Canada. The plan is currently mired down in a permitting process in Idaho.
Opponents argue the huge loads, which will travel at very slow speeds, present a threat to tourism, public safety and convenience and could harm the pristine rivers along the proposed route.
Schweitzer said Montana can consider finalizing its permits once the company has permission to reach the state borders.
But the governor said he can’t envision the Department of Transportation rejecting the permits just because some don’t like the idea of helping expand oil production in Canada. Doing so would be arbitrary, unfair and send a wrong signal to other businesses.
The governor said he also supports the expansion of the oil-sands in Canada because it is far better than getting oil from the Middle East.
Schweitzer said his office is trying to recruit a company expansion that builds large industrial equipment to Billings. Berry Y & V Industrial Contracting too would need to ship oversize loads on state highways.
“I will do nothing that jeopardizes that opportunity,” Schweitzer told Spook Stang, a former legislator who heads the Motor Carriers of Montana.
Schweitzer said he thinks the permitting process under the Montana Environmental Policy Act will do an adequate job of ensuring the loads are handled in a way that prevents any harm and forces the company to pay for any damage to bridges or other structures if it does occur.
The governor said he doesn’t think the proposed oil equipment megaloads pose a threat to area rivers as some suggest. He said trucks carry toxic materials such as farm chemicals on Montana roads every day, while the oil field equipment is largely inert.

description.content:
도로교통공단은 지난해 국내 도로교통 사고로 인한 사회적 비용이 11조7774억원으로 집계됐다고 22일 밝혔다.
전체 비용 가운데 차량과 대물 피해액을 합한 물적 피해액이 6조8905억원으로 가장 많았고, 사상자 보험료를 합한 인적 피해액도 3조8969억원에 달했다.
인적피해가 난 사고는 모두 23만1990건으로 5838명이 숨지고 36만1875명이 다쳤다. 인적 피해 한 건당 비용은 1882만원으로 집계됐다. 공단은 경찰과 자동차 보험회사, 공제조합 등 교통사고 손해배상 대행기관 통계를 취합해 사회적 비용을 집계하고 있다.
[이재철 기자]

description.hltext_display: 全能中的顶级机 惠普M1522nf年末热卖
description.content:
惠普惠普 LaserJet M1522nf(CB534A)
报价促销图片文章参数点评论坛 2010年12月22日 05:30 出处：泡泡网 【原创】 作者:韩青 编辑:韩青
泡泡网一体机频道12月22日 惠普LaserJet M1522nf激光一体机价格趋于合理之后，笔者从经销商处得到的反馈是其销量最近有明显的上升，不再像之前的用户会选择其它机型来替代这种高价行为，这也让笔者相信M1522nf市场竞争将会变的激烈。
惠普LaserJet M1522系列激光多功能一体机是取代3050系列的机型，具有全能的打印、复印、扫描、传真四项功能，而其中M1522nf更具有网络打印功能，并且与3050不同的是其为平板稿台设计，也代表着全能中的顶级机。不过该机比较遗憾的是并没有配电话听筒，如使用传真的话，得另配一个。
M1522nf在打印、复印方面分辨率为600×600dpi，最大A4幅面输出速度可达23页/分钟，其内置64MB内存，首页输出可维持9.5秒以内。该机配250页大容量纸盒、50页自动输稿器。这款激光一体机设有USB2.0接口及10/100Base-T以太网端口，支持网络打印在平时可更方便使用，这方面也是这款机器的卖点。■

description.hltext_display: Running for the State Senate
description.content:
Well, the 2010 election is behind us. The results are in and a sea of change can be expected. However, I do not want to talk about that yet. I want to talk about what it is like running for the State Senate. I want to share the good, bad and ugly of a campaign. Let me start first by describing what it is like to run for office.

description.hltext_display: تنش تازه اي در روابط آنكارا - تل آويو
description.content:
درميان سردي روابط تركيه و رژيم صهيونيستي؛امضاي قرارداد دريايي بين اين رژيم و قبرس باعث بروز تنش تازه اي ميان تركيه و مقامات رژيم اشغالگر قدس شده است.
به گزارش باشگاه خبرنگاران به نقل از خبرگزاري جروزالم پست؛درپي امضاي قرارداد دريايي بين رژيم صهيونيستي و قبرس كه منجر به تغيير در مرزهاي دريايي دو كشور شده است؛مقامات تركيه ضمن انتقاد شديد از اين قضيه،مراتب اعتراض و انتقاد شديد خود را به گوش نماينده رژيم صهيونيستي رساندند.
اين گزارش حاكي است؛پس از انعقاد قرارداد دريايي بين قبرس و رژيم صهيونيستي،وزارت امور خارجه تركيه مراتب اعتراض شديد خود را به سفير رژيم صهيونيستي در تركيه اعلام كرده و اين قرارداد را دليلي بر تاثير بر مذاكرات در خصوص پايان جدايي بخش ترك نشين و
يوناني نشين قبرس عنوان كرده است.گفتني است؛در اوايل سال جاري ميلادي حمله نظاميان رژيم صهيونيستي به كاروان آزادي كه منجر به مرگ
9 شهروند ترك شده بود،روابط
بين تركيه و رژيم صهيونيستي را به پايين ترين سطح خود در تاريخ روابط دو طرف رساند.به نظر مي رسد هرروز بردامنه تنش هاي ميان اين دو افزوده مي شود.

가천의대 길병원과 케이티스(KTIS)가 손잡고 유-헬스케어(U-Healthcare) 사업에 진출한다.
양측은 22일 가천의대길병원 뇌과학연구소 회의실에서 이태훈 가천의대길병원장과 노태석 케이티스 대표 등이 참석한 가운데 유 헬스케어 사업 공동추진에 관한 양해각서를 체결했다고 밝혔다.
가천의대길병원은 수준 높은 의료진과 풍부한 의료 컨텐츠를, 종합병원 등 30여개 병·의원 예약센터를 운영하는 케이티스는 그동안 쌓은 고객서비스 운영노하우를 바탕으로 유 헬스케어 사업을 공동으로 진행하기로 했다.
가천의대 길병원은 2005년 유헬스케어센터를 개소해 국가과제와 정책연구에 관한 다양한 R&D사업을 추진하고 있다.
특히 유비쿼터스 테크놀로지를 기반으로 한 고객프리미엄서비스를 파일럿으로 진행하고 있다. 지난 8일엔 유헬스사업단을 출범시켰다.
이태훈 가천의대길병원장은 ""U(유비쿼터스)-병원 중심의 시장이 확대되는 가운데 이번 MOU는 홈&모바일 헬스케어 시장을 견인하는데 중추적인 역할을 수행하게 될 것"이라고 밝혔다.
[지홍구 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Crime Stoppers Dec. 21: Hotel guest registry taken
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 9:15 PM EST
SEE BELOW FOR A LARGER PICTURE.
Associated Links
*Surveillance video will be seen Tuesday night on ABC 33/40 News at 10:00. The video will be uploaded here by Wednesday morning.*
Crime Stoppers is asking for anonymous tips to help detectives identify and locate a man who is accused of stealing a Birmingham hotel's guest registry.
The man, who is seen on surveillance video from several days back in the fall, apparently got at least partial credit card information of guests.
The hotel released the surveillance video to Crime Stoppers under the condition that the hotel not be named publicly. Crime Stoppers did confirm the hotel is along 4th Avenue South downtown.
Detectives said the suspect posed as a guest and made appearances at the hotel bar, the lobby, and other places within the hotel over the course of several days. Eventually, he built up the trust of the hotel's staff.
"Each day that he does that, and they see him, they actually think he lives in the hotel," Sergeant James Lewis said. "But he's actually there trying to rip them off."
"He's actually making friends with these people, and once he befriended them, they didn't watch him as much," Lewis added.
After the friendship was built, surveillance video shows the man slipping past the front desk and quickly grabbing the hotel's guest registry. He did so while an employee's back was turned for just a moment.
Detectives are hoping someone can recognize the suspect from the surveillance video. Crime Stoppers will take tips and will keep tipsters anonymous. There is a cash reward for the first tipster whose information leads Crime Stoppers to an arrest in this case.
"What we need for somebody to do is to recognize this guy," Lewis said. "They've seen him at this hotel. They've seen him at other hotels. They've seen him in the Birmingham area. Give us a name on him so we can get this guy off the street."
There was no word from police on whether any guest's personal information was actually compromised or used in a criminal manner.
PHOTO BELOW: The suspect seen on surveillance video in the hotel's bar.
IF YOU CAN HELP IDENTIFY THE SUSPECT: Call Crime Stoppers at (205) 254-7777.
Also, you can text 7777, along with your tip, to the word "CRIMES." Or if you prefer to send an encrypted tip online, go to www.birminghamcrimestoppers.org and click on the "submit an online tip" link.
No matter which method you choose, you will remain anonymous. Each tipster receives a private code number. If an arrest is made based on an individual's tip, the tipster can use the code number to claim a cash reward.
Crime Stoppers cannot call tipsters to testify in court.
Crime Stoppers is a partnership between local law enforcement, the Birmingham Business Alliance and ABC 33/40. Together, our goal is to make our community a safer place to live and work.

event_or_fact.property: He's actually making friends with these people, and once he befriended them, they didn't watch him as much
Each day that he does that, and they see him, they actually think he lives in the hotel; But he's actually there trying to rip them off.

What we need for somebody to do is to recognize this guy; They've seen him at this hotel. They've seen him at other hotels. They've seen him in the Birmingham area. Give us a name on him so we can get this guy off the street.

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks protesters gather in Sydney
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: THE fight for free speech has only just begun, a Sydney rally in support of whistleblower website WikiLeaks and its founder Julian Assange has been told. The protest at Town Hall, in the city centre, today attracted about 30 supporters and a heavy police presence.

description.hltext_display: PORTICA informiert auf dem Online-Handelskongress über „E-Commerce zur Miete“
description.content:
(fair-NEWS) - (Kempen / Bonn) Wenn Europas führender Kongress für E-Commerce am 18. und 19. Januar 2011 in Bonn seine Pforten öffnet, dann wird erstmalig die PORTICA GmbH Marketing Support mit von der Partie sein. Der Kempener Prozess-Management- und Fulfillment-Spezialist stellt auf dem Online-Handelskongress im Hotel Kameha Grand an Stand 23 Komplett-Lösungen für den Bereich E-Commerce vor.
„Wir zeigen anschaulich, welche Vorteile Unternehmer beim E-Commerce zur Miete haben. Sie steigen ohne notwendige Investitionskosten sofort in einen professionellen Internet-Handel ein und lassen sich dabei von einem erfahrenen Dienstleister an die Hand nehmen“, erklärt PORTICA-Geschäftsführer Markus Ramirez. Mit seinem Portfolio vertieft PORTICA das Themenspektrum des Handelskongresses. Denn die Veranstaltung stellt durch ihre Kombination aus Fachausstellung und Vorträgen eine Plattform für das komplette Feld „Onlinehandel“ bereit und gilt als Branchentreffpunkt für Entscheider aus Versand- und Online-Handel.
Der Versand- und Distanzhandel boomt auf allen Kanälen. Gleichzeitig werden die Anforderungen an das Marketing und die Logistik zunehmend komplexer und stellen Unternehmer vor vielfältige und komplexe Herausforderungen. Noch nie gab es derart viele Möglichkeiten, Kunden zu finden und zu binden. Dies gelingt mit Kenntnissen über die wichtigsten Strukturen und Trends nachhaltig. Genau von diesen können die Kunden im Rahmen des „E-Commerce zur Miete“ profitieren.
Als erfahrener Dienstleister unterstützt PORTICA Unternehmen aus den Bereichen stationärer Handel, Versand- und Distanzhandel sowie Markenhersteller bei der Bewältigung von E-Commerce-Aktivitäten und übernimmt viele der täglichen Aufgaben. Deshalb gehören auch Fashion-Hersteller zu den Kunden. Die Leistungen von PORTICA beginnen beim Web-Shop. Hier stellt der Dienstleister eine moderne und zertifizierte Plattform mit Anbindung an Social- und Mobile Commerce zur Verfügung. Eine moderne Usability, intelligente Suchfunktionen und Monitoring Tools sorgen für erfolgreiches E-Commerce. Vielfältige Schnittstellen sind selbstverständlich, genauso wie Varianten bei der Produktdarstellung.
Im Bereich Kundenservice setzen sich die Leistungen aus der Bestellannahme, der Produktberatung, der Kundenbetreuung, dem Beschwerdemanagement, dem Response-Handling nach Marketingkampagnen, der Kunden- und Artikelstammdatenpflege, Adressrecherchen, der Dokumenten- und der Postbearbeitung zusammen. PORTICA wickelt Retouren mit halb automatisierten Lösungen effizient ab und bietet spezielle Versandkonditionen an. Genauso umfassend sind das Projektmanagement, die Webshop-Administration, der After-Sales-Service, das Debitoren- und Zahlungsmanagement. Hinzu kommen flexibles Warehousing mit über 16.000 Palettenstellplätzen und effizientes Retourenmanagement. Ein problemloser weltweiter Export, eine zuverlässige Distribution, ein umfassendes Qualitätsmanagement sowie IT-Support komplettieren das Portfolio im Bereich E-Commerce.
Ergänzend dazu können sich die Messebesucher über die weiteren Tätigkeitsgebiete von PORTICA informieren. Dies ist zum einen die Verkaufsförderung, die das Unternehmen mit Aktions-Abwicklungen, Cashback- und Prämienaktionen, Mailings und Eventlogistik unterstützt. Zum anderen gehört die Werbemittel-Logistik dazu, ebenso wie Business Process Outsourcing rund um die Themen Marketing und Vertrieb sowie Dokumentenverarbeitung.

description.hltext_display: Buckeye Acquires Stake In BORCO
PERLIS RAJA MUDA WANTS MORE YOUTHS TO TAKE UP GOLF
description.author: Bernama
description.content:
KANGAR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- The Raja Muda of Perlis, Tuanku Syed Faizuddin Putra Jamalullail, today called for more youths in Perlis to be encouraged to take up golf to help identify talents in the sport.
He also said that more competitions and coaches should be made available for these young golfers.
Tuanku Syed Faizuddin gave the advice at the presentation of certificates at a youth clinic organised by the Malaysian Golf Association at the Putra Golf Club, here.
The clinic was attended by 75 youths of between six and 16 years, and five of them were selected for participation in a golf clinic in Melaka.

event_or_fact.property: more competitions and coaches should be made available for these young golfers.

description.hltext_display: 加购大容量墨盒更便宜 兄弟一体热售
description.content:
兄弟兄弟 MFC-5890CN
报价促销图片文章参数点评论坛 2010年12月22日 05:30 出处：泡泡网 【原创】 作者:韩青 编辑:韩青
泡泡网一体机频道12月22日 兄弟 MFC-5890CN同时具有打印、扫描、复印和传真四大功能，能够打印A3大小幅面的文档，无疑扩大了使用的范围。外观设计人性化，简洁实用，可以满足大部分用户的使用。性能上表现也很不错，回馈新老客户，特价促销！促销有效期至12月31日,购机同时加购大容量墨盒有特惠！
兄弟MFC-5890CN (报价 参数 图片 评论)
兄弟 MFC-5890CN外观色调以黑色为主，兼有少量的白色作为点缀，长宽高分别为485×408×242mm，重量是10.9kg，小巧精致，支持中英文显示的3.3英寸彩色液晶显示屏可以让用户根据自身的使用习惯对其进行角度调节，使用起来更加方便直观。
兄弟 MFC-5890CN每分钟可打印黑白文本35页，彩色文本28页，特别配备了A3打印功能，配有大容量的自动进稿器，一次进稿可达50页之多，需要打印大幅面海报或者图纸时，拥有这样超值功能的机器必会让用户事半功倍。同时标配了网络打印功能，用户可通过网络访问来共享该一体机，高效、快捷、方便！
兄弟 MFC-5890CN复印分辨率都是1200×1200dpi，每分钟可复印黑白文本23页，彩色文本20页，连续复印的最多页数为99页，可以在25%―400%的范围内进行微调，还支持N合一复印和海报复印。而最新添加的歪斜/阴影校正复印功能可以自动纠正复印件歪斜现象，同时去除边框阴影，使厚文件/书籍的复印效果卓越出色，可以轻松解决原先的复印阴影问题。■

description.hltext_display: لوکاشنکو بارديگر رئيس جمهور بلاروس شد
description.content:
مردم بلاروس بار ديگر الکساندر لوکاشنکو را رئيس جمهور کشورشان برگزيدند.به گزارش واحد مرکزي خبر از مينسک، ستاد مرکزي انتخابات بلاروس روز گذشته اعلام کرد ، بيش از 90 درصد از واجدين شرايط در انتخابات رياست جمهوري بلاروس شرکت کرده اند که از ميان ده نامزد رياست جمهوري ،الکساندر لوکاشنکو توانست با هفتاد و نه مميز شصت و هفت درصد آرا بار ديگر رئيس جمهور بلاروس شود.لوکاشنکوي 56 ساله که از سال 1994 ميلادي رياست جمهوري بلاروس را بر عهده دارد توانسته با انجام اصلاحات گسترده اقتصادي ،وضعيت معيشتي مردم بلاروس را بهبود بخشد.وي تلاش کرده تا چهره اي مستقل از دولت خود را به نمايش بگذارد که اين موضوع باعث شده تا کشورهاي غربي همواره مواضع تندي را بر عليه اين کشور اتخاذ کنند.
ارسال به دیگران - چاپ با عکس - چاپ بدون عکس - نظرات شما
حدیث (7160)
پيامبر اکرم (صلّي ‌الله ‌عليه ‌وآله):
دو رکعت نماز در دل شب نزد من محبوب‌تر است از دنيا و آنچه در آن است.
سرمقاله (7160)
محمد كاظم انبارلويي
1- ناظران جهاني رويدادهاي امروز ايران را بويژه در خصوص اجراي قانون هدفمند كردن يارانه‌ها رصد مي‌كنند. قيمت ده‌ها كالا اصلاح شده و قيمت برخي حامل‌هاي انرژي به چند برابر رسيده است. اما بازار ايران آرام، مردم آرام‌تر و مسئولان با تدبير كل تحولات را بي‌دغدغه مديريت مي‌كنند. سئوال مهم ناظران جهان اين است كه چگونه است ايران در شرايط تحريم و فشار مضاعف قدرت‌هاي جهاني در شرايطي كه تروريسم كور در گونه‌هاي متفاوت از يك سو دانشمندان ايران و از سوي ديگر عزاداران حسيني را نشانه گرفته، همچنين در شرايطي كه سران فتنه به عنوان دنباله آمريكا و رژيم صهيونيستي در داخل عمل مي‌كنند، دولت و مسئولان توانسته‌اند از بزرگترين پيچ و گردنه تاريخ اقتصادي كشور به سلامت عبور كنند.

description.hltext_display: Sea salt variations may aid reformulation: Study
description.author: nathan.gray@decisionnews.com
description.content:
Related topics: Sodium reduction, Science & Nutrition
Certain sea salts with high salty flavour intensity or lower sodium content may be used to lower sodium levels in food formulations, according to new research.
The study, published in the Journal of Sensory Studies, reveals distinct differences in salty taste intensity and sodium content between sea salts harvested in different locations. The researchers said that the results of the study may be of use when looking to produce new low salt products, or when reformulating exiting products with lower sodium content.
“There has been some controversy that sea salt may be healthier than table salts due to the presence of other minerals. This research demonstrates that sea salts harvested from different parts of the world have different mineral content and time-intensity profiles of salty taste,” said the researchers, led by Dr. MaryAnne Drake from the Department of Food, Bioprocessing, and Nutrition Sciences, at North Carolina State University.
“Due to the different time intensity profiles, it may be possible to use less of some sea salts to obtain the same salty taste as a food containing traditional salt, but having lower sodium content,” they added.
Excessive intake of dietary sodium is strongly linked to hypertension, a risk factor for the development of cardiovascular disease and stroke. Whilst there is also evidence suggesting that high sodium intake is linked to gastric cancer, decreased bone density, and higher rates of obesity.
Much research into sodium reduction from sodium chloride has focused on using salt replacers – such as potassium salt – which may provide salty tastes with lower sodium levels.
Previous studies have indicated that an increased intake of dietary potassium can exert a protective effect in individuals with sodium-induced hypertension, whilst others have shown that certain food products can reduce sodium chloride levels by up to 50 per cent through potassium salt replacement.
Drake and colleagues noted a growing interest in sea salt in recent years. They said that distinct differences in the chemical composition of salts (different sea salts vs table salt) could contribute to taste intensity differences which may be of use for food formulators.
They said that – depending on region of origin – sea salts are known to contain a variety of minerals including magnesium, calcium, sulphur, potassium, iron, copper, fluorine and phosphorus.
“To our knowledge, research has not compared the sensory or mineral profiles or the time intensity of salty taste of sea salts,” said the researchers.
The researchers tested the mineral content and flavour profiles of 45 different salts to determine if variations in mineral content impacted the basic taste profile
Study details
Drake and co- workers reported that the mineral content of salts differed depending on the harvesting location.
They found that certain sea salts – including several from Mediterranean areas and Asia – had higher sodium content than the reference table salt, but observed three sea salts with 30 per cent less sodium than the reference – with sea salts from the Hawaii area showing the lowest sodium content.
A correlation was seen between sodium content and salty taste, but when different salts were compared on an equivalent sodium basis, no difference in salty taste was reported.
In contrast, time-intensity profiles for salty tastes were observed to be distinct to each salt type. Drake said that this may be due to a role of other positively charged mineral ions in the perception salty tastes.
They said that the results suggest that other minerals may play a role in salty taste perception.
“The impact of trace minerals on flavour directly appeared to be minimal, but flavours such as mineral and metallic and sometimes stronger intensities of umami and astringent mouth feel were noted in sea salts compared to table salt,” they concluded.
Source: Journal of Sensory Studies
Published online ahead of print, doi: 10.1111/j.1745-459X.2010.00317.x
“Comparison of salty taste and time intensity of sea and land salts from around the world”
Authors: S.L. Drake, M.A. Drake

entity.property: Department of Food, Bioprocessing, and Nutrition Sciences
