description.hltext_display: Danskerne siger klart nej til euroen
description.author: chrk@tv2.dk
description.content:
Danskerne siger fortsat klart nej til at indføre euroen, viser en ny kvartalsmåling fra Danske Bank. I den nye måling er tilslutningen faldet kraftigt. Forspringet til nej-siden har aldrig været større, konstaterer banken.
Hvor forspringet til "nej" i den foregående måling lå på fem procentpoint, er man nu oppe på 12,9 procent. 42 procent siger ja eller måske ja til euroen, mens 54,9 procent afviser den europæiske valuta.
Fokuserer man på de vælgere, der er sikre på deres stemme, er forskellen endnu større. Kun 25,5 procent er sikre på et ja, mens 43,5 procent siger klart nej.
Andelen af ja-sigere skrumper indSet i forhold til den seneste måling er andelen af danskere, der føler sig sikre på et ja, faldet med næsten syv procentpoint. "Traditionelt klarer nej-siden EU-valgkampe bedre end ja-siden. Man må derfor forvente, at en afstemning ville resultere i et klart nej, hvis der blev afholdt valg inden for den nærmeste fremtid, lyder bankens konklusion.
Målingen blev foretaget i de to første uger af december. Det vurderes, at gældsproblemerne i Irland og Europa i øvrigt spiller en vigtig rolle for nej-sidens fremgang.

description.hltext_display: Die 19. "International Wedding Photographic Equipment Exhibition" China Shanghai (im Frühjahr) soll besser werden als je zuvor
description.content:
(fair-NEWS) - Shanghai (ots/PRNewswire) - Die 19. China Shanghai International Wedding Photographic Equipment Exhibition (Internationale Ausstellung Hochzeitsfotografie und Zubehör China-Schanghai) & die International Children's Photography, (Internationale Kinderfotografie - Themenfotografie-Ausstellung) sind für den 23.-26. Feb. 2011 geplant und finden gleichzeitig auf der INTEX Shanghai, dem Shanghaimart und Shanghai Everbright Convention & Exhibition Center statt.
(Logo: www.prnasia.com/sa/20061108114544-37.jpg)
Mit der Teilnahme von mehr als 600 Ausstellern und einer Ausstellungsfläche von über 75.000 Quadratmetern, ist die Ausstellung zur grössten Show-Plattform für den Austausch und die Kooperation für Hochzeitsfotografie, Kinderfotografie und den damit verbundenen Branchen geworden. Die Gründe, warum die Aussteller so zufrieden mit der Ausstellung sind, liegen nicht nur an der grösseren Fläche, sondern auch, weil sie Qualität und neue internationale Markenverkäufer in den Sektor bringt. Somit baut sie eine bessere Dienstleistungsplattform für Betreiber auf und bietet neueres betriebliches Denken.
Die Ausstellung hat Hochzeitskleiderhersteller aus Italien, Frankreich, Japan, Südkorea und Malaysia angezogen, sowie auch aus Hongkong und Taiwan. Knightly aus Hongkong wird besonders seine Aolisha-Produkte vorstellen und hält während der Veranstaltung eine Hochzeitskleid-Show und eine Werbekonferenz ab. Ausserdem werden Japans Matsuo und Yumi Katsrua ihr Debut auf der Ausstellung haben, zusammen mit einem Dutzend koreanischer Hochzeitskleiderunternehmen, die sich zur Ausstellung angemeldet haben.
Auf der Show wird auch Chinas bekannter Automobilhersteller BYD seine Mittel- und High-End-Modelle zeigen, zum Beispiel den BYD M6 - Warren Buffetts exklusiver Wagen während seiner Reise nach China. Der BYD M6 wurde für Regierungsmitglieder, Führungskräfte aus Unternehmen und grosse Familien entworfen und bietet als Konzept "Distinguiert und stabil". Dieses Modell, dessen grosser Vorteil seine elegante Erscheinung ist, mit seinem 7-Sitze-Design, intelligenter Konfiguration und hohen Sicherheitsstandards, wird vor Hochzeitsfotografie-Studios präsentiert, um die Kundenerfahrung mit exzellenten Foto-Dienstleitungen am Standort der Studios zu verbessern.
In den letzten Jahren sind die Kinderfotografie-Studios sehr in Mode gekommen. Zusätzlich zu SNOOPY, wird auch "Disney Children's Photography" im 2. Stock der INTEX Shanghai zum Bereich der Kinderfotografie zu sehen sein.
Es wird eine Reihe von Planungsfirmen mit Sitz in Hongkong im 7. Stock des Shanghaimart zur Ausstellung erscheinen, um den Fotostudios Marketing und Dienstleistungen anzubieten. Der Schwerpunkt wird dabei auf der Entwicklung und die Ausrichtung des Studiosektors liegen.
Shanghai International Exhibition Co., Ltd. Zhang Lina, Direktor Tel:+86-21-6279-2828 Fax:+86-21-6386-6972 lina@siec-ccpit.com www.chinaweddingexpo.com.cn
Pressekontakt: CONTACT: Zhang Lina, Direktor, Shanghai International Exhibition Co., Ltd.+86-21-6279-2828, +86-21-6386-6972(Fax), lina@siec-ccpit.com

description.hltext_display: विद्रोह रोकने को हरसंभव उपाय करे पाक
description.content:
वाशिंगटन। आतंकवाद के खिलाफ पाकिस्तान को अपने समर्थन की बात दोहराते हुए अमेरिका ने कहा है कि पाकिस्तान को अपनी सीमाओं के भीतर हो रहे विद्रोह को रोकने के लिए अपनी पूरी ताकत झोंक देनी चाहिए।
अमेरिकी विदेश मंत्रालय के प्रवक्ता पीजे क्राउले ने एक संवाददाता सम्मेलन में कहा कि पाकिस्तान में सरकार के खिलाफ हो रहा विद्रोह इस देश के साथ अन्य देशों के लिए भी खतरा है। उन्होंने कहा कि हम पाकिस्तान के प्रयासों की सराहना करते हैं और हरसंभव मदद देने का भी वायदा करते हैं। गौरतलब है कि मंगलवार को समाचार पत्रों में एक खबर प्रकाशित हुई थी जिसमें यह कहा गया था कि इस क्षेत्र से आतंकियों को नहीं खत्म कर पाने के कारण अमेरिकी प्रशासन में पाकिस्तान के विरुद्ध असंतोष व्याप्त है। हालांकि क्राउले ने इसी खबर की तरफ इशारा करते हुए संवाददाताओं से कहा कि वह समाचारपत्रों में छपी हर खबर पर भरोसा नहीं करें।
मोबाइल पर ताजा खबरें, फोटो, वीडियो व लाइव स्कोर देखने के लिए जाएं m.jagran.com पर

description.hltext_display: اعتراف نتانياهو
description.content:
نخست وزير افراطي رژيم صهيونيستي نسبت به بحران مشروعيت دائمي اين رژيم تاکيد کرده است.بحراني که هيچ گاه براي سياستمداران صهيونيستي نقطه پايان نخواهد داشت .نخست وزير رژيم صهيونيستي با اذعان به بحران مشروعيت اين رژيم در منطقه ادعا کرده است که رژيم صهيونيستي جنگ نمي خواهد، ما صلح طلب هستيم و الان هم دنبال آن مي گرديم!واقعيت امر اين است که نتانياهو خود نيز به خوبي نسبت به مضحکانه بودن ادعاي خود آگاه است.اساس نام رزيم صهيونيستي با جنايت و جنگ و حق کشي گره خورده و فردي مثل نتانياهو
نمي‌تواند ادعاي صلح طلب بودن داشته باشد.نتانياهو اذعان نموده است که رژيم صهيونيستي حتي اگر به صلح! برسد همچنان فعاليت ضد مشروعيت آن ادامه خواهد يافت، چرا که منبع اين فعاليتها حوادث سال 1948 است نه 1967.واقعيت امر اين است که بحران مشروعيت رژيم صهيونيستي به اندازه اي ريشه اي و محکم است که با انعقاد دو سه قرار داد ظاهري از بين نخواهد رفت.رژيم صهيونيستي در حالي ادعاي صلح مي کند که هنوز بابت حمله به کاروان آزادي غزه از ترکيه عذرخواهي نکرده است .در چنين شرايطي ايالات متحده از آنکارا خواسته است تا مناسبات خود با تل آويو را از سر بگيرد.در جريان توحش صهيونيستها عليه کشتي حامل کاروان آزاذي غزه،ماهيت واقعي رژيم اشغالگر قدس و ايالات متحده مشخص گرديد.باراک اوباما رئيس جمهور ايالات متحده آمريکا در واکنش به اقدام وقيحانه اخير رژيم صهيونيستي در حمله به کاروان آزادي به ابراز تاسف بسنده نمودو در اين خصوص از مقامات صهيونيستي خواست تا توضيحات لازم را ارائه نمايند!مقامات رژيم صهيونيستي نيز با اظهاراتي وقيحانه اعلام کردند که اين اقدام آنها صحيح بوده است!علي رغم واکنش هاي شديد بين‌المللي به حمله رژيم صهيونيستي به کاروان آزادي کمک‌هاي بشردوستانه به غزه، رئيس جمهور آمريکا ترجيح داده است در اين خصوص به گونه اي پارادوکسيکال عمل نموده و در عين حمايت غيرمستقيم از جنايت اخير صهيونيستها،خود را نسبت به واقعه اخير متاثر نشان دهد.حمايتهاي واشنگتن از تل آويو نيز در اين خصوص همچنان ادامه دارد.ايالات متحده آمريکا اخيرا معامله تسليحاتي گسترده اي با رژيم صهيونيستي انجام داده و مانند هميشه اين رژيم تا دندان مسلح را به انواع سلاحهاي ممنوعه تجهيز نموده است.بنابر اين در هر جنايت بين المللي که توسط تل آويو رخ مي دهد،رد پاي واشنگتن نيز مشاهده مي شود.از اين حيث اوباما اصلا در مقامي قرار ندارد که بخواهد نسبت به واقعه اخير ابراز تاسف کند زيرا کاخ سفيد شريک جرم صهيونيستها در اين حادثه و هر حادثه مشابهي محسوب
مي شود.در هر حال رژيم صهيونيستي و ايالات متحده اساسا به دنبال صلح نبوده و نيستند.واشنگتن و تل آويو دو مولد اصلي بحران در نظام بين الملل محسوب مي شود که بايد در خصوص جنايات متعدد خود نسبت به ملت فلسطين و ساير ملل دنيا پاسخگو باشند.اعتراف اخير نتانياهو نسبت به بحران مشروعيتي که رژيم صهيونيستي درگير آن است نيز به خوبي نشان مي دهد که افکار عمومي دنيا با گذشت زمان بيشتر نسبت به ماهيت واقعي تل آويو آگاه مي شود.اين آگاهي همچنان گسترده و گسترده تر مي شود و ديگر مجالي براي تنفس صهيونيستها باقي نخواهد گذاشت.

description.hltext_display: State super wants kids in school to age 18
description.content:
Montana Superintendent of Public Instruction Denise Juneau told the governor in a meeting Tuesday that she will ask the 2011 Legislature to increase the compulsory attendance age from 16 to 18 years of age.
Juneau’s announcement came as she laid out her legislative plans to Gov. Brian Schweitzer — which include a proposal to send a little more money to schools than the governor is seeking.
Juneau said she thinks it is important to increase the compulsory school attendance age for the first time since 1921. The schools chief said many students who drop out at 16 years of age do so because they know they can.
“It would raise the expectation that we expect every student to graduate,” Juneau said.
Her office points out that more than three-fourths of the inmates in the prison system are high school dropouts.
She called the proposal to increase the age a “keystone” to her legislative plans this session. One potential catch is that fiscal analysts have determined the bill could cost up to $1 million because more than 1,000 students could stay in school. The state funding system for schools is based on a head count.
Juneau, a Democrat, said Republican state Sen. Taylor Brown has agreed to sponsor the plan. The GOP has overwhelming control of the Legislature for at least the next two years.
Brown said it is worthwhile to change the societal expectation that it is OK to drop out at 16 years of age. He noted the bill still allows students to seek alternative forms of education like home schooling or trade-based instruction.
“If we are successful in keeping more kids in school, if we are successful in keeping our dropout rate down, it is going to cost more in the public education system,” Brown said. “I am aware that if we are successful in keeping kids in school, there is going to be an expense.”
Nationally, 19 states set their cutoff age at 16 while the rest either have it at 17 or 18 years of age, Juneau’s office said.
Juneau said her office is also supporting schools with other efforts to graduate more students. She said some large districts have been successful in persuading dropouts to return to school.
Juneau said that currently, 81 percent of students who start the ninth grade will complete high school within four years and 85 percent eventually complete it.
In any given year, about 3.6 percent of the school population drops out.
The proposal could run into issues in the Legislature. Juneau said a lower-profile push by her office was shot down in 2009.
And as recently as 2007 some conservative lawmakers considered getting rid of the compulsory attendance law altogether.
Republicans in control of the Legislature are also likely to push back on Juneau’s plans to increase education funding more than what Schweitzer has requested. Some Republicans have said it instead may be necessary to cut school funding.
Schweitzer indicated he wouldn’t oppose Juneau’s proposal but added he thinks it’s unlikely the Legislature will provide even as much as his office has requested.
The governor suggests funding his proposed increase largely by taking money from an account set up for local infrastructure projects and by redistributing county oil-tax revenue equally across the state.

description.hltext_display: Services to be held for slain border patrol agent
description.content:
(click the phrases to see a list)
Subjects:
Funerals and memorial services (51)
Armed forces (97)
Military and defense (394)
Government and politics (5232)
General news (8340)
Places:
Detroit (242)
Michigan (674)
United States (23515)
North America (23705)
DETROIT — Services are scheduled at a Detroit church for a border patrol agent killed during a gun battle with bandits near the Arizona border with Mexico.
Greater Grace Temple will host Wednesday morning's funeral for 40-year-old Brian A. Terry.
Terry was part of a team of agents tracking the organized gang Dec. 14 in a canyon just north of Mexico. Four bandits were arrested.
Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano has said the bandits tracked by Terry's team typically rob drug smugglers or illegal immigrants making their way into the U.S.
Terry served in the Marines and as a police officer in the Lower Michigan cities of Ecorse and Lincoln Park before joining the border patrol in 2007. He is survived by his mother, father, a brother and two sisters.

description.hltext_display: Na potulkách Škótskom - Dunbeg a Ben Nevis (IV.) (Medard Slovík)
description.content:
Dunbeg sa nachádza dva a pol míle od Obanu, žije v ňom okolo 1000 ľudí. Sídli tu Škótska asociácia pre morské vedy (Sams), je to jedno z hlavných morských vedeckých centier vo Veľkej Británii. Nájdete v ňom mladých ľudí z celého sveta. Študuje tu už druhý rok ekologické vedy moja známa Jiřina. Býva spolu so študentom Pittom v domčeku. V noci docestujeme na aute do Dunbegu. U Pitta je príjemne, v krbe praská oheň, cítime sa tu ako doma. Večer nám hostitelia ukazujú na mape miesta, kam by sme sa mohli zajtra vybrať. Rozhodujeme sa medzi najvyšším kopcom Škótska Ben Nevisom a najkrajšou dolinou vysočiny Glen Coe.
Pred Pittovým domčekom v Dunbegu.
Spolu s Jiřinou a Pittom pri dobrej whisky a praskania ohňa v krbe.
Rasťo pri hrade Dunstaffnage v blízkom okolí Dunbegu.
Cesta do Fort William je úchvatná, autobus spravil zachádzku k najkrajšej doline škótskej vysočiny Glen Coe. Je to nádherný kút, videli sme len začiatok údolia a boli sme ním očarení. A čo celé údolie, aké musí byť krásne? Boli by sme vystúpili, no lístky máme kúpene až do Fort Villiam. Je to najväčšie mesto vysočiny a hlavné turistické centrum. Glen Coe nám ešte dlho vŕta v hlave. Na stanici vo Fort William sme mali šťastie, videli sme ako vypravili zo stanice parnú lokomotívu do Mallaigu. Je to jedná z najväčších svetových parných železníc. Mallaig je rušný rybársky prístav vzdialený 84 mil. Previezli by sme sa radi škótskou vysočinou a videli prekrásne scenérie hôr, jazier a riek. No našim cieľom je Ben Nevis najvyšší kopec nie len Škótska, ale aj celej Veľkej Británie.
Rieky sú čisté a domy pôsobia harmonicky v prírode. Šípka nám ukázala cestu na Ben Nevis.
Prechádzali sme typickou škótskou krajinou s pasúcimi sa ovcami.
Páčilo sa nám horské pleso Lochan Meall an t-Suidhe (711 metrov) a už tuším, kde sa asi vrchol Ben Nevis nachádza.
Strmými stráňami si dole derú cestu malé dravé potôčiky.
Stúpame do kopcov a postupne sa nám odkrývajú nádherné výhľady na okolitú krajinu.
Pod vrcholom sú už len samé kamene.
Chodník nie je veľmi zaujímavý a vrchol je stále v nedohľadne. Vchádzame do hustej hmly a cestu nám ukazujú len trpaslíci z kameňa.
Vyčerpaný Rasťo na vrchole Ben Nevisu.
Vystúpili sme na najvyšší kopec celej Veľkej Británie. Vrchol Ben Nevis to je len kopa kamenia, čakali sme niečo zaujímavejšie. Silno fúkalo, studený vzduch sa nám tlačil do úst. Počasie na vrchole bolo nepriaznivé. Videli sme iba na krok pred seba, všade bola len hmla. Dole v údolí mohlo byť oveľa krajšie. Ľutujeme, že sme sa nakoniec nešli pozrieť do doliny Glen Coe. Určite by sme videli zaujímavejšie scenérie krajiny a mali silnejší zážitok.
Pri maličkej nocľahárni na vrchole Ben Nevisu, za nepriaznivého počasia sa tu dá prenocovať.
Na vrchole sa kedysi nahádzalo observatórium. V rokoch 1881 - 1883 dobrovoľník a meteorológ Clement Wragge vystúpil za každého počasia na Ben Nevis a robil meteorologické merania. Neskôr tu otvorili hvezdáreň. Postupne sa vykonávali pozorovania aj v zime. Dodávky materiálu vynášali poníky po vybudovanej ceste až na jeho vrchol. V roku 1904 bolo observatórium zatvorené a postupne chátralo. Dnes sú z neho len ruiny.
Po zdolaní Ben Nevisu nás Pitt odviezol k autobusu z Dunbegu do Obanu. Odtiaľ sa vraciame do nočného Edinburghu. Mesto je v noci najkrajšie a moje srdce sa chveje, keď znovu zazrie jeho krásu. Posledný deň sa vraciame domov lietadlom z Edinburghu do Bratislavy. Pod lietadlom oblaky čarujú rôzne obrazce, vytvárajú neuveriteľne bizarné tvary. V hlave sa mi pohybujú myšlienky spolu s oblakmi, predstavujem si túto príjemnú krajinu. Nenašiel som svoj hrad a nevidel všetky krásne miesta - ostrovy, jazerá a hory. No jedno viem určite, že raz sa tu vrátim a prežijem nové dobrodružstvá.
Goodbye Scotland, see you again!

description.hltext_display: Everett, Haas spark short-handed Lincoln Southeast
description.content:
Because of illness and injury, the Nebraska School Activities Association's five-day holiday moratorium from games and practice starting Wednesday couldn't come at a better time for the Lincoln Southeast girls basketball team.
Thanks to the 1-2 scoring punch of Payton Everett and Alexa Haas on Tuesday night at the Prasch Activities Center, it will still be a happy holiday break for the second-ranked Knights.
Everett score 26 points and grabbed a game-high 10 rebounds, while Haas, a speedy 5-foot-2 sophomore point guard, added 13 points to pace Southeast to a 54-37 victory against previously unbeaten Grand Island.
Their 39 points more than made up for the 32 points that were out of the Southeast (4-1) lineup. Sophomore standout Alexa Kastanek, who averages just over 20 points per game, went to the bench with a lower back injury 58 seconds into the game and didn't return.
Junior guard Lauren Stricker, an accurate three-point shooter who's averaging 12 points a contest, did not play because of illness.
"Payton had to step up,'' Southeast coach John Larsen said of the 5-foot-9 senior. "She can shoot it and we did a good job of getting her the ball in a position to score.''
Everett, 11-of-15 from the field, sank her first five shots and had nine of Southeast's first 17 points. An Everett three-pointer gave Southeast a 17-8 lead with 6:21 left in the second quarter. Everett's second three of the period with 1:24 left put the Knights up 27-18 at halftime.
"We were all really surprised when Alexa went out, and we knew someone would have to make up for those points,'' said Everett, who had 15 in the first half. "I was lucky enough to hit some shots early that got us going.''
A three-pointer by Andrea Voss got the Islanders (5-1) as close as 34-28 with 1:18 left in the third quarter. Southeast, however, slammed the door with a 20-4 run that opened up a 54-32 gap with 2:57 left.
Haas, a move-in from Colby, Kan., had 10 points in the spurt, starting it with a steal and a layup before dropping a three-pointer with 22 seconds left in the third period to make it 39-29 heading into the final eight minutes. Everett netted nine during the spree, ending it with a three-pointer.
"Alexa's (Haas) really fast and she can do anything on the court -- shoot, defend, handle the ball and pass,'' Everett said. "She's made a huge difference.''
Senior Sam Harvey paced Grand Island with 13 points and nine rebounds. Islander coach Kelli Jeffries was impressed with Southeast's shooting as the Knights hit 50 percent from the field (21 of 42) and were 9 of 21 from beyond the three-point line.
"Southeast has a lot of good players. If someone like Kastanek is out, they have other people who can score,'' Jeffries said. "Offensively we had some success scoring inside. But the way they were shooting, we couldn't match them basket for basket.''

description.hltext_display: Lakers Coach Says Humbug To Christmas Games
description.author: GREG BEACHAM
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- Phil Jackson says humbug to the NBA's Christmas schedule.
The 11-time NBA champion coach restated his longtime opposition to Christmas games Tuesday night before his Los Angeles Lakers faced the Milwaukee Bucks in their final tuneup before Saturday's visit from the Miami Heat.
"It's like Christian holidays don't mean to them anything any more," Jackson said. "Just go out and play and entertain the TV. It's really weird, but it is what it is. We have to go to work and make the best of it."
Jackson is the son of two Christian ministers, and he famously wrote a book on his spiritual growth related to basketball.
The Lakers have played on every Christmas since 1999, including three straight games against the Heat during Shaquille O'Neal's tenure after his trade from Los Angeles. Kobe Bryant has played on Christmas in 13 of his 15 NBA seasons - not including the 1998-99 season, which didn't begin until the new year due to the lockout.
Jackson hates the Lakers' annual spot in the showcase, noting the NHL and most other major sports usually take Christmas off.
"I don't think anybody should play on Christmas Day," Jackson said. "I don't understand it."
The coach doesn't sound interested in voicing those concerns in person to commissioner David Stern, however.
"He'll see it," Jackson said with a grin.
Jackson also objects to the proliferating number of Christmas games in recent seasons, after many years with a single or two holiday games. The NBA has scheduled five for Saturday, with Bryant's showdown against LeBron James and the revamped Heat at center stage.
Jackson said the timing of the game - and the 2 p.m. local start time, 5 hours earlier than the Lakers' usual tip-off - will reduce its importance.
"It's going to be Christmas, and you're going to have little kids putting batteries in toys and putting their Christmas presents together," Jackson said. "There's all kinds of crazy stuff going on, and now your head has got to get focused on the game, in the middle of the afternoon on Christmas Day."
Jackson believes the Lakers got overly amped about last season's Christmas meeting with the Cleveland Cavaliers, leading to a painful loss that ended with fans throwing dozens of novelty foam hands onto the court. A year earlier, Los Angeles snapped the Boston Celtics' 19-game winning streak in a rematch of the 2008 NBA finals.
Jackson would prefer to see those historic moments on other calendar dates.
"When I was in the CBA, we had a commissioner who scheduled a Christmas Eve game. I had to call him up and say, 'That's the holy time,'" Jackson said. "You just have to keep reminding them that this is a special day."

description.hltext_display: Panels leistungsstark wie Industrie PCs
description.content:
Das B&R Power Panel 500 vereint Steuerung, Visualisierung und Antriebstechnik in einer kompakten Bedieneinheit
(fair-NEWS) - (pressebox) Eggelsberg, 22.12.2010 - Ausgestattet mit den Intel Atom Z510, Z520 und Z530 Prozessoren erschließt die neue Power Panel 500 Generation Performancebereiche, die bisher nur Industrie PCs vorbehalten waren. Mit der modernen Intel Atom Architektur profitieren Anwender von einer einzigartigen Kombination aus geringer Verlustleistung und höchster Performance zu einem attraktiven Preis. Das Power Panel 500 kann mit bis zu 2 GB Hauptspeicher ausgestattet werden, sodass selbst anspruchsvollste Applikationen optimal ablaufen.
Die umfangreiche Produktpalette reicht vom 5,7" VGA bis hin zum 15" XGA Panel mit intuitiv bedienbarem Touch Screen und Funktionstasten und stellt somit eine ideale Basis anwenderfreundlicher Bedienkonzepte dar.
Flexible Systemerweiterung
Eine Gigabit Ethernet Schnittstelle sorgt für schnelle Kommunikation zum Fabriknetz. Zusätzlich kann ein weiteres Gigabit Ethernet Interface optional assembliert werden. Dezentrale I/Os und Antriebe lassen sich mittels modularer Feldbusschnittstellen auf einfache Weise anbinden. Je nach Anforderung können die Power Panels mit POWERLINK, CAN-Bus, Profibus DP oder anderen Feldbus Schnittstellen erweitert werden. Dadurch lassen sich Topologien auch zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt auf einfache Weise ergänzen.
Das Power Panel 500 schlägt die Brücke zwischen Echtzeitbetriebssystem und den Standard Betriebssystemen wie Windows CE, Windows XP und Windows 7. Auch der gleichzeitige Einsatz von Windows und Echtzeitbetriebssystem ist möglich. Die universellen Einsatzmöglichkeiten reduzieren den logistischen Aufwand erheblich, da immer dieselbe Systemplattform verwendet wird.
Kompakte Bauform
Dank der Integration von Steuerung, Visualisierung und Antriebstechnik in einem Gerät zeichnet sich das intelligente Power Panel 500 durch ein Höchstmaß an Durchgängigkeit und einfachste Anbindung an unterschiedliche Automatisierungs-Infrastrukturen aus. Großes Augenmerk wurde im Zuge der Konstruktion auf eine minimale Bautiefe gelegt, sodass die neue Power Panel Reihe auch unter beengten Platzverhältnissen optimal eingesetzt werden kann. Entwickelt für den Einsatz in rauesten Industrieumgebungen gewährleistet das kompakte Power Panel 500 höchste Zuverlässigkeit und besten Bedienkomfort.

description.hltext_display: HP LaserJet Pro CP1025激光倾心上市
description.content:
2010年12月21日 20:23 出处：泡泡网 【原创】 作者:王琛 编辑:王琛
“全民秀场”的时代，利用色彩实现眼球经济已经得到了大众共识。从衣着打扮到文件打印，从商务工作到家庭生活，人们对色彩的需求和应用随着科技的发展而日益多样，色彩正在潜移默化地改变着我们的沟通方式。为更好地满足用户日益增长的彩色输出需求，近日，惠普全面发力彩色激光打印市场，继多款经典产品后，推出了一款集经济、实用与时尚为一体入门级彩激新品HP LaserJet Pro CP1025，旨在为包括家庭及SOHO在内的广大用户，打造360度的多彩工作和生活。
色彩出众 “慧”经济
作为全球体积最小的彩色激光打印机，新品不仅价格实惠，使用成本更加经济，用户可获得与HP黑白激光打印机完全相同的单页黑白打印成本；HP ImageREt 2400技术和采用HP Color Sphere碳粉的惠普原装硒鼓，则可确保输出色泽饱满的文本和平滑的色彩，让用户轻松体验色彩为工作和生活带来的改变。
新品采用“0”秒预热技术，首页输出速度较前代产品更显卓越，黑白仅为 15.5秒、彩色为27.5秒；16ppm（黑白）和4ppm（彩色）的打印速度，也更符合家庭、SOHO及中小型用户的输出需求和使用习惯。
简单便捷“慧”实用
通过产品附带的HP Creative Studio for Business软件，用户可自行设计市场宣传材料，获得打印项目的灵感，提升沟通效果，为企业用户获得更多生意机会。同时，新品具备广泛的介质兼容能力，能够处理从3x5到8.5x14英寸，包括普通A4纸、标签、信封、投影胶片、卡片、再生纸及糙纸等多种介质，不仅适用于合同、标书等商用办公应用，还可以实现优惠券、作业、旅游攻略、贺卡、手工等各类日常生活中的实际应用，满足家庭用户不断增长的多样化彩色输出需求。
新品性能稳定，操作简单，无需专业人员指导，即可快速、轻松地使用和维护设备；通过预配置的快捷键，可根据所选的介质类型，优化输出质量；利用基本色彩匹配设置，轻松调节专色，获得理想的输出效果。广泛的实用性和良好的易用性，成就了入门级用户的最佳选择。
小巧环保 “慧”时尚
相对于目前惠普其他的彩色激光打印机，HP LaserJet Pro CP1025不仅体积最小，而且也是最节能的一款。采用惠普最新的电源自动开关技术，能够按照用户需求自动开关打印机，节省电能；“0”秒预热技术，可将能耗降低约50%；利用惠普智能网页打印软件，用户可灵活、准确地打印所需网页，提升纸张的利用率；惠普地球伙伴计划，为用户提供免费、轻松的硒鼓回收体验，引领绿色时尚潮流。
400x492x399毫米的超小外形尺寸，轻便灵活，就像是彩激中的“小萝莉”，无论放在办公室还是摆在家里都非常合适，尽显时尚品味。
HP LaserJet Pro CP1025以更低的成本、更加个性化的色彩应用以及更加时尚的使用理念，完全突破了“办公用品”的局限，彩色激光打印设备将逐渐从写字楼走进SOHO Loft工作室, 走向千家万户的书房案头，帮助用户在工作和生活中全方位实现“慧表达”，以更加有效的沟通方式为用户创造更多价值！

description.hltext_display: पाक में अमेरिका के विशेष प्रशिक्षण बल मौजूद
description.content:
वाशिंगटन। पेंटागन ने कहा है कि पाकिस्तान में अमेरिका के कुछ विशेष प्रशिक्षक मौजूद हैं जो वहां के सैन्य प्रशिक्षकों को आतंकवाद के खिलाफ अभियान के बेहतर संचालन का प्रशिक्षण देते हैं।
पेंटागन के प्रवक्ता जियोफ मोरेल ने एक न्यूज चैनल से साक्षात्कार में कहा कि पाकिस्तान में कुछ समय से हमारे कुछ विशेष प्रशिक्षक मौजूद हैं जिनकी संख्या 100 से कम है। हम पाकिस्तानी सैन्य प्रशिक्षकों को प्रशिक्षण दे रहे हैं जो बाद में आतंकवाद से निपटने की नीतियों को बेहतर ढंग से अंजाम देने में अपने बलों को प्रशिक्षित करने में सक्षम होंगे। पाकिस्तान के कबाइली इलाकों में मौजूद आतंकी नेताओं को पकड़ने या मार गिराने के लिए पाकिस्तान के भीतर जमीनी हमलों को विस्तारित करने के संबंध में अफगानिस्तान में मौजूद अमेरिकी कमांडरों द्वारा दबाव बनाए जाने की खबरों के बारे में उन्होंने कहा कि फिलहाल इस तरह की कोई योजना नहीं है।
मोरेल ने कहा कि हम पहले भी कह चुके हैं कि हम पाकिस्तानी सेना के साथ हर तरह से काम करने को तैयार हैं, लेकिन पाकिस्तान एक संप्रभु देश है और यह एक भागीदारी हैं और हम उसके हितों के अनुरुप ही काम करेंगे।
मोबाइल पर ताजा खबरें, फोटो, वीडियो व लाइव स्कोर देखने के लिए जाएं m.jagran.com पर

description.hltext_display: درخواست سرکرده منافقين از جريان فتنه درباره هدفمندي يارانه‌ها
description.content:
سرکرده گروهک تروريستي منافقين فتنه گران را "جوانان دلير" ناميده و از آنان درخواست کرده است که قانون هدفمند کردن
يارانه ها را به "چالش بزرگي" براي خود نظام تبديل کنند!شبکه ايران درست همزمان با آغاز اجراي اين قانون، سرکرده گروهک منافقين، به عنوان يکي از گروه هاي فعال فتنه، خواستار اخلال در اجراي اين قانون و تبديل کردن آن به يک "چالش" براي ايران شد.مريم رجوي در سخناني بامزه اجراي قانون هدفمندي کردن يارانه ها را به
آشوب هاي سال گذشته مرتبط و آن را "جنگ عليه جامعه ايران" توصيف کرد!سرکرده گروهک تروريستي منافقين در ادامه فتنه گران را "جوانان دلير" ناميده و با تقدير از تلاش آنان در ايجاد آشوب هاي سال 88، از آنان درخواست کرده است که قانون هدفمند کردن يارانه ها را به "چالش بزرگي" براي خود نظام تبديل کنند!

description.hltext_display: Leia trecho do livro "Só Garotos", de Patti Smith
description.content: [Trecho de "Só Garotos", de Patti Smith, relata o encontro da autora, antes da fama, com o poeta beatnik Allen Ginsberg, em uma cafeteria de Nova York, em 1969] Eu estava sempre faminta. Meu metabolismo era muito rápido. Robert conseguia ficar sem comer muito mais tempo do que eu. Se estávamos sem dinheiro, a gente simplesmente não comia. Robert ainda conseguia funcionar, embora ficasse um pouco agitado, mas eu parecia que ia desmaiar. Uma tarde chuvosa fiquei com desejo de um daqueles sanduíches de queijo e alface. Procurei em nossas coisas e achei exatamente 55 centavos, coloquei as moedas em minha capa de chuva cinza, com meu chapéu de Maiakóvski, e fui ao Automat. Peguei minha bandeja e depositei as moedas, mas o vidro não abriu. Tentei de novo sem sorte e então reparei que o preço havia subido para 65 centavos. Estava desapontada, para dizer o mínimo, quando ouvi uma voz dizer: "Posso ajudar?". Leia mais (22/12/2010 - 07h03)

description.hltext_display: Lotería de navidad
description.author: EFE
description.content: Ambiente que se vive en el Palacio de los Congresos

법원이 방응모 전 조선일보 사장을 ‘친일반민족행위자’로 사실상 결론냈다.
서울행정법원 행정11부(서태환 부장판사)는 22일 방우영 전 조선일보 명예회장이 행정안전부 장관을 상대로 낸 방응모 전 조선일보 사장 친일반민족행위결정처분취소 청구 소송에서 “친일행위가 대부분 인정된다”고 판시했다.
재판부는 판결문에서 “방 전 사장은 자신이 운영하던 잡지 ‘조광’에 일제의 침략전쟁에 동조하고 내선일체를 강조하는 문예물 등을 게재하고 우리 민족에게 물심양면으로 협력할 것을 주문하는 논문을 게재한 점이 인정된다”며 “방 전 사장은 일제에 적극 협력했다고 볼 수 있다”고 밝혔다.
이어 백범 김구, 만해 한용운 등과 지속적 교분이 있었으므로 친일인사가 아니라는 원고 측 주장에 대해서는 “일부 독립운동을 지원한 사실이 인정되더라도 결정이 부당하다고 할 수 없다”고 설명했다.
다만 재판부는 “방 전 사장이 조선항공공업 주식회사의 설립 발기인 중 한 명으로서 설립 후 감사로 등재된 사실은 인정되지만 실제로 운영을 했다고 보기 어렵다”며 “해당 행위를 친일 행위로 결정한 부분은 취소한다”고 밝혔다.
결론적으로 이번 재판에서 원고인 방 전 명예회장이 일부 승소하기는 했지만, “(방응모 사장의 친일행위가 대부분 인정된다”는 법원 판결을 볼 때 사실상 패소한 셈.
방 전 사장은 1933년부터 1940년까지 조선일보 사장을 지내고 잡지 ‘조광’의 편집인 등으로 활동하다 6.25 전쟁 때 납북돼 1955년께 사망한 것으로 알려진다.
한편, 친일반민족행위 진상규명위원회는 지난해 “일제에 적극 협력한 점이 인정된다”며 방 전 사장을 친일반민족행위자로 결정하자 방 전 명예회장은 이를 취소해달라는 소송을 냈다.
[매경닷컴 뉴스센터]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: State Troopers will send you to jail for Christmas
description.content:
l send you to jail for Christmas
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 9:39 PM EST
You better watch out, and you better think twice before speeding or doing anything illegal on the roads this week. As usual, the traffic will be busy as people hit the road for the holidays.
College student Mercedes Jones and her two friends are on their way home.
"We're kind of worried about it because we're trying to get home for the holidays from Montevallo to Guntersville. I've noticed it's really busy."
She may see Corporal Steve Smith on the road. He says every available state trooper is on the road this week, and while they don't want to send people to jail for Christmas...
"We will put you there if we catch you drinking and driving."
Besides working accidents, they will be looking for speeders and folks who are not wearing seatbelts, too.
"Can't stress that enough," he says. "We've seen too many crashes the last couple of weeks where people were simply not buckled up and died as a consequence of that."
So as you travel this weekend, follow the rules or get ready to be pulled over by a state trooper near you.
"It's the time of year where people are spending money, and they don't need the added expense of a ticket."

event_or_fact.property: Can't stress that enough; We've seen too many crashes the last couple of weeks where people were simply not buckled up and died as a consequence of that.
every available state trooper is on the road this week, and while they don't want to send people to jail for Christmas... "We will put you there if we catch you drinking and driving.

description.hltext_display: La Bolsa mantiene los 10.200 puntos
description.content: El Ibex sube el 0,36% a la espera de conocer el PIB del tercer trimestre en Estados UnidosEl principal indicador de la Bolsa española, el Ibex 35, subía el 0,36% en los primeros compases de una jornada en la que los inversores tendrán la vista puesta al otro lado del Atlántico, donde se conocerá el PIB del tercer trimestre en Estados Unidos. A las 09.10 horas el selectivo recuperaba 42,80 puntos y se situaba en 10.246 unidades, en tanto que el Índice General de la Bolsa de Madrid, con todos sus sectores en positivo, avanzaba el 0,42%. El descenso acumulado desde enero se reducía al 14,18%. El resto de Bolsas europeas mantenía las dudas de la apertura, con avances del 0,49% en Milán, del 0,03% en Fráncfort, y del 0,01% en Londres, y descensos del 0,10% en París. La cita de la jornada se hará esperar hasta media sesión, cuando el Gobierno de Estados Unidos divulgue su cálculo definitivo del producto interior bruto (PIB) del tercer trimestre, que según el consenso de los analistas mostrará que la economía del país creció a un ritmo del tres por ciento. Las principales cotizadas españolas optaban por las subidas, del 0,81% para repsol, del 0,56% para Iberdrola, del 0,54% para BBVA, del 0,36% para Endesa, del 0,29% para Santander, del 0,40% para Telefónica, y del 0,24% para Inditex. BME lograba el mayor avance del índice, del 1,03%, en tanto que solo dos valores encajaban descensos, Banesto (0,64%) y Acciona (0,18%).

description.hltext_display: TRON Guy's Costume -- Banned from Movie Theater
description.author: TMZ Staff
description.content:
26 minutes ago by TMZ Staff
MILLIONS have viewed his YouTube videos -- but a movie theater in Minnesota doesn't care ... because we're told they won't let TRON Guy see the new remake in the costume that made him an Internet legend.
Jay Maynard -- who's been doing the Tron Guy thing since '04 -- tells TMZ, he gave his local movie theater a heads-up that he planned to see the new "Tron" flick in his famous costume ... but for some reason, they "adamantly" insisted he wouldn't be admitted if he suited up.
We don't know why management refused -- the suit OBVIOUSLY belongs in a museum -- but Maynard believes it's because his masterpiece is "too distracting."
Sidenote -- has anyone seen his stapler?

description.hltext_display: Southerners are Simply Potty About Their Cats...
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- Cat lovers everywhere can tell you what they love most about their cats, but what about the habits that drive them potty? A survey by Your Cat magazine and HiLife Potty about ... cat food has revealed what drives Southerners potty about their cats. It seems that not being able to have a bath without the cat crying comes top of the agenda, followed by cats that steal socks and underwear! Some wake up their owners by nipping their toes, while others get their owners' attention by throwing things on the floor!
Despite all of this, Southerners are truly potty about their potty cats. And some of cats do truly strange things. One owner reported her cat likes to sleep in the sink, and another in the cat litter tray - but only when there's clean litter in it of course! Some cats are potty about potatoes, while others prefer curry, raspberry jelly, or even shoe-laces! Probably the strangest choice of food in the South is the cat that likes popcorn. Well there's no accounting for taste!
Above all their quirkiness, Southerners are still potty about their cats; their loving temperament, affection and individuality seems to be the eternal attraction - so it seems that Brits and their cats seem to be bonded by a delightful touch of pottiness!

description.hltext_display: Foreign words to be standardized
description.content:
BEIJING - Chinese media organizations and publishers are banned from randomly mixing foreign languages with Chinese in publications. When it is necessary to use foreign phrases or words, they should be accompanied by a translation or explanation in Chinese, according to a new regulation.
The regulation was issued on Monday by the General Administration of Press and Publication (GAPP) with the aim of standardizing the use of language in newspapers and other publications, particularly when foreign languages are employed.
The administration said the increasingly random appearance of foreign words and abbreviations, especially English, in publications is damaging the Chinese language.
Under the regulation, abbreviations such as GDP (gross domestic product), CEO (chief executive officer) and CPI (consumer price index), which regularly feature in publications, should either be translated into Chinese or followed by explanatory notes in Chinese.
This includes requiring the use of English place names, people and companies to be translated into Chinese.
The GAPP instructed local administrative departments of publications to employ the "standardized use of foreign language" as a criterion for evaluating domestic publications and warned that those who fail to follow the regulation will be punished.
Some publishers consider part of the regulation as an "unnecessary" requirement that will complicate the publishing process.
"The intention of protecting the Chinese language is good. But in an age of globalization, when some English acronyms like WTO (World Trade Organization) have been widely accepted by readers, it might be too absolute to eliminate them in all publications," said an editor at a Beijing publishing house, who declined to be named.
"Conversationally, people also use these words all the time, so the regulation could create discord between the oral and written uses of language."
To safeguard the purity of Chinese against the encroaching use of English is an issue that has attracted widespread comments in China, where some have referred to it as "the crisis of Chinese".
China Youth Daily on Tuesday released the results of a survey on the issue, according to which 80 percent of the 3,269 Chinese who responded agreed that their native language is in crisis, with 52 percent laying the blame on "Chinese people now pay more attention to learning English than Chinese".
He Yang, a professor of Chinese at Renmin University of China, conducted a research project in 2009, in which 319 students at four universities in Beijing were tested on their knowledge of Chinese. Only 2 percent of his sample achieved a score of more than 70 out of 100, while 30 percent failed the test.
Earlier this year, Huang Youyi, deputy director of the China International Publishing Group, wrote a proposal in March to the annual session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, in which he stated: "Measures and regulations should be adopted to avoid English invading Chinese."
While some other experts have agreed that the standard use of Chinese should be encouraged, they said it is an exaggeration to brand the situation a crisis.
Ma Zhuanghuan, a professor of linguistics at Beijing International Studies University, said he supports the new regulation, because publishers and members of the media should take the backgrounds of readers into account and not use languages too randomly.
"However, I disagree that mixing languages in publications is detrimental to Chinese, because it is natural for one language to be affected by another in its development," he said.

event_or_fact.property: Measures and regulations should be adopted to avoid English invading Chinese.
he supports the new regulation, because publishers and members of the media should take the backgrounds of readers into account and not use languages too randomly
professor of linguistics, Beijing International Studies University
However, I disagree that mixing languages in publications is detrimental to Chinese, because it is natural for one language to be affected by another in its development

description.hltext_display: Police: Thousands of tons of wild animals smuggled through Vietnam to China in past year
description.content:
HANOI, Vietnam - Police in Vietnam say an estimated 4,500 tons of wild animals — mostly snakes, turtles and pangolins — have been smuggled through the Southeast Asian country during the past year.
Lt. Col. Vu Duyen Hai of the Department of Environmental Police says the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines.
Hai says the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials. He says he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals.
He said Wednesday that the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines
the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials
the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

description.hltext_display: Dozens injured in Chile prison riot
description.content:
At least 34 people were injured yesterday during a prison riot in northern Chile. The violence broke out in the prison of Antofagasta, a port city located some 1 130 km north of Santiago. Some 100 inmates held a demonstration to show solidarity with the 81 victims killed in the San Miguel prison fire two weeks earlier, according to prison officials.
Thirty or forty inmates raced to the roof where they waved sticks and other makeshift weapons and set objects on fire. "We had a riot in the prison. Inmates from Units One, Two and Three were involved and we evacuated - we have the chance to evacuate the other inmates who were not in the riot," said prison director, Victor Hugo Miranda.
He added that of the 34 prisoners injured, four were taken to the hospital. Six members of the security forces suffered minor injuries. As the situation developed, anxious relatives waited outside the prison, hoping for information from police. "They haven't told us anything. They shot at the boys who were up there, one fell. If they're robbers, they're robbers - they are flesh and bone," said one relative, Violeta Albornoz.
According to prison officials, the jail suffers from severe overcrowding. Although designed for a maximum of 684 inmates, it currently holds almost double that, housing 1 326. – Reuters
Use your mobile phone to find news in a flash at www.sabcnews.mobi

description.hltext_display: Two Canadians among latest Carnegie hero award recipients
description.author: The Canadian Press
description.content: PITTSBURGH, Pa. One battled roaring flames, another fought off a stabbing attack both risked their own lives to save strangers.

2013년부터 우리나라에서 일본 도쿄 나리타공항으로 가는 하늘길이 자유화된다. 운항횟수와 항공사 수 등 제한 없이 직항노선 운항이 가능해지는 것이다. 다만 김포공항은 제외된다.
국토해양부는 21일과 22일 일본 도쿄에서 개최된 한ㆍ일 항공회담에서 내년 3월 말부터 한국~나리타 노선 운항횟수를 주 14회 더 늘리고, 2013년 3월 말부터 제한 없는 운항을 허용하는 데 합의했다고 밝혔다.
양국은 이미 2007년 도쿄를 제외한 한ㆍ일 항공자유화에 합의한 바 있어 인천~나리타는 주 67회, 부산~나리타와 제주~나리타는 각각 주 7회 운항 중이다.
하지만 나리타 외에 도쿄 시내와 가까운 하네다공항 운항 증대와 자유화 논의는 이번 회담에서는 제외됐다.
나리타공항이 완전 자유화되면 대한항공과 아시아나항공만 운항하던 이 노선에 다른 항공사들도 자유롭게 운항할 수 있게 된다. 주 81회 운항에도 평균 탑승률이 80%를 웃돌았던 이 노선 좌석난도 내년 3월부터 한결 풀릴 것으로 보인다.
국토부는 조만간 항공사들에 운항횟수를 배분해 내년 3월부터 운항에 차질이 없도록 하기로 했다.
[배한철 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: ايران جزء سه اولويت نخست سياست خارجي آمريکا است
Certain Brandy Beans liqueur chocolate recalled over undeclared milk
description.author: rharvey@tricubemedia.com (The Canadian Press
description.content:
OTTAWA - People with milk allergies are being warned to avoid certain VSC Chocolats Brandy Bean Liqueur Chocolates because they may contain milk not declared on the label.
The German-made chocolates were sold in 200 gram packs with lot codes L7058 J8 and L5177 J8.
They were distributed nationally.
There have been no reported illnesses so far, but eating the chocolates could cause a serious or life-threatening reaction in those with allergies to milk proteins.
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is working with the importer to have the chocolates pulled from store shelves.

description.hltext_display: 2块豆腐能供1天人体所需钙质
description.content:
用大豆直接制成食品，人体对其蛋白质的消化吸收率只有65%;而制成豆腐以后，消化吸收率就可以提高到92%-95%。
大豆油脂的亚油酸比例较大，且不含胆固醇，不但有益于人体神经、血管、大脑的发育生长，而且还可以预防心血管病、肥胖等常见病的发生。
此外，豆腐含有丰富的植物雌激素，对防治骨质疏松症有良好的作用。不说不知道，原来两块豆腐即可满足一个人一天钙的需要量。
好的水豆腐应无水纹、无杂质、洁白细嫩。内有水纹、有气泡、有细微颗粒、颜色微黄的为劣质豆腐。鉴别水豆腐是否细嫩，可手握1枚缝衣针，在离豆腐30厘米高处松手，让针自由下落，针能插入豆腐的则为优质豆腐。
豆腐富含蛋白质，容易被微生物污染。有的不法生产者为了延长豆腐的存放期，会在豆腐中使用苯甲酸钠防腐剂。因此，买豆腐时，应选择正规厂家制造、带有包装的豆腐。
豆腐虽然有上面提到的各种好处，但也不要天天吃，而且一次不要吃太多，因为豆腐性偏寒，胃寒、易腹泻腹胀、脾虚者不要多吃。老年人和肾病、缺铁性贫血、动脉硬化患者更要控制食用量。豆腐含嘌呤较多，嘌呤代谢失常的痛风病人和血尿酸浓度增高的患者多吃豆腐可能导致痛风发作。

description.hltext_display: 2011彩打趋势惠普彩激策略及产品亮相
description.content:
2010年12月21日，惠普隆重推出了以“惠彩・慧表达，色彩改变沟通”为主题的策略及新品发布会，不仅以全新的理念推动彩打应用，更将[目前惠普彩色激光打印机系列中全球最小、最节能的新品HP LaserJet Pro CP1025带到中国，全面发力彩色激光打印机市场。惠普此举旨在倡导大家运用彩色改变沟通方式，提升沟通效果，并以丰富齐全的产品满足从家庭、SOHO应用到SMB办公及企业自主打印日益增长的彩色输出需求，让工作更高效、生活更多彩、沟通更便捷。
与传统发布会不同的是，惠普还特别邀请到了西蔓色彩专家和博洛尼室内设计专家，在活动现场共同为大家开办色彩大讲堂，让到场来宾亲手打造色彩大秀场，共同奉献了2010年度最具风格的一场色彩盛宴。正如惠普公司打印及成像系统集团亚太区彩色激光打印机产品经理招伟权先生所言：“眼球经济时代，色彩的重要性早已不言而喻；事实上，色彩不仅能够带来直观的视觉冲击，它所能带来的改变更是不容小觑。如今的彩色激光打印机无论从价格上，还是使用成本上都已变得平易近人，毫不夸张地说，彩色打印在人们未来的工作和生活中都将扮演越来越重要的作用，并让每个人都能轻松实现更‘智慧’的表达。”
感悟色彩，人人都是专家
大众对色彩的渴望和追求由来已久，同时也越来越注重色彩在沟通和表达方面的重要作用，而打印输出作为沟通的必要方式，其所能实现的效果与人们的工作和生活息息相关，因此如何运用色彩提升文档表现力显得尤为重要。“多年来，惠普始终以高品质的产品引领着彩激打印市场的发展和变迁。经过多年的深耕和积累，今天惠普呈现给大家的是涵盖家庭、SOHO、SMB、Enterprise等所有用户层面的全线彩激产品，无论是传统的商用办公打印，还是个性的日常生活应用，惠普彩激均能提供完善的产品和解决方案。”中国惠普有限公司打印及成像系统集团市场部经理刘智这样诠释惠普彩激策略。
惠普彩激的色彩理念与另外两大色彩专家――西蔓色彩和博洛尼不谋而合。无论是通过服饰色彩搭配彰显个性，还是借助居室色彩变幻调节情绪，都与打印输出一样，是每个人工作和生活中必不可少的实用工具。在发布会现场，西蔓色彩色研中心的江纯青总监为来宾例举了在个人形象设计及商业形象领域运用色彩，以凸显个性，展现自身或企业的优势的应用，而博洛尼室内设计师王元昭则讲述了通过色彩改变环境风格，根据不同的要求和用途设计空间，提升工作和生活品质的案例，精彩演讲引发来宾的共鸣。
在经过了三大专家对色彩运用的简单诠释后，每位来宾转眼间都变成了“色彩专家”。大家借助现场的惠普彩色激光打印机等色彩工具，将原本单调、乏味的家庭、SOHO、SMB以及大企业办公室等4个空间，在很短的时间内改造成了美轮美奂的炫彩世界。而经历了华丽变装后的嘉宾们也变成了T台的宠儿，在这一特别的舞台上，每个人都亲身感受到了色彩带来的改变。
惠彩表达，色彩融入生活
本次发布会的另外一场重头戏无疑是新品亮相环节，焕然一新、盛装出场的中国惠普有限公司打印及成像系统集团市场开发经理刘颖女士，在动感的乐曲中，携[目前惠普彩色激光打印机系列中全球最小、最节能的新品HP LaserJet Pro CP1025，在流光溢彩的舞台上惊艳亮相，立刻成为了全场关注的焦点。经过西蔓色彩专家精心“换装”的刘颖表示：“今天我跟到场来宾一样，通过亲身参与，体验到了色彩带来的改变。希望今后更多用户可以借助这款工作和生活色彩秀场的‘设计师’，获得与我一样的体验。这是惠普继以往多款经典彩激产品之后，推出的一款更加经济、个性、时尚的入门级彩激新品，旨在将这种色彩的改变带给更多用户，特别是彩打需求不断增多的家庭及SOHO用户，帮助他们实现更高效率的工作以及更高品质的生活。”
此次推出的彩激新品HP LaserJet Pro CP1025正是对惠普彩色输出理念的诠释。作为一款主打家庭、SOHO和中小企业用户的入门级彩激，CP1025创造了目前惠普两个彩激产品之最：最小巧彩激、最节能彩激。这款产品不仅节省空间，安置方便，而且打印黑白文档的成本与普通黑白激光打印机一样，可谓一机多用。这样一款低成本、多用途的彩激，让更多用户能够轻松获得彩色输出的乐趣。
为了让更多的人体验到色彩带来的改变，惠普彩激还联手西蔓色彩和博洛尼推出的主题为“惠彩・慧表达，色彩改变沟通”的大型网络活动（页面链接：http://cs.sina.com.cn/minisite/hpcolorsid/index.html）。网友可以参与“寻找色彩宝藏”、“发布色彩梦想”等一系列趣味活动，并通过微博与朋友分享自己的成果。幸运网友将有机会获得三大色彩专家联手打造的“惠彩大礼包”，用色彩装扮与众不同的2011年！

성매매나 음주운전을 하다가 적발된 공무원에 대한 징계가 크게 강화된다.
행정안전부는 성매매를 근절하기 위해 `공무원 징계령 시행규칙`에 성매매한 공무원의 징계 기준을 신설할 방침이라고 22일 밝혔다.
현재 징계령 시행규칙에는 성폭행과 성희롱에 대한 징계 기준이 있지만 성매매 관련 기준은 별도로 없어 성매매한 공무원을 적발해도 `품위유지 의무 위반`의 기타 항목을 근거로 징계했다. 이로 인해 성매매한 공무원이 형사 처벌과 별도로 소속 기관에서 주의나 경고 등 가벼운 처분만 받은 사례가 많았다.
행안부는 또한 `공무원 비위사건 처리규정`을 고쳐 음주운전을 하다 적발돼 면허가 처음 정지된 공무원은 기존의 경고 처분 대신 경징계를 하는 등 음주운전 징계 수위도 높이기로 했다.
음주운전으로 면허가 취소된 상태에서 운전하다 적발되면 경징계에 그치지 않고 경우에 따라 파면이나 해임 등 중징계하는 방안도 추진된다.
행안부는 내년 상반기 구체적인 법령 개정 작업에 착수해 하반기부터 적용할 방침이다.
행안부 관계자는 "이 기준을 통해 성매매하다 적발되면 큰 불이익을 당할 수 있다는 인식이 공직사회에서 확산돼 성매매를 줄이는 효과가 있을 것"이라고 말했다.
[배한철 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Kein Anspruch auf Umgangsrecht mit Familienhund
description.content: (fair-NEWS) - (lifepr) Düsseldorf, 22.12.2010 - In dem vom Gericht mitgeteilten Fall verblieb der während der Ehezeit angeschaffte Hund nach der Trennung vereinbarungsgemäß beim Ehemann. Die Ehefrau wollte an zwei Tagen in der Woche für jeweils einige Stunden ein Umgangsrecht mit dem Hund gerichtlich durchsetzen und begehrte hierfür die Bewilligung von Verfahrenskostenhilfe. Mit ihrem Begehren drang sie bei Gericht nicht durch. Ein gesetzlicher Anspruch auf eine zeitlich begrenzte Nutzungsregelung hinsichtlich des Hundes besteht nach Auffassung des OLG Hamm nicht. Mit den Vorschriften über die Hausratsverteilung bei Getrenntleben der Ehegatten kann die begehrte zeitweise Nutzungsregelung nicht begründet werden. Denn es wird nicht die Zuweisung für die Dauer der Trennung, sondern nur die zeitweise Nutzung verlangt, so das OLG. Auch die Regelungen über das Umgangsrecht mit dem Kind waren nach Auskunft der ARAG hier nicht analog anwendbar. Denn bei diesen Bestimmungen geht es in erster Linie um das Wohl des Kindes und nicht um die emotionalen Bedürfnisse des anderen Ehegatten (OLG Hamm, Az.: II-10 WF 240/10).

description.hltext_display: BROMLEY: Kidney patient, 70, goes missing from hospital
description.content:
A 70-YEAR-OLD kidney patient from Bromley has gone missing from hospital.
Anton Peries was last seen at around noon yesterday (December 21) at Kings College Hospital, Denmark Hill, where he regularly goes for treatment for a kidney condition which requires dialysis.
Police are concerned because if he does not receive this regular medication his condition can deteriorate quickly with potentially fatal consequences.
And they say he can often seem confused because of his medical conditions.
He is described as being a light skinned Asian man, between 5ft 8in and 5ft 10in tall and slim with medium length dark hair.
The top of his head is bald and he has long sideburns.
When he was last seen he was wearing dark trousers and a dark jacket.
It is not thought that Mr Peries has any cash or cards with him and he was not carrying his mobile phone.
Given the severe weather, police are extremely anxious to trace him as soon as possible.
Anyone with information is urged to call the police on 020 8649 2062 or call Missing People on 0500 700700.

description.hltext_display: Obituaries for Wednesday, Dec. 22
description.author: The Fresno Bee
description.content:
ABBOTT -- Wendell T. Abbott, 74, of Lemoore died Saturday. He was a parachute rigger in the U.S. Navy. Graveside: 2 p.m. Thursday, Lemoore Cemetery. Arrangements: Phipps-Dale Funeral Chapel.
BEBEAU -- Mary Elizabeth Bebeau, of Clovis, died Sunday. She was a schoolteacher. Private family services. Arrangements: Serenity Funeral Services in Fresno.
CALVILLO -- Anita Calvillo, 38, of Porterville died Thursday. She was a child support officer. Services: 10 a.m. Monday, Myers Chapel.
CANDELARIA -- Lupe G. Candelaria, 58, of Corcoran died Saturday. He was a mixing cook for Del Monte Cannery. Visitation: 1 to 3 p.m. Tuesday, Bledsoe Family People's Funeral Chapel.
DE LECCE-CAGLIA -- Tessie De Lecce-Caglia, 88, of Fresno died Friday. She was a homemaker. Visitation: 10 to 11 a.m. today, Our Lady of Victory Catholic Church. Rosary: 11 a.m. today at the church. Mass: 11:30 a.m. today at the church. In lieu of flowers: Alzheimer's Association, P.O. Box 96011, Washington, D.C. 20090-6011. Arrangements: Farewell Funeral Service.
DILLARD -- Robert Lee Dillard, 73, of Fresno died Saturday. He was a moulder. Mass: 1 p.m. today, St. Catherine's Catholic Church in Dinuba. Arrangements: Dopkins Funeral Chapel in Dinuba.
DILLIARD -- James Robert Dilliard, 74, of Fresno died Monday. He was a retired agronomist. Memorial services are pending. Remembrances: Community College Foundation, Melanee Knoblett Burchfield Scholarship Fund, 1525 E. Weldon Ave., Fresno, CA 93704. Arrangements: Neptune Society of Central California.
EBNER -- Carl Ebner, 82, of Tulare died Sunday. He was a Dairyman's (Land-O-Lakes) employee for 35 years. Memorial: 11 a.m. Thursday, Praise Center Church in Visalia. Arrangements: Peers Lorentzen Funeral Chapel.
FLETCHER -- James Anderson Fletcher Jr., 71 of Hanford died Thursday. He was an electrician. Private services were held. Arrangements: People's Funeral Chapel.
GLOVER -- Sally Jayne Glover, 72, of Fresno died Dec. 11. She was a computer support analyst. Remembrances: NAMI, 7545 N. Del Mar Ave., Suite 105, Fresno, CA 93711. Arrangements: Cremation Society of Central California.
HARTWIG -- Frances Cocola Hartwig, of Fresno, died Sunday. She was a homemaker. Visitation: 5 to 7 p.m. Sunday, Farewell Funeral Service. Rosary: 11 a.m. Monday, St. Anthony of Padua Catholic Church. Mass: 11:30 a.m. Monday at the church. Remembrances: Catholic Charities, 149 N. Fulton St., Fresno, CA 93701-1607 or Hinds Hospice, 1616 W. Shaw Ave., Suite A-5, Fresno, CA 93711.
HAYES -- Berry Hayes Jr., 68, of Los Banos died Nov. 21. Memorial: 10 a.m. Tuesday, Whitehurst Funeral Chapel.
KUMATAKA -- Tomiko Kumataka, 90, of Fresno died Monday. She was a homemaker. Visitation: 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. Sunday, Lisle Funeral Home. Services: 12 p.m. Monday, Lisle Calaveras Chapel.
LEVY -- Patricia J. Levy, 75, of Fresno died Saturday. She was a teacher for Fresno Unified School District. Private family services. Arrangements: Farewell Funeral Service.
MALANCA -- Dennis E. Malanca Sr., 67, of O'Neals died Saturday. He was a retired U.S. Postal Service clerk. No services. Remembrances: Madera County Search & Rescue, in care of Sgt. Jim Bernardi, 48267 Liberty Drive, Oakhurst, CA 93644. Arrangements: Jay Chapel in Madera.
MARTINEZ -- Santos Alcala Martinez, 85, of Fresno died Thursday. He was a truck driver for 30 years. Visitation: 4 to 8 p.m. Monday, Farewell Funeral Service. Graveside: noon Tuesday, Belmont Memorial Park.
MARTINUSEN -- William Martinusen, 66, of Hanford died Monday. He was a repair technician for AT&T. Celebration of life: 11 a.m. Tuesday, People's Funeral Chapel.
MENDEZ -- Jairo Mendez, 21, of Fresno died Dec. 14. He was a production worker for Foster Farms. Mass: 2 p.m. today, St. John's Cathedral. Arrangements: Chapel of the Light Funeral Home.
MENDOZA -- George L. Mendoza, 58, of Orange Cove died Sunday. He was a field laborer. Visitation: 4 to 6 p.m. Dec. 29, St. Isidore the Farmer Catholic Church. Services: 10 a.m. Dec. 30 at the church. Arrangements: Thomas-Robinson Funeral Home in Selma.
MOLINA -- Robert C. Molina, 46, of Firebaugh died Dec. 11. He was a student at the University of California at Berkeley. Rosary and Mass: 10 a.m. today, Our Lady of Guadalupe Catholic Church in Mendota. Arrangements: Chapel of the Light Funeral Home in Fresno.
NICHOLS -- Ronald E. Nichols, 59, of Lemoore died Monday. He was a cook. Memorial: 2 p.m. today, Grace Baptist Church. Remembrances: Grace Baptist Church, P.O. Box 26, Lemoore, CA 93245. Arrangements: Phipps-Dale Funeral Chapel.
POOLE -- Glover S. Poole, 85, of Fresno died Dec. 10. He was a court clerk. No services. Arrangements: Nova Cremation Service.
STANPHILL -- James Leroy Stanphill, 82, of Hanford died Dec. 15. He was service manager for Robert's Chevrolet. Private services. Arrangements: People's Funeral Chapel.

گزارش تكان دهنده سوء استفاده جنسي از كودكان توسط مسئولان مدارس در آمريكا
description.content:
گزارش رسمي جديدي از سوء استفاده جنسي گسترده از كودكان در مدارس آمريكا پرده برداشت.به گزارش باشگاه خبرنگاران به نقل از روزنامه ديلي ميل، دفتر حسابرسي كل آمريكا به بررسي بودجه دولتي براي مقابله با سوء استفاده هاي جنسي از كودكان در مدارس پرداخته و آن را بسيار ضعيف دانست.براساس گزارش اين دفتر،
سه چهارم مسئولان مدارس آمريكا كه سابقه سوء استفاده از
دانش آموزان را دارند از آنجايي‌كه اين سابقه هيچ‌گونه توبيخ و يا اخراجي براي آنها به دنبال نداشته، آزادانه به تكرار مكرر كودك آزاري هاي جنسي قربانيان خود مي پردازند.در بخش ديگري از اين گزارش آمده است: حتي به نيمي از اين مجرمان ارتقاي شغلي داده شده و بدين ترتيب اين افراد قربانيان بيشتري داشته اند.

حدیث (7160)
پيامبر اکرم (صلّي ‌الله ‌عليه ‌وآله):
دو رکعت نماز در دل شب نزد من محبوب‌تر است از دنيا و آنچه در آن است.
سرمقاله (7160)
محمد كاظم انبارلويي
1- ناظران جهاني رويدادهاي امروز ايران را بويژه در خصوص اجراي قانون هدفمند كردن يارانه‌ها رصد مي‌كنند. قيمت ده‌ها كالا اصلاح شده و قيمت برخي حامل‌هاي انرژي به چند برابر رسيده است. اما بازار ايران آرام، مردم آرام‌تر و مسئولان با تدبير كل تحولات را بي‌دغدغه مديريت مي‌كنند. سئوال مهم ناظران جهان اين است كه چگونه است ايران در شرايط تحريم و فشار مضاعف قدرت‌هاي جهاني در شرايطي كه تروريسم كور در گونه‌هاي متفاوت از يك سو دانشمندان ايران و از سوي ديگر عزاداران حسيني را نشانه گرفته، همچنين در شرايطي كه سران فتنه به عنوان دنباله آمريكا و رژيم صهيونيستي در داخل عمل مي‌كنند، دولت و مسئولان توانسته‌اند از بزرگترين پيچ و گردنه تاريخ اقتصادي كشور به سلامت عبور كنند.

아늑한 카페처럼 꾸며진 58.3㎡(17.6평) 규모 매장 안은 20여 명의 손님들로 북적거렸다.
빨간색 후드티 유니폼을 입고 앞치마를 두른 이가희 양(가명ㆍ18)은 "볶음밥에 햄과 베이컨을 넣으면 맛있어요"라며 환한 미소로 주문을 받았다.
가희처럼 이곳에서 일하는 10대 여자 청소년들은 모두 4명. 매장 이름처럼 `조잘조잘` 수다 떨기 좋아하고 발랄한 모습이지만 이들에겐 몇 달 전만 해도 이런저런 이유로 거리를 떠돌던 아픈 경험이 있다.
가게 간판엔 `십대 여성 자립실험실`이라고 적혀 있다. 가출 청소년들이 스스로 일어설 수 있는 기술을 배우고 의지를 다지며 꿈을 키우는 곳이다.
매장을 관리하는 늘푸른여성지원센터 관계자는 "경제 불황으로 가정에 위기가 닥치면서 거리로 내몰리는 10대가 최근 급격히 늘고 있다"며 "매년 위기의 10대 여성들만 10만명이 넘으며, 이들에게 가장 중요한 것은 일자리를 통한 경제적 자립"이라고 강조했다.
양은냄비에 홍합과 오징어를 듬뿍 넣어 `해물라면`을 끓이는 김명희 양(가명ㆍ19)도 경제적 어려움으로 가정 기반이 무너지면서 3년 전 집을 나왔다. 보호기관인 쉼터를 전전하면서 "아프다"는 말을 입에 달고 살았던 그는 "손님이 `잘 먹었다`고 말할 때 가장 기쁘고 힘이 난다"며 "더 이상 아프지 않도록 자기관리도 할 줄 알게 됐다"고 말했다.
일 욕심도 생겼다. 무엇보다 크리스마스 때 일해 보기는 처음이다. 명희 양은 "작년까지 크리스마스 때 거리에서 방황했지만 올해는 일하면서 뜻깊게 보내기로 했다"며 "일을 빨리 배우고 싶기 때문"이라고 말했다.
매장 운영 준비는 지난 9월 말부터 시작했다. 지난달 본격적으로 영업을 하기까지 메뉴를 개발하고 요리 연습을 하는 등 한 달간 눈코 뜰 새 없이 바쁜 시간을 보냈다. 2주에 걸쳐 시장조사를 하고 20ㆍ30대 직장인이 점심으로 먹기 편하면서 10대도 좋아하는 떡볶이, 볶음밥, 라면을 메뉴로 정했다.
칼도 제대로 잡을 줄 몰랐던 `예비 요리사`들은 하루 3시간씩 주방에 틀어박혀 채소를 씻고 다듬는 법부터 배우기 시작했다.
부모님을 모두 여의고 올여름 가출한 강경희 양(가명ㆍ18)은 `떡볶이 슬럼프`를 겪었다.
그는 "`맛있다`는 평을 들을 때까지 수십 번 만들어 먹었더니 지금은 `떡` 소리만 들어도 몸이 떨린다"고 했다. 주요 메뉴인 떡볶이 특제 양념소스는 시행 착오 끝에 매장을 열기 하루 전 완성됐다.
매장 일을 제법 소화하게 됐을 때 이들은 많이 달라져 있었다.
매장 운영 전반을 도맡아 하는 임은숙 씨(31)는 "초반엔 제멋대로 행동해서 일을 그르치는 경우가 많았지만 지금은 `우리 매장`이라는 주인의식은 물론 일에 대한 책임감과 자부심이 생긴 것 같다"며 흐뭇해했다.
하루 평균 손님은 60명 정도. 그는 "커피 메뉴를 추가했고 DJ부스도 곧 마련할 계획"이라며 "열심히 일하는 친구들 덕분에 손익분기점을 넘길 날도 머지않았다"고 자신했다.
꿈도 찾았다. 낮에 일하고 저녁엔 고등학교 검정고시 공부에 여념이 없는 명희 양은 "위기에 처한 10대들에게 도움을 줄 수 있는 사회복지사가 되고 싶다"고 말했다.
바리스타가 되려고 이달부터 일주일에 두 번씩 학원에 다니는 경희는 "2년 동안 매장에서 경험을 쌓고 예쁜 카페를 차리고 싶다"고 말했다.
이들은 한 달에 65만~90만원 받는 월급을 꼬박 저축한다. "지금 당장은 돌아갈 수 없지만 다음에 꼭 제가 번 돈으로 부모님께 용돈을 드리고, 가족에게도 선물을 주고 싶어요."
1~2년 일하면서 자립에 성공할 즈음, 20세 성인이 돼 맞는 `크리스마스 기적`이 모두의 공통된 꿈이기 때문이다.
미국 팝 가수 머라이어 캐리의 캐럴 노래 가사를 바꿔 `그녀들만의 크리스마스 캐럴`을 유쾌하게 부르는 그들.
"여러분 들어봐요, 꼭 할 말 있어요~. 변해가는 우리 모습, 이곳(자립 매장) 덕분이에요. 조잘조잘 친구들, 함께 웃는 모습이 너무 예쁘죠? All I Want for Christmas is YOU."
[임영신 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: बोनो ने आपरा विनफ्रे के शो का आफर � ुकराया
description.content:
न्यूयार्क। राक स्टार यू2 फ्रंटमैन बोनो ने आपरा विनफ्रे के नए टीवी नेटवर्क के लिए काम करने का आफर � ुकरा दिया है। न्यूयार्क टाइम्स के मुताबिक, मीडिया मुगल विनफ्रे ने संगीत आइकान बोनो सहित अन्य कई मशहूर हस्तियों जैसे जेनी मैककार्थी, रोजी ओडोनेल व रयान और टाटम ओनेल को अगले साल लांच हो रहे अपने टीवी नेटवर्क 'आपरा विनफ्रे नेटवर्क' पर अपना टाक शो होस्ट करने के लिए बुलाया था। विनफ्रे इस बात को लेकर आश्वस्त थीं कि बोनो का सबके प्रति लगाव और उसके परोपकार के काम टीवी के लिए बहुत अच्छा साबित होगा।
विनफ्रे ने कहा कि मैंने बोनो से पूछा, क्या तुम्हे टीवी शो पसंद हैं? मैंने सब कुछ देख लिया है यह एक अच्छा छीवी शो होगा। विनफ्रे बोनो से उनके खुद के टीवी शो के लिए बात की थी, मगर उसने मना कर दिया। टीवी नेटवर्क के लिए हालीवुड से जूलिया राबर्टस, फारेस्ट व्हाइटेकर और गोल्डी हान अपनी डाक्यूमेंटरी बनाएंगे। 25 साल तक सबसे बेहतर और मशहूर शो 'द आपरा विनफ्रे' की मेजबानी करने के बाद विनफ्रे अब अपना टीवी चैनल लांच कर रही हैं।
मोबाइल पर ताजा खबरें, फोटो, वीडियो व लाइव स्कोर देखने के लिए जाएं m.jagran.com पर

description.hltext_display: DARTFORD: Rubbish destroyed in bin blaze
description.content:
FIRE tore through a rubbish bin storage unit in Dartford this morning (December 22).
The blaze at around 4am in Pepys Close destroyed everything within the concrete structure but firefighters managed to stop it spreading to nearby buildings.
They were at the scene for around 30 minutes.

description.hltext_display: 抗击辐射的食物营养“尖兵”
BR station to keep airing 'American Routes'
description.content:
For a while it looked as though a "roots music" radio show hosted and created by a former Baton Rouge resident would no longer be on Baton Rouge radio station WRKF-FM.
But the manager of WRKF tells The Advocate newspaper that fans of the show have made their views known. So "American Routes" will continue to air on Saturday evenings on WRKF.
"American Routes" is hosted by Nick Spitzer, an anthropology and folklore professor at Tulane University in New Orleans. Louisiana music often is featured on the show. It's syndicated on more than 200 radio stations around the country and featrues a broad variety of American music including country, gospel, blues, rock 'n' roll and soul.
___
Information from: The Advocate, http://www.2theadvocate.com

description.hltext_display: 'Bieber Fever' takes over Birmingham
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 10:15 PM EST
News Headlines More>>
'Bieber Fever' is taking over Birmingham. Thousands of tweens gathered at the BJCC Tuesday night to see 16 year-old singing sensation, Justin Bieber, live in concert.
His famous hair..
"I want to touch him," says Lindi Earnest, 12 year-old friend from Jasper.
His voice...
"His lips look really soft," says Coco McKay, 13 year-old fan from Mountain Brook.
His moves...
"He's hot," says McKay.
"I've cried I've wanted to meet him so bad," says Mary Beth Scoles, 13 year-old fan from Jasper.
Frenzied female fans lined up outside the complex before the concert to try and catch a glimpse of the teen heart-throb. Wearing 'beeb' lovin t-shirts, holding signs, they gathered in clusters to sing Bieber's signature song, 'Baby.' Fans came in from across the state and across the country including Ohio, Florida, Texas and Illinois. Many say they're not afraid to admit they're obsessed.
"I have over 700 posters of him up in my room. I follow him in every way I can," says Scoles.
"Watch E! News specials on him," says McKay.
"I'm the future Mrs. Bieber," says Katherine Francis, 14 year-old fan from Mountain Brook.
These fans know meeting Bieber may be a long shot. But if it were to ever happen...
"I think I'd make him take me to the hospital. Fake passing out," says McKay.
"I would like cry right now if he walked out. I would cry," says Scoles.
Bieber's BJCC concert has been sold out for months. The tickets were gone in a matter of hours.

description.hltext_display: New Passat and Sharan achieve 5-star Euro NCAP rating
description.content:
Scoring an overall rating of 96 per cent, the Sharan achieved one of the highest ever results in what are Euro NCAP's most stringent tests to date. The results for adult protection in frontal, side and rear impacts as well as child and pedestrian safety mean Volkswagen's most advanced people carrier is among the safest vehicles in its category.
Passive safety in the Sharan has been optimised through innovative restraint systems which include nine airbags; a curtain airbag system for all three rows of seats, side airbags for the first two rows of seats and driver and passenger airbags as well as an additional airbag to protect the driver's knees.
Previously, the Passat had been awarded five stars by Euro NCAP and the recently-launched seventh generation model has retained the test's top accolade, with strong scores for adult and child occupant protection and pedestrian safety.
The new Passat offers new levels of safety with two assistance systems making a debut. An automatic fatigue detection system monitors driver inputs and emits an audible and visual warning automatically to recommend a break if required, and the new city emergency braking function which is a development of the Automatic Distance Control (ADC) system. If an unavoidable collision is sensed by the vehicle, the brakes are automatically engaged at speeds below 18 mph. The system is also able to accelerate the vehicle automatically should an imminent rear end collision be detected, providing the road ahead is clear.
Both models share a comprehensive range of safety equipment as standard with optimised body-shell rigidity and highly effective airbag and driver assistance systems including ABS (Anti-lock Braking System) with HBA (Hydraulic Brake Assist) and ESP (Electronic Stabilisation Programme).

description.hltext_display: Keine Nutzung des Dienstwagen bei längerer Arbeitsunfähigkeit
description.content: (fair-NEWS) - (lifepr) Düsseldorf, 22.12.2010 - Der Kläger ist bei der Beklagten als Bauleiter beschäftigt. Die Beklagte stellt ihm arbeitsvertraglich für seine Tätigkeit einen Pkw «auch zur privaten Nutzung» zur Verfügung. In der Zeit vom 03.03.2008 bis einschließlich zum 14.12.2008 war der Kläger arbeitsunfähig erkrankt. Sein Entgeltfortzahlungsanspruch endete zum 13.04.2008. Auf Verlangen der Beklagten gab er den Pkw am 13.11.2008 zurück. Die Beklagte überließ dem Kläger erst nach Wiederaufnahme der Arbeit am 18.12.2008 wieder einen Dienstwagen auch zur privaten Nutzung. Der Kläger verlangt eine Nutzungsausfallentschädigung für die Zeit vom 13.11. bis zum 15.12.2008. Das BAG hat einen Anspruch des Klägers auf eine Nutzungsausfallentschädigung verneint. Denn der Arbeitgeber ist regelmäßig nur so lange zur Gebrauchsüberlassung verpflichtet, wie er dem Arbeitnehmer Arbeitsentgelt schuldet, erklären ARAG Experten. In den Zeiten der Arbeitsunfähigkeit, für die keine Entgeltfortzahlungspflicht mehr besteht, hat der Arbeitnehmer jedoch keinen Arbeitsentgeltanspruch (BAG, Az.: 9 AZR 631/09).

description.hltext_display: Anite Leads the way in LTE Conformance Certification
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- Anite today announces that the Anite Conformance Toolset is the first and only LTE protocol conformance testing solution to be approved by the Global Certification Forum (GCF) for the certification of LTE Band 13 & 20 devices. This has particular relevance to device manufacturers wishing to service the growing North American and European markets. Anite is also immediately able to support all of the TDD LTE protocol test cases required for the imminent launch of GCF certification across Asian frequency bands.
(Photo: http://www.newscom.com/cgi-bin/prnh/20101222/427474 )
Anite is now the only test equipment vendor to meet the industry's stringent test coverage requirements for LTE protocol testing across LTE bands 13 & 20 and TDD LTE bands 38 & 40.
"In order to maintain consumer expectations of next generation LTE wireless devices it is essential that device manufacturers are able to rigorously test prior to launching their products," said Paul Beaver, Anite's 3GPP Business Unit Director. "Anite, the global leader in testing technology for the wireless industry is the first test equipment vendor to have both FDD and TDD LTE test cases approved by GCF.
North American & European mobile operators have driven LTE technology forward at breakneck speed and Anite has beaten the challenge thrown down, leading the way as the premier solution and respected industry experts for device manufacturers wishing to launch new LTE product."
Anite has also demonstrated clear LTE technical leadership through its trail-blazing work on RAN5 test case verification. 86% of FDD and 100% of TDD LTE test cases have been verified by Anite to date and close collaboration with the leading LTE device manufacturers ensures that Anite customers can be assured of working with the market experts.
These achievements build upon Anite's already comprehensive portfolio of leading 3GPP protocol solutions, from GSM through EDGE and WCDMA to the latest HSPA+ standards, enabling developers to adopt a total end-to-end test philosophy for all of their wireless testing needs, reducing both development time and costs.
About Anite
Anite provides a comprehensive range of critical IT solutions to the Wireless and Travel sectors across the globe. Listed on the London Stock Exchange, Anite develops and implements software as well as provides consultancy, systems integration and managed services to ensure that our customers operate effectively and securely. By using the latest technologies to deliver quality and cost-effective solutions, Anite meets customers' specific requirements and realises tangible results for its clients.
Anite Telecoms, a subdivision of Anite plc, is a global market leader with over 18 years of experience in providing cutting-edge technology within the handset testing industry to device manufacturers, operators and test laboratories. As an established leader, Anite was the first company to verify LTE conformance test cases in 2009. With highly flexible and reliable software solutions, Anite is known as an innovative, agile and responsive partner to the top players in the Telecoms industry. With a diverse team focused on making a difference and exceeding expectations, Anite draws upon on worldwide expertise and is enthusiastic about the future. Headquartered in the UK, Anite employs around 500 staff in 13 countries across Europe, America, Asia and the Middle East. For more information, please visit http://www.anite.com.

description.hltext_display: schlaglichterUSA belangen Deutsche Bank für Steuersparmodelle
description.content:
New York - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, rund eine halbe Milliarde Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen. Im Gegenzug würde der Fall nicht weiter verfolgt, teilte die US- Bundesstaatsanwaltschaft mit. Die Fälle liegen nach Angaben der Deutschen Bank allerdings schon Jahre zurück - von 1996 bis 2002.

description.hltext_display: Usain bolts
description.content:
IT takes a lot to scare Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt.
But the Olympic world record holder and gold medal winner over 100 and 200 metres, admitted to being more than a little rattled when he got behind the wheel of a Ferrari this week.
Bolt paid a VIP visit to Ferrari’s headquarters where he was able to test-drive the Ferrari 458 Italia and 599 GTB Fiorano on Ferrari’s private test track, Fiorano.
The sprinter started as an excited passenger next to the Ferrari test-drivers Dario Benuzzi and Raffaele De Simone, while later on he completed some laps himself behind the wheel.
At the end of the day he couldn’t hide his love for the 458 Italia.
“It’s a little bit like me, very reactive and determined,” Bolt said.
Bolt joked later that his heart was racing when test-driver Dario Benuzzi showed him how to control the car on a wet track.
“I was really scared, but it was a good scare. I’m excited like a child,” he said.

지방자치단체장의 인사전횡에 제동이 걸린다. 중앙정부 추천인사가 인사위원회에 포함되는 것은 물론 형식적 심사를 막기 위해 서면심사도 엄격히 제한된다. 그러나 중앙정부의 인사개입이라며 반발할 가능성도 있어 귀추가 주목된다.
행정안전부는 이 같은 내용을 골자로 한 `공정 지방인사 운영대책`을 내년 상반기 중 확정하고 이르면 하반기부터 시행키로 했다고 22일 밝혔다. 민선5기 출범 이후에도 친인척, 측근 특혜채용 등 단체장의 인사권 남용 사례가 그치지 않고 있다는 판단에 따른 것이다. 우선 유명무실한 지방인사위원회가 개선된다. 지방인사위원회는 지자체 최고 인사기구이지만 통상 7~8명으로 구성되는 위원을 단체장이 추천해 공정성 시비가 끊이지 않았다.
행안부는 위원 중 상급단체(광역단체 또는 행안부) 추천인사를 포함시키는 방안을 적극 검토하고 있다. 또 승진ㆍ징계 등 중요 사항 결정 때는 서면심사가 원천적으로 불가능하도록 제한 규정을 두기로 했으며, 외부위원의 비율도 현재 2분의 1에서 3분의 2로 확대하기로 했다.
[배한철 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: سوء استفاده چندين ميليارد دلاري از بودجه بازسازي افغانستان
description.content: نتايج يک بررسي جديد در ارتش آمريکا نشان مي دهد که ميزان سوءاستفاده از بودجه بازسازي افغانستان و حيف و ميل آن به چندين ميليارد دلار رسيده است.به گزارش خبرگزاري مهر به نقل از رويترز، "آرنولد فيلدز" بازرس ويژه بازسازي افغانستان با تائيد اين مطلب گفت : ميزان سوءاستفاده از بودجه بازسازي افغانستان از سال 2002 تا کنون اگر بيش از ميلياردها دلار نباشد مطمئنا صدها ميليون دلار است.وي در ادامه با انتقاد از سياستهاي آمريکا در امر بازسازي افغانستان افزود: هيچ واحد کنترلي مناسبي براي بررسي اينکه پول ماليات دهندگان آمريکايي در کجا هزينه مي شود وجود ندارد. از سال 2002 تا کنون 56 ميليارد دلار براي بازسازي افغانستان هزينه شده، اما با اين وجود هنوز نتيجه مطلوبي در اين راه حاصل نشده است.به گفته اين مقام آمريکايي، از مبلغ ذکر شده 29 ميليارد دلار صرف بازسازي نيروهاي امنيتي افغانستان شده و اين در حالي است که بسياري از آنها سواد خواندن و نوشتن ندارند و آموزش تيراندازي به آنها نيز به تازگي آغاز شده است.

description.hltext_display: हैती यौन शोषण मामले में 20 साल की सजा
description.content:
न्यू हैवेन। एक स्कूल में बच्चों के साथ यौन दुराचार करने के आरोपी हैती के एक व्यक्ति को अदालत ने करीब 20 साल जेल की सजा सुनाई है। वह स्वयं इस स्कूल का संस्थापक है। इस दुराचार के शिकार हुए कुछ बच्चे अदालत में उसके खिलाफ गवाही देने आए थे।
बच्चों ने अदालत को बताया कि स्कूल संस्थापक ने उन्हें धमकी दी थी कि यदि उन्होंने उसकी बात नहीं मानी तो वह उन्हें स्कूल से निकाल देगा। न्यायधीश जैनेट बांड आर्टरटन ने न्यू हैवेन के फेडरल कोर्ट में डगलस पेरिट्ज को सजा सुनाते हुए उसे सीरियल रेपिस्ट और उत्पीड़क कहा। सजा सुनने से पहले 40 साल के पेरिट्ज ने पीड़ितों से माफी मांगी। उसने कहा कि वह जानता है कि उसका गुनाह बहुत बड़ा और भयानक है लेकिन मैं फिर भी अदालत से आशा करता हूं कि वह थोड़ी नरमी बरतेगी क्योंकि मैंने देश के लोगों की भलाई के लिए काफी कुछ किया है।
पेरिट्ज ने माना कि अगस्त में उसने आ� बच्चों के साथ अवैध यौनाचार किया। वे बच्चे कैप-हैतिएन स्थित बेघर बच्चों के लिए चलने वाले 'प्रोजेक्ट पियरे टोसैंट स्कूल आए थे। कोलोराडो के रहने वाले पेरिट्ज ने इस स्कूल की स्थापना 1997 में की थी। अधिकारियों का कहना है कि उसने 1998 में स्कूल भवन बनने से पहले ही बच्चों के साथ यौन दुराचार करना शुरू कर दिया था। उसके शिकार हुए बच्चों में से छह अब युवक हैं और उन्होंने उसकी करतूतों के बारे में बताया।
मोबाइल पर ताजा खबरें, फोटो, वीडियो व लाइव स्कोर देखने के लिए जाएं m.jagran.com पर

description.hltext_display: Keeping local dollars at home
description.content:
I am a construction contractor, and every day as I listen to the radio at work, I hear an ad from a local area group or merchant asking us Helenans to shop local and support our local community and economy. I couldn’t agree more and I would like to take that a step further.
As a local contractor of a dozen years, I see local lumber yards and suppliers struggling to stay open and keep their employees gainfully employed. In this struggling economy it is tough for them as well as the rest of us. Here is a way you, as a local consumer, could help: Shop local, and ask your contractor to do the same.
Every day of the week there is a truck from a company in Bozeman delivering building materials to Helena. Why? Because a number of Helena’s contractors choose to buy the cheaper materials from out of town to boost their profits.
Here is the scenario I have seen play out. The contractor takes a material list or maybe just a blueprint to a local supplier. The supplier has one of its employees do a take-off and figure out the materials and quote a price. He may spend four or more hours working to get that quote so he can make the sale. After this contractor gets awarded the bid, he buys materials from the above named supplier from Bozeman and pockets the profits. In the meantime, the Bozeman supplier stays busy, while the local supplier is forced to cut back its employees’ hours and or lay off workers.
It almost seems criminal, but you can’t blame the out-of-town supplier. He is just running a business. Instead, blame the contractor who is buying from him. The same principle applies to service providers as well. How many of you have noticed lately an electrician, plumber or carpenter truck with out-of-town plates working in the area? Don’t get me wrong, these guys need work just like the rest of us, but if all of us shopped locally just like the radio ads suggest, who knows, maybe your neighbor will still have a job.
Ask your contractor where he gets his supplies, and into whose pocket the discount is going. Remember, Helena: Support your local goods and services provider, and as a local contractor, thank you for your business.
Tom Tenneson is a self-employed contractor with R&T Creative Design in East Helena.

description.hltext_display: Über die Feiertage mehr Autozüge nach Sylt
description.content: Für einen reibungslosen Insel-Verkehr setzt die Bahn mehr Züge von und nach Sylt ein. Taktfahrplan wird in Spitzenzeiten auf bis zu 30 Minuten verkürzt.

description.hltext_display: 年末盘点保险清单调整保险计划
description.content:
年末时，又该仔细整理一下自己的保险清单了。盘点内容除了包括及时续缴保费，更新个人联系信息外，还要根据自身情况的变化，调整保险计划。
首先是要确认自己的联系方式是否改变，比如通信地址和联系电话。如果联系方式改变了，记得通知此份保险的营销员或者保险公司变更。其次是明确保单的缴费方式，是否需要续保。多数保险公司的保单都有60天的宽限期，如果在此宽限期内没交保费又发生合同约定的保险责任，保险公司都必须履行保险赔付责任。
对于一些投资型的险种，消费者要确认保单是否有年金到期和红利领取。华康保险代理的资深业务经理梁伟芬建议，要查询保单是勾选了现金领取还是累计生息，抑或是抵缴保费。一般来说，建议消费者选择累计生息，因为累计生息才能获得保单最大的利益，并且这是随时可以变更的方式，可供消费者灵活选择。
除了这几步常规性的整理，检查自己的保障与目前的需求是否匹配，这是保单年检最重要的部分。首先将所拥有的保单进行分门别类，比如，有些保单偏重风险保障，有些是教育金保障。分门别类后，消费者可根据目前的生活工作需求来确认现在的保单水平是否和生活需求相匹配。 此外，还要考虑自己的工作和收入是否有了新的变化。这些变化都意味着自己的保险计划需要做一定的调整。比如作为年轻人，工作是否有变迁?收入是否有变化?如果收入增加，保险也可以考虑增加，相反，收入减少了，可以根据现状减低保额，从而减少所缴保费。是否结婚、生子或者贷款购房?如有，那么保障需求应有所增加，建议保险保额相应增加。
梁伟芬还建议每个家庭检查一下家里成员的医疗保障与目前的医疗水平是否一致，可以通过检查目前的住院费用和大病保障是否齐全来衡量。做了新爸爸新妈妈的消费者们，也可以在年末考虑和规划孩子的教育金。步入壮年的消费者，则需要在年末重新检查现有保险并开始规划养老金。 羊城晚报记者 程行欢

description.hltext_display: 洗车业产值高达10亿上海将全面终结马路洗车摊
description.content:
无证洗车摊
经营场所：马路边沿街门面。
现状：污染环境，偷用相对低价的居民用水，浪费水资源。
未来：千余个马路无证洗车摊将逐渐萎缩、消亡。
正规洗车行
经营场所：加油站、停车场和居民小区的“边角料”。
现状：上海目前形成连锁规模的洗车行仅2-3家。
未来：在政府助推下，打造汽车服务一体化俱乐部，规模化运作。
上海现存的千余个马路无证洗车摊将在“十二五”期间逐渐萎缩、消亡。在政府部门的助推下，正规的连锁规模化经营的洗车行将取代马路洗车摊。
近日，在上海市机动车辆清洗保洁管理现场交流会上，市绿化市容局有关负责人表示，“明年，上海汽车保有量将达200万辆，每天平均有30万-40万辆车需要清洗，‘洗车难’问题将逐渐凸显。”政府部门将大力帮助正规洗车行利用现有加油站、社会停车场和居民小区的“边角料”发展连锁洗车店，在解决洗车难的同时，维护整洁干净的市容。
马路洗车摊频遭诟病
昨天，早报记者走访了部分马路洗车摊。在华漕镇北翟路上，一家马路洗车摊仅一间沿街门面，几块抹布、几只水桶和水枪，占据一段人行道，生意便开张了。四溢的污水甚至流到了主干道上，在清晨-2℃的低温中，污水甚至结成了寒冰，非常危险。而行人也只能走到非机动车道上，躲避突然袭击的水花。
因污染环境、偷用相对低价的居民用水、浪费水资源等原因，马路洗车摊普遭诟病。“世博期间，在投诉榜上，马路洗车摊污染环境连续3周排在榜首。”市绿化市容局副局长黄兴华说。7月至9月，郊区车辆清洗场站问题升幅达42.86％，主要是车辆清洗场站占道洗车、污水外流问题环比升幅较大，达53.85％。
洗车业产值高达10亿
“明年，上海汽车保有量将达200万辆，每天平均有30万-40万辆车需要清洗，而上海目前的车辆仍在以每月8000-9000辆的数目增加。因此，可能现在感觉还不明显，但未来‘洗车难’问题将逐渐凸显。”市绿化市容局机动车辆清洗管理处有关负责人表示。他表示，虽然目前马路洗车摊以其低廉的价格吸引了不少车主，但作为一项产业值高达10亿元、与城市发展密切相关的现代服务业，集连锁、规模、环保于一体的洗车行的兴起是必然趋势，马路洗车摊将面临逐渐消亡的态势。
“目前，上海已形成连锁规模的洗车行不多，仅有2-3家，‘十二五’期间，政府部门将与本市市容环卫行业协会联手，大力推广利用现有资源，如加油站、社会停车场和居民小区的‘边角料’，建设正规洗车店，打造汽车服务一体化俱乐部，形成洗车行业的规模化运作，解决‘洗车难’问题。”该负责人说，“对于正规车行，我们也将对其进行有效备案管理，给予支持引导，杜绝马路洗车摊点的滋生，而目前上海存在的千余家无证马路洗车摊也将逐渐萎缩，乃至消亡。”
同时，该负责人建议，由于出租车需要天天清洗，洗车成本较高，几乎90％的出租车深夜收工后都选择在马路摊点清洗，因此，建议出租车公司自身能提供清洗服务。而行业协会也将建议其他政府部门能给予正规车行更多诸如税收等方面的政策优惠。
