description.hltext_display: Warriors erase deficit, top Kings in OT
description.content: Sacramento, CA (Sports Network) - Golden State overcame a 16-point fourth quarter deficit and Monta Ellis scored nine points in overtime, as the Warriors topped the Sacramento Kings, 117-109, at ARCO Arena. Ellis scored a game-high 36 and Reggie Williams added 24 points for the Warriors, who got 15 points and 12 rebounds from David Lee. Vladimir Radmanovic finished with 15 points off the bench -- including a game- tying three at the end of regulation -- for Golden State, which halted a two-game skid. Dorell Wright supplied 17 points, six rebounds and six assists in the win. Beno Udrih led the Kings with a career-high 34 points and Tyreke Evans finished with 15 to go with 10 rebounds and seven assists for Sacramento, which has lost 14-of-15. Carl Landry finished with 22 points and 10 rebounds in the loss. "There's a line in this league when you think you can't get any lower, it gets lower," Kings head coach Paul Westphal said. A Landry layup with 9:20 left in regulation gave the Kings a 94-78 lead. However, Radmanovic connected on a deep three at the other end to start an 18-4 Warriors run that stretched into the final seconds of play. Ellis' short layup with 8:22 had Golden State within 94-83, and after Lee added two from the line, Wright and Ellis both connected on layups. Evans made a layup of his own at the 4:21 mark to temporarily halt the Warriors' surge, making it a 96-89 game, but after the teams traded baskets, Ellis' bucket trimmed the deficit to five. Williams then made three of four from the charity stripe to cap the Sacramento run with 15.1 on the clock. The Kings were up four, 102-98, after Udrih made two from the line with 8.1 seconds left, but a Williams free throw with 3.4 ticks remaining cut the margin to three. Williams missed his second try, but Golden State got the rebound, and Radmanovic's triple as time expired sent the game into overtime tied at 102. Lee's three-point play with 1:25 left in overtime gave Golden State a 111-109 lead. After a Sacramento turnover, Ellis made two from the line. He scored the game's final six points in all -- four free throws and a layup -- as the Kings missed their final four shots down the stretch. "I think our guys held true and we were able to make a lot of plays, defensive stops," Warriors head coach Keith Smart said. "That is what I am trying to get them to understand. They are good offensive players, but if they can get it into their hearts how hard it is to be a good defensive team, rebounding and making stops when they are necessary, then you are going to have a chance to have fun down the road." Udrih scored 12 of the Kings' 18 first-quarter points, but the Warriors shot 64.7 percent from the field, en route to a 26-18 lead. Landry scored 13 in the second quarter as the Kings cut the Golden State lead to one, 49-48, at the intermission. The Warriors' lead was as high as six in the opening minutes of the third, but after a Landry free throw about midway through tied the game at 61 and keyed a 12-2 run. Udrih's pullup jumper with 3:37 left ended the spurt and put the Kings up 72-63. Francisco Garcia added a three and a layup in the final 31 seconds to put Sacramento up 84-70 heading to the fourth. Game Notes Landry's 22 points tied a season-high...Donte Greene scored 10 points and Cousins grabbed 13 rebounds with seven points in the loss...Sacramento won the rebounding margin 56-48...The Warriors converted on 11-of-12 fast break opportunities for 31 points.

description.hltext_display: BUSINESS REVIEW - Kasumbalesa Border Post: Hub of SADC, Comesa traffic
description.content:
KASUMBALESA border which links Chililabombwe with the mineral-rich Katanga Province of the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) plays host to high volumes of traffic from the Southern African Development Community (SADC) and Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) regions.
The current border facility at Kasumbalesa is in a poor state, causing congestion and crossing time for various goods and human traffic to last as long as seven days in certain instances.
With as many as 300 trucks being cleared on average in a day, the border has long been identified by SADC, COMESA and the North-South Corridor fora as one of the main regional obstacles in the smooth flow of regional trade.
This prompted regional heads of State to earmark it as one of the main priority areas towards the introduction of state-of-the art one-stop border facilities.
Adequate border crossing facilities are a critical element for the smooth flow of traffic and in the improvement of trade that are considered as a ‘life line’ to the regional economies.
Therefore, the upgrading of Kasumbalesa will surely address the many challenges particularly in trade - import and export.
This crossing point caters for all the commercial traffic going into and coming out of the DRC.
The main goods being minerals (copper, cobalt) and mining inputs such as coal, sulphur, fuel, sulphuric acid as well as construction materials, mining equipment, agricultural produce, food, beverages, among others.
Kasumbalesa attracts traffic originating or destined from and to the ports of South Africa, Mozambique, Tanzania, and Namibia as well as traffic originating or destined from and to SADC and COMESA countries.
To show its commitment the Zambian Government contracted Zambian IP Border Crossing Company Z(IP) BCC to transform the border and the implement the Design, Build, Operate and Transfer DBOT project.
The firm has been detailed to design, erect and operate a state-of-the-art dual direction border crossing point at Kasumbalesa, according to international standards.
It will also transform this busy crossing point into a world class facility to accommodate the increasing traffic level for the benefit of cargo owners, road haulers, Government agencies and the people of the SADC and COMESA region.
It will ensure that the design and plans cover the implementation of a one-stop border concept based on the processing of both, south and north bound traffic at the newly-constructed facilities.
Thus the project, which started in May this year, is being executed the on a DBOT/Public Private Partnership (PPP) basis to the tune of US$ 25 million.
In coming up with this concept, the Government has projected quick traffic clearance thereby reducing congestion at the border once the facility was operational.
Chililabombwe District Commissioner (DC) Timothy Musonda said the new facility would improve trade and bring the much needed resources to the treasury.
He said the project had created more than 350 jobs for the locals and once it is completed more jobs would be created.
“Zambia, being a landlocked country, requires ties with its neighbours that have sea coasts as well as establishment of infrastructure to enhance the import and export business,’’ he said
He said the one-stop-border post would reduce smuggling as customs personnel would easily conduct physical inspections because of the availed modern equipment.
Kasumbalesa border, he said, had experienced increased business hence the need for modern and upgraded infrastructure to ease congestion as well as widen the tax base for the Zambia Revenue Authority (ZRA)
He said K500 million trust funds would be availed once the project is complete by the contracted company for the community.
And (Z IP) BCC chief executive officer Avishay Dvir said the Kasumbalesa border facility would be one of the best in Africa and was expected to be completed in January next year.
The facility would have three lanes on both Zambia and DRC sides with closed circuit television (CCTV) on both sides to monitor and facilitate processing of traffic.
Once the project is completed the Zambian Government would enjoy access to an international class border post with increased collection and funds inflows.
The border facility will be run on a concessioin basis for 25 years and then become a Government asset at the end of the concession period, at no cost.
It will Improve traffic flow throughout the region for the benefit of many countries and also improve monitoring and implementation of the legally binding process and procedures at the border post.
The project will improve monitoring and collection of customs duty and other fees applicable due to the introduction of proper office space and more specifically, the operation of the new weight bridge and the x-ray machines.
It will shortening the crossing time to the regional desired level, as per the SADC Protocol of Transport, thus better fleet utilisation ratio.
This will ultimately lead to shorter credit time granted by the mining companies for copper and cobalt, thus improved cash flow to all involved. The environment will be secure for the cargo owner.
Other benefits are access to state-of-the-art facilities including restaurants, duty free shop, banks, coffee shops etc for the benefits of the terminal users.
Mr Dvir said Information Technology (IT) system cables and all other cabling had been already laid down and Copperbelt University School of IT had requested the firm for the students to do attachment and practical at the facility.
Chililabombwe Cross-Border Traders Association (CCTA) chairperson Charles Kakoma said the new border facility once operational would automatically address the problems the association had faced for a long time.
He said trading was an occupation which was aimed at providing services to the community and to enrich the trader.

description.hltext_display: '막내' 손흥민, 차붐의 최연소 기록 넘어설까?
description.content:
[스포탈코리아=제주] 이경헌 기자= '슈퍼탤런트' 손흥민(18, 함부르크)가 차범근이 갖고 있는 아시안컵 대표팀 사상 최연소 관련 기록을 깨트릴 것으로 보인다.
조광래 감독은 22일 오후 제주월드컵경기장에서 열린 자체 미니게임을 끝으로 아시안컵 무대를 위한 실전 훈련을 모두 끝마쳤다. 이번 전지훈련의 최대 화두는 바로 한국 축구의 떠오르는 태양 손흥민의 대표팀 발탁 여부였다.
이번 전지훈련에서 측면 공격수로 활약한 손흥민은 비록 공격 포인트를 쌓지 못했지만 폭넓은 움직임과 날카로운 슈팅력을 선보이며 이를 지켜보던 조광래 감독의 얼굴을 흐뭇하게 만들었다.
앞서 손흥민은 지난달 조광래 감독이 직접 관전한 경기에서 시즌 2,3호골을 잇따라 작렬시키며 자신의 잠재력을 유감없이 뽐낸 데 이어 약 37시간에 달하는 귀국길에도 불구하고 제주 전훈에서 인상적인 활약을 펼치며 자신의 진가를 재확인시켰다.
훈련이 끝난 뒤 가진 인터뷰에서 조광래 감독은 손흥민의 아시안컵 대표팀 발탁 가능성을 시사했다. 그는 "오늘 플레이에 만족한다. 기대 이상의 모습이었다. 코칭 스태프와 상의를 해봐야 하겠지만 개인적으로 손흥민을 아시안컵에 데려가고 싶다"라고 말한 것.
이에 따라 아시안컵 대표팀 최연소 출전 기록의 경신 가능성도 요동치고 있다. 기존의 기록은 차범근의 18세 11개월. 지난 1972년 태국 방콕에서 열린 제 5회 아시안컵 대회에 참가한 차범근은 크메르와 1차전에서 득점을 터트리며 최연소 득점 기록도 보유하고 있다.
만약 1992년 7월 8일 생인 손흥민이 만약 아시안컵에 출전해 득점을 기록할 경우 최연소 출전 및 득점 기록, 두 마리 토끼몰이에 성공하게 된다.

description.hltext_display: Na kolei wciąż kłopoty. A zaczyna się świąteczny ruch
description.content:
Wtorek i środa to ostatnie dni zajęć na poznańskich uczelniach. Już wczoraj część studentów - m.in. z UAM - ruszyła na święta do rodzinnych miejscowości. Kolejarze nie do końca sobie radzili. Zwłaszcza że zima nie odpuszcza. - Czekam pociąg do Warszawy, opóźniony o 10 min. Gdy już powinien wjechać na peron, nagle okazuje się, że zwiększył opóźnienie o godzinę! Ten powrót do domu pewnie potrwa ze dwa dni - denerwowała się pasażerka z Lublina.
Przewozy Regionalne, spodziewając się tłoku podróżnych, przygotowały dodatkowe pociągi. To m.in. kolejne Interregio z Poznania do Warszawy, Olsztyna, Bielska-Białej. A także do Wrocławia i dalej przez Wrocław, Kraków i Katowice aż do Stalowej Woli. W okresie świątecznym więcej składów pojedzie też między Piłą a Warszawą.
Z kolei PKP Intercity ułożyło świąteczny rozkład pod miłośników zimowego wypoczynku w górach. Dodatkowa para pociągów ze Szczecina przez Poznań do Zakopanego kursuje od 17 do 24 grudnia, a także od 26 grudnia do 3 stycznia. W okresie świątecznym i sylwestrowym są też dodatkowe pociągi TLK do Jeleniej Góry, Szklarskiej Poręby i Gdyni. Godziny poszczególnych połączeń można sprawdzić na www.rozklad-pkp.pl.

description.hltext_display: "El pare Ubach tindria una pel·lícula si hagués nascut als Estats Units"
description.author: Regi
description.content:
Bonaventura Ubach (1879-1960) va ser un monjo de Montserrat atípic, un estudiós de la Bíblia que va emprendre diversos viatges cap a l'Orient per conèixer de primera mà les civilitzacions en les quals es va gestar el llibre sagrat de jueus i cristians i per recollir evidències arqueològiques per mostrar al museu de l'abadia benedictina. Fascinat per la figura d'aquest home religiós, Martí Gironell (Besalú, 1971) ha novel·lat les seves aventures a L'arqueòleg, la tercera ficció de temàtica història del periodista i escriptor després del supervendes El pont dels jueus i La venjança del bandoler.
La publicació del Dietari d'un viatge per les regions del l'Iraq (1922-1923), a principi d'any, va posar d'actualitat el llegat del pare Ubach. Aquesta novel·la és filla d'aquest redescobriment de la seva figura?
No, no, és anterior. Vaig saber de l'existència d'Ubach fa potser dos o tres anys quan vaig llegir un reportatge sobre la restauració de la mòmia del Museu de Montserrat, de la qual no tenia constància. En l'article també es parlava d'un monjo que va ser el responsable de dur-la fins allà. Vaig trucar al cap de premsa de l'abadia, Òscar Bardají, i em va fer arribar la biografia que va escriure ja fa anys Romuald Díaz, el llibre sobre el viatge cap al Sinaí del mateix Ubach i una còpia del dietari de l'Iraq, que encara no havia sortit. Em va quedar clar que allà hi havia un personatge de novel·la.
El pare Damià Roura, director de la Biblioteca de Montserrat i curador de l'edició del dietari de l'Iraq, fa uns quants mesos va afirmar que es podria fer un símil entre Ubach i l'arqueòleg cinematogràfic Indiana Jones. Li sembla pertinent?
I tant!, però Ubach era un home il·lustrat i català.
Si fos una ciutadà nord-americà, Hollywood ja li hauria fet una pel·lícula?
Segur, i tant que sí! Té tots els ingredients per ser un personatge de pel·lícula. Un monjo viatger, al principi del segle XX, que sap sortir-se de totes les situacions en què es troba, que s'integra en les poblacions que visita i, si cal, es vesteix amb la indumentària dels àrabs. Em sobta que sigui tan desconegut pels catalans, un home que va dur a Montserrat peces comprades legalment a Iraq, Síria, Egipte... i que museus com el British i el Louvre han intentat adquirir, sense èxit. Ell no va ser cap espoliador.
Què hi ha d'inventat en la novel·la L'arqueòleg?
La meva intenció ha estat novel·lar els seus viatges. Hi ha un capítol que transcorre a Montserrat i la resta són les seves aventures per l'Orient. Paral·lelament hi ha una trama sobre les túniques sagrades de la sagrada família de Jesús. El que m'interessa és fer entrar el lector en l'ambient de la novel·la, fer que noti els grans de la tempesta de sorra a la cara. Estem parlant d'un home que anava a Bagdad i trobava personatges trets de Les mil i una nits, un home a qui gai-rebé trontollava la fe després de parlar amb una secta satànica. Bonaventura Ubach era un monjo obert de mires, que tractava tothom amb respecte. Va anar a l'Orient a treballar la Bíblia, no a evangelitzar.
Ha pogut parlar amb gent que va conèixer Ubach?
El pare Pius Tragant, que va ser deixeble seu, em va ajudar a conèixer-lo més enllà dels seus viatges. Així m'he pogut fer més la idea de com era la persona.
Què té Martí Gironell entre mans. Una altra novel·la de gènere històric?
Ara mateix estic de promoció i no em plantejo gaire què faré. Tinc dues o tres coses mig engegades, però espero que l'empenta de L'arqueòleg arribi fins a Sant Jordi. Llavors serà el moment d'asseure's i triar entre els diferents projectes quin pot agafar volada per concretar-lo en una altra novel·la.

description.hltext_display: Les chimpanzés femelles jouent à la poupée
description.author: Martine Perez
description.content:
Les petites filles adorent s'amuser avec leurs poupées. Elles en profitent pour y projeter toutes sortes d'actes de la vie quotidienne de l'ordre du maternage, avec amour, éventuellement domination, parfois sadisme. Les petits garçons, eux, font vrombir leur camion et bâtissent les plus grands univers possibles avec leurs Lego.
Cette vision ne traduit-elle que des stéréotypes sociaux? Les étalages de jouets pour Noël illustrent en tout cas ces divergences irréductibles. Les filles jouent-elles à la poupée sous la seule pression sociale qui les façonne dans ce sens? Existe-t-il un déterminisme biologique qui impose si jeune déjà une mésentente en termes de jeux entre les deux sexes? Difficile de trancher.
Dans ce débat, un élément intéressant vient d'être apporté par deux éthologues américains qui ont observé pendant quatorze ans la vie des chimpanzés de la communauté Kanyawara dans le parc national de Kibale en Ouganda. Les résultats de leur dernier travail, publiés cette semaine dans la revue , montrent clairement que si les jeunes primates jouent tous avec des bâtons, les femelles aiment les porter, les bercer, comme des poupées, de manière maternelle sans équivoque. Il y a quelques années, des jeunes singes en captivité s'étaient vu offrir des monceaux de jouets de toutes sortes. Les femelles s'étaient précipitées vers les poupées, les mâles vers les tracteurs?

description.hltext_display: Staatsanleihemarkt: Vom Ende des sicheren Hafens
description.author: Dennis Kremer
description.content:
Fast nichts ist in der Bondwelt mehr so, wie es einmal war. Die Schuldenkrise hat sie aus den Angeln gehoben. Für todsichere Staatspapiere gibt es faktisch keine Zinsen mehr. Nur wer volles Risiko geht, kann noch ordentlich Geld verdienen.
Asoka Wöhrmann weiß, wie die Zukunft geht. In den Händen hält er ein Blatt mit ein paar Balken darauf ein ganz normales Schaubild. Für den Anleihechef der Fondsgesellschaft DWS aber ist es mehr: der Weg aus der Misere.
"Anleihesegmente und Renditen" steht als Überschrift auf dem Blatt Papier, das der DWS-Mann so intensiv betrachtet. Der Balken ganz oben zeigt die Verzinsung griechischer Staatsanleihen mit zweijähriger Laufzeit an: 10,4 Prozent. Ganz unten hat Wöhrmann den Zinssatz zweijähriger Bundesanleihen eingetragen: 1,0 Prozent. Viel gegen wenig, Risiko gegen Sicherheit, Pleitekandidat gegen Wirtschaftsmacht.
Zwei Extreme Abbild der aktuellen Lage am europäischen Bondmarkt. Dazwischen aber ist der Balken, den Wöhrmann für die Zukunft hält. "Unternehmensanleihen aus Schwellenländern: 5,5 Prozent im Schnitt" steht da. Wöhrmanns Credo: "Bondinvestoren müssen über Europa hinausschauen."
Neue Hoffnungsträger hat der Anleihemarkt bitter nötig. Die Situation in Europa ist schwierig wie selten zuvor. Griechenland-Krise, Euro-Krise, Schuldenkrise das K-Wort gehörte wie selbstverständlich zum Anleihejahr 2010.
Magerzinsen oder Megarisiko: Eine andere Wahl haben Investoren auf dem Kontinent nicht. Höhere Erträge kann nur noch erzielen, wer auf angeschlagene Euro-Staaten setzt. Bei den Euro-Unternehmensanleihen ist die Lage ähnlich. Einen Ausweg versprechen die Anleihen aus den Schwellenländern. Weniger riskant als Griechen-Bonds, lukrativer als deutsche Staatsanleihen. Doch auch sie sind keine Heilsbringer, auch hier stehen den attraktiven Zinsen Gefahren wie steigende Inflationsraten gegenüber.
Die schlechte Nachricht für Anleger: Am Bondmarkt gilt ein neues Gesetz. "Ohne jedes Risiko mit Anleihen Geld zu verdienen wird nicht mehr möglich sein", DWS-Experte Wöhrmann sagt das deutlich. Und an dieser Situation wird sich 2011 nach Ansicht fast aller Experten nichts ändern.
Europa wird auch im nächsten Jahr gespalten bleiben zumindest auf dem Anleihemarkt. Denn trotz des Rettungsschirms der Europäischen Union (EU) und des Internationalen Währungsfonds (IWF) trauen viele Investoren dem Süden immer noch nicht über den Weg. Sie leihen ihr Geld lieber dem Schuldner, den sie als den sichersten im Euro-Raum ansehen der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Die Kurse von Bundesanleihen bewegen sich darum auf Rekordniveau, im Gegenzug fielen die Renditen auf den niedrigsten Stand in der Geschichte. Selbst ein Bundespapier mit zehnjähriger Laufzeit wirft aktuell nur 3 Prozent Rendite ab. In Griechenland ist es genau umgekehrt. Kaum eine hellenische Anleihe verzinst sich unter zehn Prozent.
"Wer Sicherheit kaufen möchte, erhält praktisch keine Rendite mehr", sagt DWS-Mann Wöhrmann. Uwe Burkert, Leiter Kreditanalyse bei der Landesbank Baden-Württemberg (LBBW), ergänzt: "Mit Bonds viel verdienen kann derzeit nur, wer größere Risiken eingeht."
Das gleiche Bild bei den Euro-Unternehmensanleihen. Die weitgehend ausfallsicheren Papiere aus der Kategorie Investmentgrade (Standard & Poor's: Note "BBB-" und besser; Moody's: "Baa3" und besser) haben eine Rallye hinter sich und werfen im Schnitt nur noch knapp drei Prozent Rendite ab. Mehr bringen nur Bonds aus dem spekulativen Hochzinsbereich.
Angesichts solch gravierender Umwälzungen rät Anja Mikus, Leiterin Portfoliomanagement bei Union Investment: "Bondinvestoren müssen bei der Bonität viel stärker differenzieren. Kaufen und liegen lassen funktioniert in vielen Fällen nicht mehr."

description.hltext_display: Beijing replaces top Foreign Ministry official
Eindhoven Airport: recordaantal passagiers
description.content:
EINDHOVEN (ANP) Eindhoven Airport heeft dit jaar de grens van twee miljoen passagiers doorbroken. Dit jaar vlogen 2,14 miljoen passagiers van en naar Eindhoven Airport. Dat is een kwart meer dan in 2009 (1.712.000). Dat liet de regionale luchthaven woensdag weten.
Volgens de regionale luchthaven is een toename van het aantal nieuwe bestemmingen de belangrijkste oorzaak van de groei. Vanaf Eindhoven Airport kan worden gevlogen naar 32 lijndienstbestemmingen. Eind 2009 waren dat er nog 23.
Voor volgend jaar verwacht Eindhoven Airport 15 procent meer passagiers te vervoeren.

description.content:

description.hltext_display: Basagoiti dice que es "grave" que ETA esté actuando para seguir "en el asesinato"
description.content:
Foto: EP BI
BILBAO, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
El presidente del PP vasco, Antonio Basagoiti, ha afirmado, ante el supuesto robo por parte de ETA de material para falsificaciones en Francia, que es "grave" que la banda armada esté actuando para seguir estando "en el terrorismo y el asesinato".
En una entrevista a ETB, recogida por Europa Press, se ha referido, de esta manera, a la información de que tres encapuchados, que se identificaron como miembros de ETA, asaltaron este lunes una empresa y robaron material para hacer falsificaciones.
El líder del PP vasco ha indicado que es una "mala noticia" y ha señalado que es "grave que ETA esté preparándose o actuando para estar en lo que siempre ha estado y no sabe dejar de estar, que es el terrorismo y el asesinato".
Basagoiti ha señalado que esta noticia no era "poco previsible" y ha añadido que "pensar que ya estaba todo hecho, sólo es propio de personas que siempre se han equivocado y nunca han cogido el toro por los cuernos porque pensaban que se habían vuelto buenos los que no lo son". No obstante, ha asegurado que no hay que "perder la moral" y hay que mantener la "firmeza" frente al terrorismo.

description.hltext_display: PVV'er Essers van lijst om schrappen Nuyts
description.content:
Maastrichtenaar Essers stond negentiende op de lijst.
Daarbij is hij burgerraadslid voor de Liberale Partij Maastricht van Kitty Nuyts, tot afgelopen weekend ook kandidaat voor de PVV. Nuyts werd echter door de partijtop van de lijst gehaald na het geven van een interview.In een verklaring zegt hij de houding van de provinciale partijtop, Laurence Stassen uitgezonderd, 'onacceptabel' te vinden: "Het grondrecht op vrijheid van meningsuiting is geschonden."

description.hltext_display: Everyone needs Chef Alan Wong’s new cookbook, The Blue Tomato
description.author: Theodene Yee, Honolulu Easy Meals Examiner
description.content:
After eleven years since his first cookbook, Chef Alan Wong has published a second. This second cookbook is titled The Blue Tomato: The Inspirations Behind the Cuisine of Alan Wong and is fantastically put together. The cookbook takes readers through 284-pages of Chef Alan’s personal journey that features his own photography, travel anecdotes, and the things that inspires him. This is an indispensable guide for home cooks as well as for professionals that seek the culinary techniques and creative processes of Chef Alan.
Chef Alan Wong is a founding chef and renowned master of Hawai’i Regional Cuisine. He has made guest appearances on the Food Network, the Travel Channel, and the Public Broadcasting System. In 1995, he opened Alan Wong’s Restaurant, now known as Alan Wong’s Honolulu. In 1999, the Pineapple Room by Alan Wong was opened in Ala Moana Shopping Center.
Available in bookstores, retail outlets, and online booksellers at the end of December 2010, this book can also immediately be found direct from the publisher at www.bluetomato.net.
Coming in January 2011, Chef Alan Wong will be conducting a brief “talk story”, where the chef will share the process and philosophies that went into the idea of Blue Tomato, food, and cooking. A “Side-by-Side Tasting” exercise will follow, featuring preparations from The Blue Tomato.
Meet Chef Alan at one of the following book signings:
Saturday, January 15, 1PM, Barnes & Noble, Kahala Mall, (808) 737-3323
Saturday, January 22, 2PM, Borders, Ward Centre, (808) 591-8995

description.hltext_display: PPL Corp. Sells Three Hydro Plants
Calcinado en Sestao un vehículo que constaba como sustraído
description.content:
BILBAO, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
Un vehículo que constaba como sustraído resultó calcinado este martes por la noche y las llamas afectaron también a otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la zona, según han confirmado fuentes de la Ertzaintza a Europa Press.
Los hechos ocurrieron sobre las diez de la noche en la calle Marcos Grijalbo cuando se informó del incendio de un Opel Vectra estacionado en esa vía. El coche figuraba como sustraído y había sido utilizado por delincuentes habituales.
Como consecuencia del incendio, otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la calle sufrieron diversos daños, causados por el efecto de las llamas.

description.hltext_display: Keep home safe over the holidays
description.content:
Thousands of people are finding new ways to interact everyday.
When I first met Binky, she was walking along one of downtown Conway’s parking areas, and she was very friendly — from a distance.� While this time of year often brings holiday spirits and cheer, there are others who may look to take advantage of you during the festive season...

description.hltext_display: A legfrissebb: hány mobilt használunk itthon?
description.content: Az év tizenegyedik hónapjában 39 ezerrel 11 millió 901 ezerre emelkedett a három hazai mobiltelefon-szolgáltató teljes előfizetőszáma. A forgalmat generáló ügyfeleké az előző hónaphoz képest 4 ezerrel 10 millió 877 ezerre nőtt.

description.hltext_display: La història recent de Monistrol de Calders, en llibre
description.author: Regi
description.content:
Jordi Gual signa una obra que fa memòria del segle XX a la població
VOTA LA NOTÍCIA
D'esquerra a dreta, Cardona, Erill i Gual
joan capdevila
J. CAPDEVILAMONISTROLC.
Monistrol de Calders, del calaix, una imatge i una història és el títol del llibre que el seu autor, Jordi Gual, va presentar diumenge a la consideració dels vilatans i estudiosos. Es tracta d'un volum curosament editat per Zenobita, un segell de Manresa i en el qual hom troba 284 fotografies en blanc i negre, molt ben impreses, englobades en 10 capítols de la història viva del segle XX del poble de Monistrol de Calders.
El llibre fa un recorregut a través de les imatges i de la imaginació pel poble de Monistrol de Calders, el seu entorn rural, els transports i les comunicacions, l'aigua i la meteorologia, el treball i la indústria, els oficis i els establiments, l'ensenyament, la religió, l'esport i s'acaba amb la cultura, les festes i el lleure. Cada fotografia s'acompanya d'un profús text explicatiu que situa el lector dins l'entorn de la imatge que contempla.
El format del llibre, de 26 x 24 cm, ha permès poder imprimir les imatges en unes mides grans.
En la presentació del llibre, un acte que es va celebrar diumenge a la tarda en un local del centre parroquial, l'alcaldesa, Mercè Cardona, va lloar la feina de recerca i de trobada de fotografies i l'ajut dels veïns que han col·laborant cedint-les a l'autor per poder fer l'obra. L'estudiós Gustau Erill, que va acompanyar l'autor, es va felicitar tot recordant el cantant Raimon quan diu "qui perd els orígens perd identitat", i va remarcar que la tossuderia i l'anar gratant ara ací ara allà fa que es recuperi una part de la història local. Així, sense gaires mitjans però amb molta dedicació, s'ha pogut recuperar memòries molt interessants per refer la vida i el passat dels pobles.
Jordi Gual, l'autor de Monistrol de Calders del calaix, una imatge i una història, després dels agraïments de costum, va explicar com havia recuperat i trobat fotografies. Gual va comentar que, gràcies a la generositat de molts veïns, ara mateix es disposa d'un arxiu de 1.800 fotografies d'abans dels anys 70 del segle XX, a més d'una quantitat molt més gran de les que són datades posteriorment.
El seu objectiu, va dir, no era altre que posar les fotografies a l'abast de tothom. De fet, l'edició del llibre era prevista des de feia temps, i l'endarreriment va propiciar que s'hagin pogut incloure i publicar una seixantena d'imatges més. Gual va afegir que es podrien haver aconseguit més fotografies i haver fet més entrevistes a gent del poble per augmentar el nombre de testimonis orals de molts aspectes vitals de la població.
L'autor Jordi Gual va acabar, emocionat, referint-se a la dedicatòria del llibre. Un treball que, com ha quedat escrit, l'ha dedicat a la seva filla Marta i al seu fill Miquel, "els angelets" de casa seva.

description.hltext_display: 【ＭＬＢ】イチローが神戸で自主トレ
Survey reports nurses are unaware of simple diagnostic test for sepsis patients
description.author: Editors
description.content: bioMerieux, a world leader in the field of in vitro diagnostics, announced the results of a survey demonstrating that most critical care nurses are unaware of a simple diagnostic test that may dramatically improve outcomes for sepsis patients. The survey, conducted at the 2010 American Association of Critical Care Nurses' annual meeting, revealed that while the vast majority of nurses expressed the need for new tools to battle sepsis, 25 percent of the 220 nurses surveyed reported that their hospitals do not have a rapid response protocol for the early identification of potential sepsis patients. "There are best-in-class processes in healthcare with irrefutable benefits to patients," said Kirsten Springer, RN, CCRN, sepsis coordinator in the Surgical Neuro Trauma ICU at Mission Hospital in Mission Viejo, California. "Testing suspected sepsis patients for procalcitonin (PCT) levels is one of those best practices that could dramatically improve outcomes once adopted nationwide."

event_or_fact.property: There are best-in-class processes in healthcare with irrefutable benefits to patients; Testing suspected sepsis patients for procalcitonin (PCT) levels is one of those best practices that could dramatically improve outcomes once adopted nationwide.

description.hltext_display: Into the wild Boeing yonder
description.content:
Platitudes were plentiful Tuesday morning, and the only cloud to be seen was the ever-present valley fog that enveloped the manufacturing plant of Boeing Helena, nee Summit Aeronautics Group, as the new corporate parents took the keys, kicked the tires on their new operation and invited the neighbors over for a look-see.
The requisite coterie of local and state dignitaries and politicos were met by their corporate counterparts from Seattle and elsewhere in the Boeing family, and nary a bad word was spoken about the purchase of Summit by Boeing, which was announced last month and closed last Friday.
We’ll add our voices to the chorus welcoming Boeing to town. It’s exciting news for Helena, seeing a global leader in aviation and aerospace hand-pick a homegrown firm stocked with locally trained and educated fabricators and engineers who will now manufacture parts for several of the company’s signature jetliners, the 787, 747 and 767. It speaks well for Montana State Unversity, where a majority of Summit’s 14 engineers earned degrees, and for the University of Montana-Helena College of Technology, which trained around half of the company’s 60 fabricators. By employee count, Boeing Helena is among the smaller of 11 properties in the Boeing Fabrication family. But by technological standards, Boeing officials say, the local shop is cutting-edge.
And it speaks well for the foresight of Tom Hoffman, who founded the company just over a decade ago. Ross Bogue, the head of 13,000-employee Boeing Fabrication, of which Summit is now a part, explained Tuesday that there was a divergence in aerospace some years back, with some firms specializing in aluminum alloys and others focusing on titanium and steel. Summit chose the latter course, and it’s that direction that Boeing sees as the future of its commercial aviation program.
Skeptics wonder whether Boeing only bought Summit for the parts, and will soon move the machinery and the talent elsewhere. There’s something of an understandable mistrust of corporate outsiders in general in Montana, and it’s OK to question the motives of newcomers.
But frankly we’d be less surprised if the exact opposite scenario plays out at the local plant. Summit brings to the table an educated and capable workforce, and one that’s not unionized — a fact that surely wasn’t lost on the new owners. The facility is modern and spacious, and there’s lots of room (and the infrastructure’s ready) for additions to the current building as well as a new one, if demand dictates. It certainly seems possible the local plant could grow and grow quickly, if the global economy and Boeing’s backlog of airplane orders each expand.
So welcome to Helena, Boeing. We heartily join the state’s business and economic development leadership in hoping this is the start of a long and healthy relationship, for the company and for the Queen City.

description.hltext_display: Skok na SKOK i pogoń za złodziejem radiowozem po torach
description.content:
Mężczyzna w kominiarce wszedł do oddziału SKOK przy ul. Grobla w Poznaniu, we wtorek ok. godz. 14. - Miał spluwę, krzyczał, że to napad - opowiada Krzysztof Pięta, strażak, który akurat wypełniał wniosek przy okienku. Napastnik sterroryzował kasjera i zabrał pieniądze, kilkanaście tysięcy złotych. - Wybiegłem za nim, zobaczyłem, że wsiadł do taksówki. Zacząłem go gonić, po drodze zobaczyłem radiowóz policjantów z komisariatu wodnego, wsiadłem do ich wozu i ruszyliśmy w pościg - relacjonuje Pięta.
Złodziej uciekał w kierunku Śródki. Ulice były zakorkowane. - Funkcjonariusze komisariatu wodnego dysponowali radiowozem typu terenowego i dzięki temu mogli przejechać przez zakorkowany Most Chrobrego torowiskiem dla tramwajów - mówi Romuald Piecuch z poznańskiej policji. Radiowóz utknął jednak na torach na ul. Wyszyńskiego. Ale taksówka, którą wskazał strażak Pięta, była już blisko. Policjanci wybiegli i zdołali dopaść złodzieja, miał przy sobie broń, kominiarkę i worek z pieniędzmi. - Sprawcą napadu okazał się 34-letni mieszkaniec Krakowa, w przeszłości notowany za przestępstwo narkotykowe - informuje Piecuch. W czasie akcji wstrzymany był ruch tramwajowy w rejonie Śródki, bo radiowóz blokował tory.
Krzysztof Pięta jest poznańskim strażakiem, służy w jednostce na Ratajach. W chwili, gdy łapał złodzieja nie był na służbie. Wielkopolska SKOK poinformowała po południu, że prezes zdecydował o przyznaniu Pięcie nagrody w wysokości 1 tys. zł. Nagroda zostanie wręczona prawdopodobnie w środę.

description.hltext_display: خاطرات افشاگر منتشر می شود
description.content:
بین الملل > آمریکا - یک روزنامه انگلیسی با اشاره به اینکه "جولیان آسانگ" موسس ویکی لیکس اخیرا خاطرات خود را به دو انتشارات انگلیسی و آمریکایی فروخته است از انتشار این خاطرات در ابتدای سال 2011 خبر داد.
به گزارش خبرگزاری مهر به نقل از گاردین، موسس ویکی لیکس که به تازگی از بازداشت پلیس انگلیس رهایی یافته، اخیرا خاطرات خود را به انتشارات "کانن گیت" (Canon gate) انگلیس و "رندم هاوس" (Random House) آمریکا فروخته است.
بر این اساس، نسخه اولیه کتاب خاطرات جولیان آسانگ در ماه مارس 2011 (قریب به سه ماه دیگر) در آمریکا و انگلیس منتشر خواهد شد.
آسانگ استرالیایی 39 سال دارد و کارشناس رایانه است. وی اخیرا به علت انتشار اسناد و مدارک محرمانه دیپلماتیک آمریکا در شبکه اینترنت مورد خشم کاخ سفید قرار گرفته است. 48

description.hltext_display: Bulls obliterate Sixers
description.content: Chicago, IL (Sports Network) - Derrick Rose scored 22 points to go with 12 assists as the Chicago Bulls manhandled the Philadelphia 76ers, 121-76, at United Arena. Luol Deng also chipped in 22 points and Carlos Boozer contributed a double- double of 16 points and 11 rebounds for the Bulls, who have won eight of nine. Kurt Thomas finished with 12 points, eight rebounds and five blocks for the victors. "It was an old fashioned butt kicking," said Sixers forward Elton Brand. "[Chicago] did what ever they wanted to do tonight." Andre Iguodala led the Sixers with 17 points and Thaddeus Young added 12 points and seven rebounds off the bench for Philadelphia, which has lost two of three. Rose and Deng scored 11 and 10 points, respectfully, for the Bulls in the first, as they took a 33-19 lead into the second. Chicago expanded its lead to 61-43 at the half behind a 61.1 percent shooting effort in the second quarter. Chicago took over in the third, capitalizing on a 4-for-17 shooting effort and seven turnovers by the Sixers. The Bulls outscored Philadelphia 31-11 en route to a 92-54 lead entering the fourth. Both teams removed a majority of their starters in the fourth quarter. The Bulls' lead eclipsed 50 with four minutes left when rarely used reserve man Brian Scalabrine converted a powering dunk to give Chicago a 118-67 lead. "We played together as a group of guys," stated Boozer. "We came out very focused tonight and played a great game against [the Sixers]. It's a great thing for us to build on in the future." Game Notes This was game two of an eight-game road trip for the Sixers, who will also visit Boston, Denver, Golden State, Phoenix, the Los Angeles Lakers and New Orleans...Philadelphia shot 35 percent from the field and made only 2-of-15 from beyond the arc...Elton Brand led the Sixers with nine rebounds...The Bulls made 81 percent from the charity stripe and scored 31 points off 18 Philadelphia turnovers...Chicago won the rebounding margin 40-37, and held a 52-26 advantage on points in the paint.

event_or_fact.property: We played together as a group of guys; We came out very focused tonight and played a great game against [the Sixers]. It's a great thing for us to build on in the future.

description.hltext_display: US drafting order on indefinite detention of Gitmo detainees
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
The Obama Administration is drafting an executive order that will provide for indefinite detention of some prisoners at the US military prison at Guantanamo Bay in Cuba.
The draft order "would set up periodic review of the detention status of those detainees who cannot be tried in Article III or military commissions," a White House official told Fox News.
The order is meant for terror suspects who according to the Obama administration are too dangerous to be bought to trial at the federal courts or military commissions.
The draft order, a version of which was first considered nearly 18 months ago, is expected to be signed by President Obama early next year, reported ProPublica.
"The order establishes indefinite detention as a long-term Obama administration policy and makes clear that the White House alone will manage a review process for those it chooses to hold without charge or trial," the news report said.
The order allows for the possibility that detainees from countries like Yemen might be released if circumstances there change, it said.
Administration officials stress that right now it is nothing more than a draft executive order that has not yet reached the President's desk, the Fox News said.

description.hltext_display: How to Manage Aggression in Group Homes
description.content:
Group homes have a responsibility to staff and residents to manage aggression.
A wide variety of aggressive behavior causes problems in group homes. From foster homes to substance abuse treatment programs, from children's facilities to mental health programs to Alzheimer's treatment programs, group homes need to manage aggression for the safety of all the staff and residents.
Difficulty: Moderate
Instructions
1
Determine the cause of the aggression. It may be event-related, sudden or unexpected, or escalating. Caregivers can assess the root of aggression and combat the behavior.
Modify the environment for any stress-causing factors. Behavioral changes indicate building tension and anxiety. Stress often increases at the end of the day; plan calming activities to manage fatigue. Naps help with fatigue.
Maintain routine. This provides much-needed consistency for someone who is not in a private home.
Play calming and relaxing music, which can decrease agitation and aggression. Instrumentals are often a good choice; some residents may enjoy religious music as well.
Exercise. Moderate walking offers overall health benefits for residents and can reduce aggression. Three or four residents can walk together and enjoy talking and singing. Gradually increase distance or the length of walks and then maintain it.
Find activities the residents can enjoy. These may be slightly different than those previously engaged in, but they can help reduce aggression.
Incorporate a specific aggression management program, such as Therapeutic Aggression Control Techniques. The program offers six days of staff crisis intervention training and includes verbal deescalation and, as a last resort, physical intervention.
Use medication as a last resort.

description.hltext_display: Copper hits $9,249
description.content:
COPPER prices on the London Metal Exchange yesterday reached US$9,249 per tonne from 9,102 on Friday and just shy of the record high recorded on Wednesday last week.
The price pushed higher in the face of a stronger dollar and persistent concerns over European debt, after the closure of a major port terminal in Chile.
This re-inforced widespread market expectations for tighter supply in 2011.
The latest $ 9,249 per tonne level was well within reach of its record high of $9,267.50 hit last week while for a three-month delivery metal went to $9,201 per tonne.
Meanwhile, the price of maize and soya beans took a minor tumble on the Zambia Agriculture Commodity Exchange (Zamace) because of the changes in the local currency against the United States dollar.
But as the dollar was negatively affecting the prices of maize and soya beans, wheat, whose demand is high world-over bullied through the odds to take a marginal rise in Kwacha terms but quite significant on the dollar.
The recent gains of the Kwacha to a dollar, initially changing at K4,730 and then down to K4630, saw maize price which was trading at K995,712 per tonne drop to K981,360.
As for soya beans, the commodity tumbled in Kwacha value as it fell from K2.147 million per tonne to K2.109 million per tonne.
Wheat, nonetheless bullied the market price and despite increasing in price by $11, only saw a marginal increase in Kwacha terms from K2.035 million per tonne to a new K2.050 million per tonne.

description.hltext_display: Tuningolt GeForce GTX 570 érkezik a Zotac-tól
description.content: Ahogy azt megszokhattuk a Zotac-nál, az AMP! szériát erősíti majd a gyárilag tuningolt GTX 570.

description.hltext_display: Napad na Skok: gonili złodzieja radiowozem po torach
description.content:
Mężczyzna w kominiarce wszedł do oddziału SKOK przy ul. Grobla w Poznaniu, we wtorek ok. godz. 14. - Miał spluwę, krzyczał, że to napad - opowiada Krzysztof Pięta, strażak, który akurat wypełniał wniosek przy okienku. Napastnik sterroryzował kasjera i zabrał pieniądze, kilkanaście tysięcy złotych. - Wybiegłem za nim, zobaczyłem, że wsiadł do taksówki. Zacząłem go gonić, po drodze zobaczyłem radiowóz policjantów z komisariatu wodnego, wsiadłem do ich wozu i ruszyliśmy w pościg - relacjonuje Pięta.
Złodziej uciekał w kierunku Śródki. Ulice były zakorkowane. - Funkcjonariusze komisariatu wodnego dysponowali radiowozem typu terenowego i dzięki temu mogli przejechać przez zakorkowany Most Chrobrego torowiskiem dla tramwajów - mówi Romuald Piecuch z poznańskiej policji. Radiowóz utknął jednak na torach na ul. Wyszyńskiego. Ale taksówka, którą wskazał strażak Pięta, była już blisko. Policjanci wybiegli i zdołali dopaść złodzieja, miał przy sobie broń, kominiarkę i worek z pieniędzmi. - Sprawcą napadu okazał się 34-letni mieszkaniec Krakowa, w przeszłości notowany za przestępstwo narkotykowe - informuje Piecuch. W czasie akcji wstrzymany był ruch tramwajowy w rejonie Śródki, bo radiowóz blokował tory.
Krzysztof Pięta jest poznańskim strażakiem, służy w jednostce na Ratajach. W chwili, gdy łapał złodzieja nie był na służbie. Wielkopolska SKOK poinformowała po południu, że prezes zdecydował o przyznaniu Pięcie nagrody w wysokości 1 tys. zł. Nagroda zostanie wręczona prawdopodobnie w środę.

description.hltext_display: � 话不谈开诚布公 两会累积互信趋务实
description.content:
中评社台北12月22日电（记者 李仲维分析报导）两岸两会自2008年恢复协商以来，已经历经六次江陈会谈，综合六次会谈的经验，越来越务实，应该是两会共同的心得，而这也将成为未来两会协商的新模式。
一位多次参与江陈会谈的人士就认为，与两岸刚刚复谈，两会当时还不熟悉的情况比起来，两会协商现在已经越来越不在乎形式，协商代表上桌后，往往直接切入实质问题，对于相互执行协议出现的缺失，两岸代表也不再讳言，上了桌就开诚布公相互探讨。
两岸谈判代表不再高来高去，言不及义，意味的是两岸已经累积一定程度的互信，与两年多来签署的15项协议比起来，两岸互信是无形的成果，更是一点一滴累积而成的资产。
这位协商代表就表示，两会协商代表现在几乎已经到无话不谈的地步，有时候讲话尺度稍微放开一点，也不担心会伤到对方。

description.hltext_display: The Extraction of Capsaicin
description.content:
Capsaicin extracted from chili peppers is used in food and medicine.
The alkaloid capsaicin is an extract from chili peppers. Capsaicin does not occur in any other plants. This extract, which belongs to the capsaicinoid family of chemicals, retains its potent ability over time.
Extraction
Extraction of capsaicin is based on its solubility. The first step is to treat the moistened chili plant with an alkali in order to set free the base that is in salt form. The next step is to separate the free base with an organic solvent.
Complex Process
The isolation of alkaloids from plants is not an easy. Plants bearing alkaloids usually contain a complex mixture of alkaloids that complicates the process.
Uses of Capsaicin
The food industry uses capsaicin as a flavoring agent to impart a hot and spicy flavor to foods. Capsaicin finds use in medicine in pain therapy. Another use for the alkaloid is to repel pests such as squirrels.

description.hltext_display: Jagdverbot in Harzrevieren ausgerufen
description.author: redaktion@ad-hoc-news.de
description.content: Für die Wildtiere im Harz gilt wegen des strengen Winterwetters ab sofort die sogenannte Notzeit. In allen Revieren ab 400 Metern Höhe sei die Jagd verboten, teilten die Landkreise Goslar und Osterode am Mittwoch mit. Zudem müssten die Revierinhaber für eine ...

description.hltext_display: How to Upgrade Your CPAP
description.content:
If you've been using the same old CPAP machine and mask for five years or more, it's time to consider an upgrade. CPAP technology has advanced a lot in the last few years, and there's no reason to settle for older, less effective equipment. Most insurance companies cover regular replacement of your mask, accessories and even the entire CPAP machine itself. It's really just a matter of taking the old stuff along to your respiratory therapist and asking for the suggestion of something new.
Difficulty: Easy
Instructions
Things You'll Need:
CPAP machine
Airway tubing
CPAP mask
1
Add a humidifier. If your CPAP machine doesn't have one, you can easily add a heated or passive humidifier to it. The need for humidification is better understood today than it was a decade ago, and most insurance companies will readily approve a humidifier if you don't have one.
Get a new mask. Ever year CPAP mask designs get lighter, more comfortable and more durable. If you've had yours for a number of years, ask your respiratory therapist for a new one. Tell your therapist about problems you've had with your current mask or what you'd like to see in a new one.
Upgrade your tubing. Even if you have a heated humidifier, much heat can be lost as the air moves through the tubing between the machine and the mask. This can even cause condensation in the tubing, which leads to an annoying gurgling sound. You can now get tubing insulators that zip over your air tubing and keep the air warm until it reaches your mask.
Get the latest firmware. Check with your respiratory therapist to see if your current CPAP machine uses firmware, and verify that you have the latest version. Sometimes the algorithms the machine uses to adjust air pressure have been improved since you got your equipment.
Get a whole new machine. Insurance companies expect that you'll need a new machine every five years or so; check with your own carrier to find out. Generally the new machine will come with a built-in humidifier, new airway tubing and even a new mask if you need one.

description.hltext_display: ゼブレが週末の挙式・披露宴対応を１日２組に拡大
description.content:
更新日：2010年 12月22日 (水)
ウエディングスペースを展開する、ゼブレ（本社名古屋市西区八筋町２７６、藤埜大也社長、電話０５２・５０３・３７６９）は、週末などの挙式・披露宴対応を１日２組に拡大する。これまでに同所でウエディングを運営し、挙式などに対応するためのノウハウを蓄積してきた。今後、２回ウエディングを行うことなどよって、３倍増の年間１５０組に対応していく。

description.hltext_display: 陈云林称呼“您” 赖幸媛有所遗憾
description.content:
赖幸媛：每一次他会见陈会长，都是以“陆委会主委”的身份。（中评社李仲维摄）
中评社台北12月22日电（记者 李仲维）大陆海协会长陈云林昨日与台湾“陆委会主委”赖幸媛会晤时，以“您”来称呼赖幸媛，赖幸媛今天对此表示遗憾。
赖幸媛表示，在台湾举行过三次江陈会谈，每一次他会见陈会长，都是以“陆委会主委”的身份，这是清清楚楚，也无庸置疑的，她称呼陈会长，是因为他就是海协会的会长。
赖幸媛说，08年她第一次会见陈云林时，陈是以“您”来称呼，去年陈云林是以“您”或“幸媛”来交互使用，这次又称呼“您”。她个人认为，遗憾的是在这样的场合，对方协商代表团的负责人还是觉得有自己的考虑，用“您”来做称呼，她当然觉得有所遗憾，但无论如何，她是以“陆委会主委”的身份会见，这是非常清楚的。
海基会协商代表团今天下午在江丙坤董事长的率领下，前往“陆委会”向赖幸媛报告此次江陈会谈的成果，在会后的记者会上，赖幸媛回答记者询问时做上述表示。

description.hltext_display: Roger Federer took the upper hand against Rafael Nadal on Tuesday with a two set to one win in a charity exhibition match in the Swiss city of Zurich.
description.content:
After losing the first set 4-6, Federer broke back against the world number one early in the second set to take a 6-3, 6-3 lead, watched by a capacity home crowd including Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel, ski-ing champions Lindsey Vonn and Didier Cuche.
The 10,500 tickets for the "Match for Africa" were sold out within a few minutes when they went on sale on September 1.
The world's top two in tennis this year move on to Madrid for another exhibtion match on Wednesday, this time to raise money for the Spaniard's charity.
"Both of us realise we are in a very privileged position, where we have everything in life, the least we can do is to help people who are in difficulty," said Nadal.
Federer has been hoping to raise around one million dollars from the event for his foundation to support projects for African children in education and sport.
"You have to look at the long term," said Federer.
"When you can help 1,500 children to go to school, it's great but you need a lot around it: how do the children get to school, what do they eat at school, do they have toilets... and that's where we come in," he added on Swiss television TSR.
The 29 year-old Swiss player remains on the wrong end of an 8-14 career record on the professional circuit against Nadal, breaking a six match losing streak against the Spaniard this year.

description.hltext_display: Swedish Medical Center awards $3 million to OSI for patient monitoring solutions
description.author: Editors
description.content:
OSI Systems, Inc., a vertically integrated provider of specialized electronic products for critical applications in the Security and Healthcare industries, today announced that the Spacelabs Healthcare division has received an order for approximately $3 million from Swedish Medical Center to provide advanced patient monitoring solutions, which will be utilized at the non-profit health system's new hospital in Issaquah, WA.
“We are excited about this effort with Swedish. OSI has a broad array of patient monitoring solutions that can be well matched to the unique needs of each hospital.” "Swedish and Spacelabs have come together on the delivery of healthcare in the Seattle area and beyond. We are committed to improving the way care is delivered and our partnership supports this goal. I congratulate Spacelabs on their technology, which is designed to meet the dynamic challenges of healthcare," said Cal Knight, President and COO of Swedish.
Deepak Chopra, President and CEO of OSI Systems, stated, "We are excited about this effort with Swedish. OSI has a broad array of patient monitoring solutions that can be well matched to the unique needs of each hospital."

description.hltext_display: イープが空き広告看板情報共有化へ専用ウェブ開設
description.content:
更新日：2010年 12月22日 (水)
ベビーウエア企画製作のＹＥＥＰ（＝イープ、本社名古屋市北区清水１の７の１１、大田俊幸社長、電話０５２・９５５・０５５２）は来年２月から、広告看板の情報を他社とネット上で共有し情報交換を行う新事業を開始する。スポンサーがいない空き看板の立地情報を相互に交換し、スポンサー獲得につなげるもので、１月に企業向けの説明会を実施。まずは東海３県限定で会員を募っていく。

description.hltext_display: BB&Ts Ratings Lowered By Moodys
Filipino gunmen free 2 Malaysians after 10 months
description.content:
Pat Roque A police officer shows the way to Malaysian national Lai Wong Chun, center, and Chen Yui Chung as they step out of an ambulance at the police hospital Wednesday, Dec. 22, 2010 in suburban Quezon City, north of Manila, Philippines. Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida linked militants have freed the two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity. (AP Photo/Pat Roque)
Loading…
Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida-linked militants, under pressure from pursuing police commandos, have freed two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity, police said Wednesday.
The hostages were seized Feb. 8 from a seaweed farm in Malaysia's Sabah state and whisked away in a speedboat to nearby Philippine waters in a pattern similar to past kidnappings-for-ransom blamed on the notorious terrorist group Abu Sayyaf.
Police commandos, who have been searching for the captives, recovered the two men near Bongao town in the southernmost island province of Tawi-Tawi late Tuesday, national police chief Raul Bacalzo told reporters.
He said the gunmen abandoned the hostages after they were encircled by government forces. The kidnappers escaped and the Malaysians, Chen Yui Chung, 48, and Lai Wong Chun, 46, were flown to Manila. They will be turned over to the Malaysian Embassy after being debriefed by Philippine authorities and checked up in a hospital at police headquarters in the capital.
Wearing baseball caps, the two appeared to have lost weight as they walked into a hospital emergency room from an ambulance. One wore combat boots. Policemen kept journalists and photographers from coming near.
Interior Secretary Jessie Robredo said the two told him they were not harmed by their captors and were fed well.
"Thank you very much," Robredo quoted the Malaysians as repeatedly telling officials.
"We're all so happy. This is the best Christmas gift to their families," Robredo told The Associated Press.
The kidnappers had demanded ransom but Robredo said he was unaware of any payment, as was the case with past abductions.
Malaysian and Philippine authorities were initially unsure if the hostages were still in Malaysia or the southern Philippines, where the Abu Sayyaf and other Muslim rebel groups have carried out kidnappings for ransom.
Officials in Tawi-Tawi, about 620 miles (1,000 kilometers) southwest of Manila, had ordered a search in the far-flung province in June after police monitored a cell phone call made by one of the captives to his family in Malaysia, according to a Philippine security official.
The official, who helped oversee the search, declined to be named because he was not authorized to talk to the media.
"They were brought from Tawi-Tawi to Jolo and back and we did not know where to look for them," Tawi-Tawi Gov. Sadikul Sahali said.
Chen Yui Chung's brother-in-law, Chong Man Tung, told The Associated Press in June that his relative had called him weeks after the abduction saying the two were being held by gunmen on an unspecified Philippine island.
The kidnappers apparently had moved the captives from Tawi-Tawi to nearby Jolo Island and back to evade the Philippine military and police manhunt, the security official said.
The Abu Sayyaf has gained notoriety for high-profile kidnappings, beheadings and bomb attacks. Battle setbacks, arrests and surrenders have reduced the group's strength to more than 300 from more than 1,000 guerrillas during its heyday in 2000, the military says.
That year the militants abducted 21 Asian workers and Western tourists from Malaysia's Sipadan diving resort and brought them to Jolo. They were freed in batches in exchange for huge ransoms.
Hundreds of U.S. troops have been providing weapons, training and intelligence to Philippine forces in the south for years to help eradicate the Abu Sayyaf, which is on Washington's list of terrorist organizations.

description.hltext_display: Peszko potwierdza: ''Jestem w Kolonii, jeszcze kilka spraw do ustalenia
description.content:
- Tak, jestem w Kolonii - potwierdza Peszko. - Jest jeszcze kilka rzeczy do wyjaśnienia, zobaczymy co dalej - dodaje.
Zainteresowanie sprowadzeniem Peszki w końcu potwierdził też przedstawiciel klubu z Kolonii. - Zajmujemy się tą sprawą - powiedział trener Frank Schaefer w Kickerze.
Sławomir Peszko ma w kontrakcie z Lechem klauzulę odstępnego, co sprawia, że może odejść z Poznania po zapłaceniu przez inny klub 500 tys. euro.

description.hltext_display: European airports battle to clear Christmas backlog
EVD to host John Franks Memorial sale
description.content:
Evangeline Downs Racetrack and Casino will once again host the John Franks Memorial Two-Year-Old in Training Sale.
Evangeline Downs, along with Sale Administrator Stem-mans Inc., have announced the dates for the 9th edition of this important Sale that is named after the late Louisiana Oil Baron and multiple Eclipse Award winning Owner/Breeder.
Both the sale and the Gallop Preview Show are free and open to the public. As is past years, a pair of races restricted to 2-year-olds who pass through the sales ring will be offered in August at Evangeline Downs. One race will be for colts and geldings and the other race will be for fillies, and each will be run at the distance of
5 1/2 furlongs on the main track and offer a purse of $60,000.
"The sale, with its strategic placing and deep talent pool, has become an important part of the racing industry as horseman throughout Louisiana as well as from neighboring jurisdictions look to restock and upgrade their stables for our upcoming 89 night spring/summer meet at Evangeline Downs Racetrack andCasino, which begins on Wednesday, April 6th, and runs thru the traditional closing night, Monday, Sept. 5, Labor Day," said Steve Darbonne, Director of Racing Operations at Evangeline Downs said.

description.hltext_display: Nowitzki überholt Bird in NBA-Punkteliste
description.content:
a / AOrlando - Superstar Dirk Nowitzki hat in der "ewigen" NBA- Punkteliste Basketball-Legende Larry Bird überholt. Auf wie viele Zähler er in seiner NBA-Karriere nach dem Sieg am Dienstag kommt:
© ap
Superstar Dirk Nowitzki hat in der "ewigen" NBA- Punkteliste Basketball-Legende Larry Bird überholt.
Zum 105:99-Sieg seiner Dallas Mavericks bei Orlando Magic steuerte der Würzburger in der Nacht zu Mittwoch 17 Punkte bei und kommt in seiner NBA-Karriere nun auf 21.798 Zähler. Damit belegt er den 25. Rang in der Bestenliste der nordamerikanischen Basketball-Profiliga. Der Sieg in Orlando war für Dallas der 16. Erfolg aus den vergangenen 17 Partien.
Nowitzki - und sonst? Die größten Stars des US-Sports
zurück
vorBester Werfer der Mavericks war ausnahmsweise mal nicht Nowitzki, sondern dessen Teamkollege Caron Butler mit 20 Punkten. Für die Magic sammelte Dwight Howard am meisten Zähler (26). Dallas liegt mit einer Bilanz von 23:5-Siegen in der Western Conference hinter San Antonio (24:3) weiter auf dem zweiten Rang.

description.hltext_display: Robot waiters never lose patience
description.content:
Jinan, China – Service with a smile also comes with an electronic voice at the Dalu Robot restaurant, where the hotpot meals are not as famous yet as the staff who never lose their patience and never take tips.
The restaurant, which opened this month in Jinan in northern Shandong province, is touted as China’s first robot hotpot eatery where robots resembling Star Wars droids circle the room carrying trays of food in a conveyor belt-like system.
More than a dozen robots operate in the restaurant as entertainers, servers, greeters and receptionists. Each robot has a motion sensor that tells it to stop when someone is in its path so customers can reach for dishes they want.
The service industry in China has not always kept up with the country’s rapid economic growth, and can be quite basic in some restaurants, leading customers in the Dalu restaurant to praise the robots.
"They have a better service attitude than humans," said Li Xiaomei (35), who was visiting the restaurant for the first time.
"Humans can be temperamental or impatient, but they don’t feel tired, they just keep working and moving round and round the restaurant all night," Li said.
Inspired by space exploration, robot technology and global innovation, the restaurant’s owner, Zhang Yongpei, said he hopes his restaurant will show the world China is a serious competitor in developing technology.
"I hope this new concept shows that China is forward-thinking and innovative," Zhang said.
As customers enter the dimly lit restaurant lined with blinking neon lights to simulate a futuristic environment, a female robot decorated with batting eyelashes greets people with an electronic "welcome".
During the meal, crowds of up to 100 customers, are entertained by a dancing and talking robot that looks more like a mannequin with a dress, flapping its arms around in a stiff motion.
Zhang said he hopes to roll out 30 robots – which cost $6 000 (R38 000) each – in the coming months and eventually develop robots with human-like qualities that serve customers at their table and can walk up and down the stairs.

event_or_fact.property: he hopes to roll out 30 robots ? which cost $6 000 (R38 000) each ? in the coming months and eventually develop robots with human-like qualities that serve customers at their table and can walk up and down the stairs
I hope this new concept shows that China is forward-thinking and innovative

description.hltext_display: Napad na SKOK i pogoń za złodziejem radiowozem po torach
description.content:
Mężczyzna w kominiarce wszedł do oddziału SKOK przy ul. Grobla w Poznaniu, we wtorek ok. godz. 14. - Miał spluwę, krzyczał, że to napad - opowiada Krzysztof Pięta, strażak, który akurat wypełniał wniosek przy okienku. Napastnik sterroryzował kasjera i zabrał pieniądze, kilkanaście tysięcy złotych. - Wybiegłem za nim, zobaczyłem, że wsiadł do taksówki. Zacząłem go gonić, po drodze zobaczyłem radiowóz policjantów z komisariatu wodnego, wsiadłem do ich wozu i ruszyliśmy w pościg - relacjonuje Pięta.
Złodziej uciekał w kierunku Śródki. Ulice były zakorkowane. - Funkcjonariusze komisariatu wodnego dysponowali radiowozem typu terenowego i dzięki temu mogli przejechać przez zakorkowany Most Chrobrego torowiskiem dla tramwajów - mówi Romuald Piecuch z poznańskiej policji. Radiowóz utknął jednak na torach na ul. Wyszyńskiego. Ale taksówka, którą wskazał strażak Pięta, była już blisko. Policjanci wybiegli i zdołali dopaść złodzieja, miał przy sobie broń, kominiarkę i worek z pieniędzmi. - Sprawcą napadu okazał się 34-letni mieszkaniec Krakowa, w przeszłości notowany za przestępstwo narkotykowe - informuje Piecuch. W czasie akcji wstrzymany był ruch tramwajowy w rejonie Śródki, bo radiowóz blokował tory.
Krzysztof Pięta jest poznańskim strażakiem, służy w jednostce na Ratajach. W chwili, gdy łapał złodzieja nie był na służbie. Wielkopolska SKOK poinformowała po południu, że prezes zdecydował o przyznaniu Pięcie nagrody w wysokości 1 tys. zł. Nagroda zostanie wręczona prawdopodobnie w środę.

description.hltext_display: Man shot in search for cop killers
description.content:
A man believed to be linked to the killing of two police officers in Soweto earlier this week was shot in Johannesburg when he was traced and pulled over for questioning, Gauteng police said today.
"Police tried to stop the car but he produced his firearm, jumped out of the car and whilst he was running he was shot in the stomach," said Captain Lungelo Dlamini.
Speaking by phone from the memorial service in Meadowlands of Warrant Officer Dzialwa Reuben Kundwani (48) and Constable Letjeku Abel Thenga (25), Dlamini said the man was taken to hospital and would be charged for murder.
He was allegedly in possession of a police firearm and ballistics tests would be conducted on it.
Police would question him and also check up on the firearms found on the three men who were with him in the car when it was stopped at the split off for Bloemfontein on Johannesburg’s M1 south.
The officers were shot dead in a Meadowlands hostel whilst on patrol on Sunday.
After that shooting, Dlamini said 14 police officers had been killed on duty in Gauteng.
In response, police mounted raids on hostels in Dube, Nancefield, Meadowlands and Merafe and arrested 16 people yesterday.
Those arrested were wanted for crimes including business and ATM robberies.
The raids drew anger from IFP spokesperson Vincent Shange who said that although they condemned the killing of the officers, they felt police were harassing residents and had injured some during the operation.
National Police Commissioner General Bheki Cele encouraged those aggrieved to raise this with the Independent Complaints Directorate which deals with complaints against the police.

event_or_fact.property: Police tried to stop the car but he produced his firearm, jumped out of the car and whilst he was running he was shot in the stomach
14 police officers had been killed on duty in Gauteng
Speaking by phone from the memorial service in Meadowlands of Warrant Officer Dzialwa Reuben Kundwani (48) and Constable Letjeku Abel Thenga (25)

description.hltext_display: Mine suppliers challenged
description.content:
THE Mine Suppliers and Contractors Association has urged members to take advantage of swelling copper prices to expand their businesses and ensure quality services to the mining companies.
Association president Fanwell Banda said in an interview in Kitwe that the attractive price should translate into increased business volume and upturn in profit margins for members.
‘‘With such a good price, we expect every player connected to copper business to
benefit in one way or another. We expect the community in which the mines are located to have a share of benefit,’’ Mr Banda said.
He said while his association appreciated the high copper price, it was prudent for stakeholders to reposition themselves to accrue corresponding benefits.
The association anticipated sustainable price swell following the increased demand of copper on the international market and slumped copper production from major producers like Chile.
‘‘As an association interested in the activities surrounding copper production, the positive copper price is as a result of high demand of the metal and a slump in production by Chile,’’ he said.
Copper prices are further set for a long bull run due to strong industrial demand from China, the largest copper consuming country in the world.
Copper has been driving the base metals pack and China is the centre of action as far as metal sales are concerned.
China’s scrap metals import, mostly led by copper, rose 11.6 per cent in the first three-quarters of 2010.
This reflects a high growth rate being achieved by the one of the leading consumers of the Commodity.

event_or_fact.property: the attractive price should translate into increased business volume and upturn in profit margins for members.
while his association appreciated the high copper price, it was prudent for stakeholders to reposition themselves to accrue corresponding benefits

description.hltext_display: Girl raped by friend's boyfriend
description.content:
A 15-year-old girl was allegedly raped by her friend’s boyfriend in Jabulani, Soweto, police said today.
Warrant Officer Kay Makhubela said she was with a friend and the friend’s boyfriend and they had been drinking liquor.
Suddenly the friend’s boyfriend allegedly started assaulting her and demanded that she take her clothes off.
"He raped her without a condom," said Makhubela.
The 20-year-old boyfriend was arrested and was expected to appear in the Protea Magistrates Court soon.
The girl was taken to a doctor and was expected to also be counselled.

description.hltext_display: Blårävar startar uppåt
description.content:
Starten på blårävsauktionen i Vanda visar på stigande priser även för den viktigaste gruppen av skinn, blåräv.
Då de största storlekarna av blåräv gick under klubban på förmiddagen hade priset på storlek sex stigit med tre procent och medelpriset lyft till 137,56 euro.
För storlek fem var stegringen åtta procent eller ett nytt medelpris på 125,19 euro.
Blårävsauktionen fortsätter och totalt skall nästan 200.000 skinn säljas under dagen.

description.hltext_display: Man betrapt echtgenote met 14-jarige jongen
description.content:
In het Britse Melton heeft een man zijn echtgenote (25) in bed betrapt met een 14-jarige jongen. De vrouw is de voogdij over haar twee zoontjes (6 en 8) uit een vorige relatie kwijt en heeft drie jaar cel gekregen wegens seks met een minderjarige. De echtgenote en de jongen leerden elkaar kennen tijdens een feestje. In de dagen daarop begonnen ze elkaar pikante berichtjes en naaktfoto's te sturen.
Fysiek contact was de volgende stap. De jongen spijbelde regelmatig om met de vrouw naar bed te gaan. Gedurende twee maanden hadden de twee geheime vrijpartijen totdat de echtgenoot ziek werd op zijn werk en vroeger naar huis ging.
De man betrapte het koppel en gaf zijn vrouw enkele rake klappen. De jongen wist te ontkomen.
Voor de rechter bekende de vrouw uiteindelijk haar schuld. Ze werd veroordeeld tot drie jaar cel wegens seks met een minderjarige. Bovendien is ze de voogdij over haar twee zoontjes kwijt.
De man kreeg een waarschuwing voor de klappen die hij had uitgedeeld aan zijn echtgenote.

description.hltext_display: East Helena Council limits fireworks
description.content:
With strong, split opinions about the use of fireworks in their town, the East Helena City Councilmen proposed — and voted down — several options before narrowly passing a new ordinance that will place limitations on the sale and discharge of the pyrotechnic devices.
Starting next year, the days during which people can light off fireworks in East Helena will be limited to July 1 to 4 and the night of Dec. 31 between 11 p.m. and 1 a.m. The dates of fireworks sales will be kept largely the same as they’ve been in the past, though trimmed by one day — July 5 — so they will last from June 24 to July 4 and Dec. 29 to 31. People will only be able to sell or use fireworks between 10 a.m. and 10 p.m., though the hours will be extended until midnight on Independence Day.
In addition, it will be illegal to use fireworks on city property, meaning residents will have to conduct their celebrations on private land. Fireworks vendors will be required to post a copy of the ordinance in a “prominent location” within the place from which they’re selling.
Because the new law does not go into effect for 30 days, the city’s traditional, more lenient, rules will apply for any upcoming New Year celebrations.
The new provisions were passed with a 3-2 vote. Mayor Anthony Strainer was the tiebreaker, since he is only allowed to vote on items when the other four councilmen are deadlocked. But the final ordinance is a compromise for all five members of the council, who were at odds over their vision for the community.
Councilmen Chris Anderson and Mike Spotorno refused to accept a version of the ordinance that strayed from the more restrictive draft that the council had considered during its past two meetings. It would have trimmed firework sales down to three days in the summer — July 2 to July 4 — and winter sales down to two days — Dec. 30 and 31, in addition to limiting hours. Fireworks usage would have been reduced down to the same three-day window in July and the night of Dec. 31.
Both Anderson and Spotorno said the town was ready for those types of changes, but Councilman Kit Johnson thought the opposite, saying it would limit civil liberties and hinder practices important to the community.
“This is not Helena, it’s East Helena and I believe it’s part of our heritage,” he said.
Though he supported limiting hours and restricting usage on city property, he wanted the dates of legal sale and discharge to remain the same as they were, consistent with the window of time outlined in Montana state law.
Strainer’s views fell somewhere in the middle. He said the original intention of revising city ordinance had been to restrict the times and hours during which individuals could light off fireworks in order to address concerns about the disruptions and liabilities stemming from their use. He did not, however, want to limit fireworks sales in the same way, saying that it’s a source of income that local organizations, such as church groups, rely on.
But Johnson was skeptical about allowing fireworks sales a week before anyone can use them.
“If we sell them, the kids are going to look at them for five days before they set them off?” he asked.
Anderson said that dilemma was the reason for proposing the shortened times for both sales and use in the first place.
With all members of the council holding to their views, the vote on the initial, stricter version resulted in a tie before Strainer added his input and defeated it. Then Johnson tried to make an amendment that would limit hours of sale and use, but not restrict days. That also resulted in a split vote and a defeat by the mayor. Another attempt to pass the initial draft ended the same way.
Then, Johnson proposed the final set of standards. Though the vote between the four councilmen was again indecisive — with Anderson and Spotorno against — the mayor added his input and gave it the final push it needed to pass into law.
Reporter Allison Maier: 447-4075 or allison.maier@helenair.com

event_or_fact.property: the town was ready for those types of changes, but Councilman Kit Johnson thought the opposite, saying it would limit civil liberties and hinder practices important to the community

the original intention of revising city ordinance had been to restrict the times and hours during which individuals could light off fireworks in order to address concerns about the disruptions and liabilities stemming from their use
dilemma was the reason for proposing the shortened times for both sales and use in the first place.

description.hltext_display: Ontmoetingen met buitenaardse wezens met 'farao-maskers'
description.content:
Het Nieuw-Zeelandse leger heeft woensdag zo'n 2.000 pagina's aan vertrouwelijke documenten over UFO-meldingen vrijgegeven. Het gaat over meldingen van burgers, piloten en militairen die binnenstroomden van 1954 tot 2009. De documenten omvatten onder meer tekeningen van vliegende schotels en beschrijvingen van buitenaardse wezens met 'farao-maskers'. Ook zouden bepaalde mensen als het ware buitenaardse geschriften hebben gevonden.
Het leger benadrukt dat het de meldingen niet heeft onderzocht. Daar zou onvoldoende geld en personeel voor zijn geweest.
''We zijn gewoon een verzamelpunt voor de informatie. We doen er verder niets mee'', aldus luchtmachtleider Kavvae Tamariki in de krant Dominion Post. De documenten werden vrijgegeven naar aanleiding van een wet op de openbaarheid.

description.hltext_display: Cooper Remains At Outperform
400 عامل بـ(توشكى) يستقبلون (أباظة) بإعلان (حالة العصيان)
description.content:
تعليقات: 0 شارك بتعليقك
حمادة بعزق -
المهندس أمين أباظة وزير الزراعة
أعلن نحو 400 عامل بشركة جنوب بالمنطقة 23، الاعتصام داخل مقر الشركة، أثناء زيارة المهندس أمين أباظة، وزير الزراعة، صباح اليوم، إلى منطقة توشكى، احتجاجا على عدم صرف مستحقاتهم المالية المتمثلة فى 1800 جنيه حصيلة الأرباح السنوية.
كان العاملون بالشركة أضربوا الشهر الماضى للسبب ذاته، ثم قرروا فض الإضراب بعد تدخل سيد فتحى، العضو المنتدب للشركة، حيث وعدهم بصرف المستحقات فى 12 ديسمبر الماضى، وهو ما لم يتحقق، بحسب قولهم.
أكد العاملون لـ«الشروق» أنهم لجأوا إلى تجديد الاعتصام لعدم وفاء المسئولين بالتزاماتهم، وأعلنوا إصرارهم على مواصلة الإضراب هذه المرة لحين تحقق مطالبهم، وطالبوا بتدخل وزير الزراعة لحل الأزمة القائمة بينهم وبين إدارة الشركة.
وقال عدد من المضربين إن سعودى عليوة، رئيس مجلس الإدارة، قرر تعيين عدد من أقاربه بالشركة بعقود شاملة، رغم أنه يرفض معاملتهم بالمثل، حيث إن معظمهم تعاقد بعقود مؤقتة وبمرتبات ضعيفة لا تتناسب مع حالة الغلاء.
من جانبه اعتبر مسئول بفرع الشركة الرئيسى أن تسلم العاملين مستحقاتهم سوف يستغرق «بعض الوقت»، منتقدا لجوء بعضهم إلى الإضراب خلال زيارة الوزير، فى محاولة وصفها بأنها «وسيلة غير مقبولة للضغط على الإدارة».

description.hltext_display: Mother Finds Toddler Floating In Loxahatchee Pool
description.content:
2-Year-Old Taken To Hospital, Expected To Be OK
UPDATED: 5:20 pm EST December 21, 2010
Email Print
2-Year-Old Found Floating In Pool
Embed this Video
Facebook
Digg
Twitter
Yahoo Buzz
Reddit
Delicious
Link
LOXAHATCHEE, Fla. -- A 2-year-old was taken to the hospital after his mother found him floating in a Loxahatchee pool Tuesday.
According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, the toddler's mother noticed he was missing shortly after 9 a.m. and found him floating in the pool behind a house on D Road.
WPBF 25 News' Alexis Rivera said a secretary who works at the property called 911, and emergency operators coached them through CPR procedures on the telephone.
The boy was breathing by the time paramedics arrived. He was taken to a hospital but is expected to be OK.
Rivera said the family is in town visiting for the holidays. Family members didn't walk to speak about the incident.

event_or_fact.property: a secretary who works at the property called 911, and emergency operators coached them through CPR procedures on the telephone
the family is in town visiting for the holidays

description.hltext_display: Funding, antitrust suit pose tests for health law
description.author: Editors
description.content: News outlets are reporting on various policy developments — whether it's the Senate's effort to fund the federal government, ongoing legal challenges to the overhaul or a Michigan antitrust suit — that create tests for the sweeping health law. Meanwhile, however, Secretary Kathleen Sebelius touts the law's benefits and warns against another challenge — that of repeal. : Funding Deal Snags Health LawA Senate deal to fund the federal government until early March doesn't include money to enact the health-care overhaul or stepped up regulation of Wall Street, boosting Republican efforts to curb key elements of President Barack Obama's domestic agenda (Holzer, Mitchell and Adamy, 12/21). : No Reform Law Funding Included In Newest Spending Proposal Funding for the new healthcare reform law is noticeably absent from a bill to keep the government running through March 4, after Republicans objected to an earlier proposal because they said it funded reform (Millman, 12/20). : Antitrust Suit In Michigan Tests Health LawWhen the Justice Department filed an antitrust lawsuit against Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan in October, the unusual action was widely seen as a warning shot to dominant health insurance carriers in many other states (Abelson, 12/20).
